data.title: Built in and cloud powered - elevate your endpoint security with Microsoft Defender ATP
data.sortTitle: built in and cloud powered - elevate your endpoint security with microsoft defender atp
data.description: As our customers are continually challenged with advanced cyber threats and complex environments to protect, we are empowering security practitioners to fight back with Microsoft's unified endpoint security platform for preventative protection, post-breach detection, automated investigation, and response. Join this session to learn about the latest innovations to protect against 0-days, advanced attacks, and data breaches and provide SecOps with the tools they need to respond to security incidents. Get an update on our latest market leading capabilities in endpoint security that set us apart from the competition.

data.title: Business process integration for Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations: What's new and planned
data.sortTitle: business process integration for microsoft dynamics 365 finance and operations: what's new and planned
data.description: If you are an IT professional, developer, or solution architect you won’t want to miss this session. This session will get you up to speed on business events and the move from workflow to Microsoft Flow.

data.title: C# 8: Nullable Reference Types
data.sortTitle: c# 8: nullable reference types
data.description: Nullable Reference Types in C# 8.0 help document the purpose of our code. C# will tell you when a null goes where it’s not supposed to go. In this session, we look at the Nullable Reference Types and how to embrace it in your own code.

data.title: C# 8: The good parts
data.sortTitle: c# 8: the good parts
data.description: C# 8 has many new features like default interface members, async enumerables, ranges and indices, more pattern matching, and a host of other improvements. Join this talk for a whirlwind tour of the new things you can do with C#.

data.title: Choosing the best language for your machine learning solution: From R to Python
data.sortTitle: choosing the best language for your machine learning solution: from r to python
data.description: Creating a machine learning solution involves a number of complex decisions, from architecture, to algorithm selection, to the program and modeling language you choose. With varying capabilities, packages, and community support how do you know which language will best fit your need? This session introduces you to two of the most popular modeling languages - R and Python - and helps you understand how and when to use each. Learn how R in supported Azure Machine Learning and how our R SDK and visual interface can help you build compelling, accurate, and insightful machine learning models.

data.title: Cloud native applications with .NET Core and Azure Kubernetes Service
data.sortTitle: cloud native applications with .net core and azure kubernetes service
data.description: With the latest version of .NET Core, its now easier than ever to build microservices and cloud native applications. In this demo-filled session, learn about the latest features, architecture, and support for building enterprise-grade solutions with C#, .NET Core, and Azure Kubernetes Service.

data.title: Cloud reliability: Behind the scenes
data.sortTitle: cloud reliability: behind the scenes
data.description: In this session learn how Microsoft is improving Azure reliability with techniques and automation to improve detection, response, recovery, and prevention of issues.

data.title: Cloud support is a team sport
data.sortTitle: cloud support is a team sport
data.description: Collaboration is a foundation of the modern workplace, and there’s no exception when it comes to getting help. Our support teams want to help you, but sometimes the questions we ask or data we gather may seem unnecessary. We look at common things support might ask when they’re working on a support case, discuss how we use the data and why we ask for it, and explain why timeliness is key to collaborating on cases. The more we work together effectively, the better we can help your organization’s users work together!

data.title: Clustering in the age of HCI and hybrid
data.sortTitle: clustering in the age of hci and hybrid
data.description: Top feature improvements for failover clustering including a sneak peek of new upcoming features. We even tackle our #1 pain point that should delight all.

data.title: Code-free ETL using Azure Data Factory and Data Share
data.sortTitle: code-free etl using azure data factory and data share
data.description: Customers face common data integration problems every day. This session showcases how to use Azure SQL Data Warehouse, Azure Data Factory, Azure Data Lake Store, Azure Databricks, Azure Key Vault, and other Azure services to create a variety of analytics data pipelines to do ETL/ELT. This session also showcases how you can use Azure Data Share to share data from any Azure regions and data stores in a simple and governed manner.

data.title: Collaborate with tasks in Office docs and Microsoft Planner
data.sortTitle: collaborate with tasks in office docs and microsoft planner
data.description: Learn how to track and manage your team's tasks from your shared Office documents within Microsoft Planner.

data.title: Collaboration on the go with the Microsoft Teams mobile app
data.sortTitle: collaboration on the go with the microsoft teams mobile app
data.description: With apps for both iOS and Android, Microsoft Teams offers you a truly mobile-first way of working and collaborating with your team. Whether you use mobile as a companion experience or as your primary communications app, Teams offers all the features you need to stay on top of your work, keep in touch with your team and be productive. Join us to learn about what’s new and coming soon as we look beyond the basics to light up uniquely mobile scenarios. We will show mobile-first and cross-device features and talk about how to get the most out of the mobile app.

data.title: Collaboration, engagement, and knowledge in the intelligent workplace
data.sortTitle: collaboration, engagement, and knowledge in the intelligent workplace
data.description: Microsoft 365 empowers individuals, teams, and organizations to be creative, collaborative, and effective with an integrated suite of experiences that are simple, superior, smart, and secure. Don't miss this session—always a highlight of Ignite—where Jeff Teper shares the latest innovations and solutions for content collaboration, employee engagement and communications, and knowledge management. Learn how the experiences in Microsoft 365—including SharePoint, OneDrive, Yammer, Stream, and Office—integrate to power collaboration and the intelligent workplace across devices, on the web, in desktop and mobile apps, and in the hub for teamwork, Microsoft Teams.

data.title: Common Data Model (CDM): All you need to know about CDM
data.sortTitle: common data model (cdm): all you need to know about cdm
data.description: The Common Data Model (CDM) is the shared data language used by business and analytics applications to provide semantic consistency and facilitate interoperability. It is an open-sourced metadata system that includes standard entities representing commonly used concepts and activities across a variety of business and application domains. This session provides a deeper insight into the concepts and components of the metadata system including how entities are modeled and our metadata components called traits.

data.title: Common Data Service with Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations
data.sortTitle: common data service with microsoft dynamics 365 finance and operations
data.description: You have seen how Field Service and Finance and Operations have worked together in the past, come learn about the new capability called synchronous data integration (formerly known as Dual Write) and how you can get near real-time bi-directional data sync between Customer Engagement and Finance and Operations.

data.title: Community powered continuous integration with GitHub Actions
data.sortTitle: community powered continuous integration with github actions
data.description: GitHub recently announced V2 of their powerful repository automation platform and they have now added full CI/CD capabilities hosted for you with everything you need to build and deploy to any cloud right from your project. In the session learn how to build and deploy directly from GitHub as well as how to make use of the amazing GitHub Actions community to automate your CI/CD process and even how to contribute back with your own actions.

data.title: Compromise is co$$$$tly! Detect account compromise early and stop the attackers in their tracks
data.sortTitle: compromise is co$$$$tly! detect account compromise early and stop the attackers in their tracks
data.description: Some of the most common attacks start with a phishing email. Attackers trick users into sharing their credentials and then use these accounts to laterally move inside the organization, gathering all the information they need to cause significant damage. With a majority of these attacks originating in the cloud, it’s more important than ever to quickly detect such a breach and flag it to security teams so that they can take appropriate actions and stop the attack in the trenches. Join us to learn how you can use a new security playbook in Office 365 ATP to automatically investigate and remediate compromised user accounts to avoid significant damages.

data.title: Configure Microsoft 365 devices for the best user experience and privacy with Microsoft Intune
data.sortTitle: configure microsoft 365 devices for the best user experience and privacy with microsoft intune
data.description: Learn how to use Microsoft Intune to configure Microsoft 365 devices to give end users the best and most productive experience, from local language settings to OneDrive known folders. Learn how you can configure the custom Windows 10 and Office 365 settings you use today with on-premises tools with Microsoft Intune.

data.title: Configuring office.com to work for your organization
data.sortTitle: configuring office.com to work for your organization
data.description: Eager to learn how your org can get the most out of office.com? Join us to learn to configure and customize office.com to work for you. You’ll see how to easily configure enterprise templates and branding, enable users to access your intranet from anywhere, and distribute and access 3rd party and LOB applications through office.com. We’ll also show you how end users can use intelligence to quickly find the tools, content, and help they need through intelligence in office.com.

data.title: Connect your workforce to all the apps they need with Azure Active Directory
data.sortTitle: connect your workforce to all the apps they need with azure active directory
data.description: You may have started using Azure Active Directory for managing access to Office or Azure, but did you know that you can use it to manage and secure all of your SaaS and on-premises apps? Come learn best practices for both our engineering teams and customers on single sign-on, app security, and cloud migration, as well as the latest on our ever-expanding partnerships and app integrations.

data.title: Connected field service and the Internet of Things
data.sortTitle: connected field service and the internet of things
data.description: Learn how to set up and maintain a truly connected field service organization leveraging Microsoft Dynamics 365 Field Service and Azure IOT Hub. Gain the knowledge required to leverage IoT in Field Service, and how to do it correctly across device commands, device monitoring, inventory device tracking

data.title: Connecting IAM and CASB for an end-to-end app security strategy
data.sortTitle: connecting iam and casb for an end-to-end app security strategy
data.description:
Standalone, identity and access management solutions protect access to your apps, and a Cloud Access Security Broker (CASB) provides discovery, threat, and information protection across them. Combining these two powerful solutions enables a deeper level of visibility and the ability to control user sessions in real-time.  

In this session we share how Azure Active Directory Conditional Access and Microsoft Cloud App Security uniquely integrate to provide actionable insights, an improved security posture, better threat detection, and adaptive access control to all apps, Microsoft and third-party, in your organization. We discuss some of the top use cases and demo how easy it is to deploy them.

data.title: Contact management in Microsoft Outlook
data.sortTitle: contact management in microsoft outlook
data.description: Managing contacts can be complicated, can't it? In this short and packed session we show you some of the best ways to stay connected with the people in your work and personal life using Contacts and tell you about the investments we are making to address your contact management pains. We share where the people and contact experience is headed in Outlook (with a particular focus on mobile users), and how we want to help you protect your personal and company data.

data.title: Content that delivers: Tips to create awesome SharePoint pages and news
data.sortTitle: content that delivers: tips to create awesome sharepoint pages and news
data.description: The intelligent intranet needs effective content - so your pages and news articles need to present information in a way that engages the reader and drives action and learning. This session showcases simple and practical tips to create great web pages and news posts. Learn techniques for layout and organization, and some tips and features to ensure that your news articles get read and your pages drive value.

data.title: Create amazing web apps with ASP.NET Core
data.sortTitle: create amazing web apps with asp.net core
data.description: ASP.NET Core 3.1 is coming in November, and we need to talk about the features that help you build amazing applications. Between gRPC, Blazor, SignalR updates and performance improvements, there’s a lot to discuss. Join Dan Roth as he shows you how to build an awesome application with the latest ASP.NET Core.

data.title: Create contextual and intelligent experiences with the Excel and Azure Platform
data.sortTitle: create contextual and intelligent experiences with the excel and azure platform
data.description: Use Office Add-ins with Office.js, leveraging the Azure platform to create both contextual and intelligent experiences and run them where you want. We share the latest with the Microsoft Excel platform, and highlight how you can leverage Azure services, such as Azure Functions, to create awesome experiences.

data.title: Create Linux apps from your Windows PC with Visual Studio Code
data.sortTitle: create linux apps from your windows pc with visual studio code
data.description: Visual Studio Code's remote development extensions enable you to develop and debug code in remote environments, including Linux-based environments like WSL and Docker. In this session, learn how to get set up to edit and debug web services running natively on Linux inside WSL as well as Docker, using Visual Studio Code on a Windows machine. Also, see how to extend this capability - working against a remote Linux VM hosted in Azure, while maintaining a snappy, local-feeling development experience!

data.title: Create sophisticated, enterprise-ready bots from your existing data, with no code using Azure Cognitive Services QnA Maker
data.sortTitle: create sophisticated, enterprise-ready bots from your existing data, with no code using azure cognitive services qna maker
data.description:
Have a lot of information on your websites or documents that your employees or your customers are struggling to search through? Want to create an easy way for them to get answers to their questions though natural language, via conversation? Don’t want to invest heavily in a team of developers/AI experts to build and manage your bot? We have the right solution for you.

QnA Maker is an Azure Cognitive Service that lets you build a conversational layer over your data, with very little effort, and zero code. The easy-to-use UI allows anybody to bootstrap a bot from a website, FAQ page, product manual or even a SharePoint doc. You can also add personality to it with a single click! With new features, you can create sophisticated multi-turn conversations, add custom synonyms, use active learning to improve your model and most importantly – do this for over 50 languages! Learn more about best practices for managing your data and information flows, through examples of customer success stories.

data.title: Create stunning 3D web experiences with Babylon.js
data.sortTitle: create stunning 3d web experiences with babylon.js
data.description: Are you interested in creating modern 3D interactive web experiences? In this session, Jason Carter presents how simple it is to create beautiful 3D experiences for the web, using Babylon.js – one of the world’s most popular open-source rendering engines. From creation to cross-platform deployment, learn how to leverage this feature-rich library to unlock the power of the GPU and add entirely new layers of interaction to your web experience!

data.title: Creating a model factory with automated machine learning
data.sortTitle: creating a model factory with automated machine learning
data.description: Artificial intelligence (AI) has become the hottest topic in tech. Executives, analysts, engineers, and developers all want to leverage the power of AI to gain better insights and make better predictions. While businesses are beginning to fully realize the potential of machine learning (ML), it requires advanced data science skills that are hard to come by. Automated ML is an emerging field that helps developers and new data scientists build machine learning models without understanding the complexity of algorithm selection and hyper parameter tuning. This session shows you how to train a high quality model with Azure Machine Learning automated machine learning capabilities, by supplying only a dataset and a few configuration parameters.

data.title: Creating enterprise grade conversational user experiences with virtual assistants
data.sortTitle: creating enterprise grade conversational user experiences with virtual assistants
data.description: This session walks you through how to use Composer and Virtual Assistant to create truly unique experiences for your users through numerous channels. See how to leverage each of these tools and be able to understand how to put the concepts into reality.

data.title: Customer story: How to achieve a secure and modern login experience with Microsoft Azure and Office 365
data.sortTitle: customer story: how to achieve a secure and modern login experience with microsoft azure and office 365
data.description:
John Hancock (Manulife), a top ten Azure consumer in financial services, is undergoing an IT modernization, moving workloads to Azure and Office 365, in order to deliver a secure, modern login experience for end users while ensuring compliance with SOX, HIPAA and others.  

In this case study session, Chafic Menayrji, Sr. Director of Global End User Technology Platforms at John Hancock, joins Brian Hymer from Quest to discuss risk management challenges during a move to the cloud. Discover business strategies and technical best practices for: 
•	Privileged account management and delegation
•	User self-service and provisioning  
•	Compliance auditing and forensic investigation
•	Business continuity and operational agility planning

data.title: Customizing images made easy for Linux on Azure with Azure Image Builder Service and Shared Image Gallery
data.sortTitle: customizing images made easy for linux on azure with azure image builder service and shared image gallery
data.description: Enterprises love to customize VM images to meet security and compliance needs and achieve faster deployment, but don't enjoy the process of determining the right tooling, building the right pipeline, and maintaining it continuously. Learn how Azure Image Builder and the Shared Image Gallery can streamline this process and accelerate your custom image creation.

data.title: Customizing Microsoft Teams EDU for your institution
data.sortTitle: customizing microsoft teams edu for your institution
data.description: In education, learning and teaching styles can vary, so do communication and collaboration styles. Join us as we go through the ways you can tailor Teams to suit various needs across your institution. From custom FAQ bots to third-party apps like Moodle, we show you how Teams can be customized for any group.

data.title: Data modelling and partitioning in Azure Cosmos DB: What every relational database user needs to know
data.sortTitle: data modelling and partitioning in azure cosmos db: what every relational database user needs to know
data.description: For many newcomers to Azure Cosmos DB, the learning process starts with data modeling and partitioning. How should I structure my data? When should I co-locate data in a single container? Should I de-normalize or normalize properties? What’s the best partition key for my model? In this demo-filled session, we discuss the strategies and thought process one should adopt for modeling and partitioning data effectively in Azure Cosmos DB. Using a real-world example, we explore Azure Cosmos DB key concepts—request units (RU), partitioning, and data modeling—and how their understanding guides the path to a data model that yields best performance and scalability. If you're familiar with relational databases, and want to dive into the non-relational world, this is the session for you.

data.title: Data reproducibility, audits, immediate rollbacks and other applications of time travel with Delta Lake in Azure Databricks
data.sortTitle: data reproducibility, audits, immediate rollbacks and other applications of time travel with delta lake in azure databricks
data.description: Time travel is now possible with Azure Databricks Delta Lake! We uncover how Delta Lake makes time travel possible and why it matters to you. Through presentation, notebooks, and code, we showcase several common applications and how they can improve your modern data engineering pipelines. Delta Lake is an open-source storage layer that brings ACID transactions to Apache Spark(TM). It provides snapshot isolation for concurrent read/writes. Enables efficient upserts, deletes, and immediate rollback capabilities. It allows background file optimization through compaction and z-order partitioning achieving up to 100x performance improvements. In this presentation, learn what challenges Delta Lake solves, how Delta Lake works under the hood, and applications of the new Delta Time Travel capability.

data.title: Data residency with Office 365 datacenters
data.sortTitle: data residency with office 365 datacenters
data.description: Data residency has become a hot topic, and organizations are implementing policies at an ever increasing rate. Join us to learn how Microsoft 365 customers can benefit from local or regional data residency of their Office 365 data to meet their global compliance commitments using 19 worldwide Office datacenter geos. You’ll leave with an understanding of where Office 365 data is stored on the Microsoft datacenter footprint, and how you can control its location on a per-user basis with Multi-Geo capabilities in Office 365.

data.title: Data virtualization with PolyBase in SQL Server 2019
data.sortTitle: data virtualization with polybase in sql server 2019
data.description: SQL Server has provided features like linked servers, replication, and integration services to integrate data from other data sources. SQL Server 2016 added PolyBase that provides data virtualization capabilities against data stored in Hadoop and Azure Blob Storage. In this session, learn about the improvements to PolyBase in SQL Server 2019 which allows you to extend the querying capability to data sources like SQL Server, Oracle, Teradata, MongoDB, and other data sources. You also get insights on the design, capabilities, and performance advantages of PolyBase.

data.title: Database modernization best practices and lessons learned
data.sortTitle: database modernization best practices and lessons learned
data.description: Are you interested in modernizing your database platform to achieve breakthrough performance, maintain security and compliance, and optimize your data infrastructure? In this session, we take a detailed look at the migration life cycle and modernization best practices. We share stories and learnings from customer who already migrated. We also cover most commonly seen migration blocking scenarios and demonstrate how our migration service can unlock your migration to Azure.

data.title: Debugging tips and tricks in Visual Studio 2019
data.sortTitle: debugging tips and tricks in visual studio 2019
data.description: Do you want to know how to debug your code faster? Tired of seeing printf() statements clutter your code? In this all-demo session, we explore almost every aspect of the Visual Studio debugger, from old features to new ones introduced in Visual Studio 2019. Whether you’re new to Visual Studio or have been using it for years, you’re sure to learn some cool tips and tricks about how to expedite, customize, and improve your debugging experience!

data.title: Deep dive into Azure Policy and Governance
data.sortTitle: deep dive into azure policy and governance
data.description: Azure provides a built-in set of tools that enables you to gain visibility and control across all your Azure resources. In this session, we go deep into how to apply these governance controls throughout your Azure environment using Azure Policy, and how to tailor it to your organization through Azure Management Groups and Azure Blueprints. In addition, we cover how you can leverage Azure Resource Graph to organize and manage your resources.

data.title: Deep dive on the new Microsoft Project
data.sortTitle: deep dive on the new microsoft project
data.description: Come learn all the details of the new Project experience. We go in depth on everything you need to know to help you successfully deliver your projects.

data.title: Deep dive with data migration tools and Azure Database Migration Service
data.sortTitle: deep dive with data migration tools and azure database migration service
data.description: In this session we take a detailed look at the database migration lifecycle and show you how Microsoft has made it easy to migrate SQL Server instances to Azure with near-zero downtime. We take a deep dive into database discovery, assessment and migration tools. Learn how to identify low-hanging fruit to migrate to Azure, determine the right Azure data target and size, and then migrate  using Azure Migrate, Data Migration Assistant (DMA), Azure Database Migration Service (DMS) and related tools. See how to perform migrations across your data estate through live demos.

data.title: Deep dive: Yammer compliance, security, and administration
data.sortTitle: deep dive: yammer compliance, security, and administration
data.description: Master the security and compliance tasks that ensure a successful Yammer implementation. In this deep dive, learn best practices for Yammer governance and management and get caught up on the latest Yammer security and compliance features and roadmap including local data residency and eDiscovery.

data.title: Delegate the scheduling of meetings to Scheduler and let AI help you
data.sortTitle: delegate the scheduling of meetings to scheduler and let ai help you
data.description: We've been working to create a digital assistant that can help you schedule meetings so there are no more back and forth emails. Learn how you can delegate the creation of your meetings to Scheduler. Scheduler uses natural language processing to understand your needs and negotiate an appropriate time with your invitees, find you a room, and add an online meeting.

data.title: Deliver highly available and secure web applications with Azure Application Gateway and Web Application Firewall (WAF)
data.sortTitle: deliver highly available and secure web applications with azure application gateway and web application firewall (waf)
data.description: Join us as we deep dive into layer 7 load balancing for modern web applications using Azure Application Gateway and Web Application Firewall (WAF). We cover new capabilities for configuring scalable and secure Ingress Controllers for your containerized applications on Azure AKS clusters, as well as WAF TLS policy advancements, which will dramatically increase your performance and customization options when securing your internet applications. We also walk through exciting new feature announcements and roadmap for the Application Gateway stack, targeting new scenarios for enterprise applications.

data.title: Delivering services privately in your VNet with Azure Private Link
data.sortTitle: delivering services privately in your vnet with azure private link
data.description: Private Link brings Azure services into your private virtual network (VNet). Not only can you map Azure PaaS services such as Azure Storage, Azure SQL Database, and Azure Cosmos DB in to your VNet, but also supported SaaS services and your own service in Azure. Service providers can also enable Private Link and render their offerings privately in customers' VNets. Private Link prevents data exposure to the public internet, simplifies network architecture and secures your endpoint connections, and keeps all traffic local to your VNet. Join us for a hands-on demo session on Azure Private Link and learn how you could leverage it for your needs.

data.title: Democratizing self-service data preparation within Microsoft Power BI, PowerApps and Flow using Dataflows
data.sortTitle: democratizing self-service data preparation within microsoft power bi, powerapps and flow using dataflows
data.description: Preparing and defining ETL for insights is a significant challenge for businesses today — ingestion, cleansing, transformation, and enrichment are labor-intensive and time-consuming tasks which require deep technical skills. Microsoft has recently introduced advanced data prep with dataflows for the Power Platform, a suite of self-service low-code/no-code features and capabilities for business analysts and citizen developers to easily process and unify their data and store it in Azure-based data-lake storage. With these new capabilities, Microsoft offers a solution for any business need — whether you want to prep your data with ease, using a familiar built-in Power Query experience, or leverage the full Azure stack for more advanced use-cases. Join this session to learn everything you need to know about dataflows and how to easily prep your data, leverage Microsoft’s standardized schema (CDM), improve time-to-value, eliminate data silos, and create one source of truth for your organizational insights.

data.title: Democratizing the data lake with the next generation of Azure analytics
data.sortTitle: democratizing the data lake with the next generation of azure analytics
data.description: Limited access to exploring data in data lakes has historically limited the value businesses can gain from their data. By democratizing access to the data lake with a series of improvements to the modern data warehouse pattern, we're enabling analytics and exploration over more data than ever before. Join this session to learn how to simplify your analytics pipeline and focus on uncovering meaningful insights over all your data.

data.title: Demystifying Microsoft Information Protection solutions: A panel discussion with the product experts
data.sortTitle: demystifying microsoft information protection solutions: a panel discussion with the product experts
data.description: Join us for an open discussion as we tackle the most common questions, myths and concerns related to Microsoft Information Protection solutions. With all the recent advancements and updates to sensitive data discovery, classification, labeling and protection, we know it can be hard to stay on top of how capabilities work together, what's coming in the future and key considerations you should evaluate in your deployment strategy. Come prepared with your questions!

data.title: Deploy an app in Azure Kubernetes and App Services with MySQL
data.sortTitle: deploy an app in azure kubernetes and app services with mysql
data.description: Come and join us to see how easy it is to quickly deploy a web scale application leveraging the tight integration between Azure Kubernetes Service, Azure Database for MySQL, App Services, and Azure Database for MySQL. We share tips and tricks for how to get the best performance and most secure setup for your applications.

data.title: Deploy apps to Kubernetes using CI/CD in 20 minutes
data.sortTitle: deploy apps to kubernetes using ci/cd in 20 minutes
data.description: With 20 minutes on the clock, can you go from code in a Git repo, to containers running on a Kubernetes cluster, all while following some best practices? Join this demo-driven session to see how you can use Azure Pipelines to create your build and release pipelines as code, build containers and deploy them to Azure Kubernetes Service.

data.title: Deploy Office 365 groups at scale to power Microsoft Teams, Outlook, Yammer, and SharePoint
data.sortTitle: deploy office 365 groups at scale to power microsoft teams, outlook, yammer, and sharepoint
data.description: Curious how companies like yours successfully manage Office 365 groups to drive teamwork apps adoption and usage? Learn how you can be the hero in your organization by using best practices from organizations worldwide and across industries. See real-world examples of how to use Office 365 groups to support security and data governance; reporting and automated workflows to align business processes; and scale through self-service and support.

data.title: Deploy SQL Server 2019 big data cluster using Azure Data Studio
data.sortTitle: deploy sql server 2019 big data cluster using azure data studio
data.description: In this session we discuss the deployment options for SQL Server 2019 big data clusters, walk through the deployment workflow using Azure Data Studio, and help you understand the various configuration settings.

data.title: Deploying a modern data warehouse in just few clicks
data.sortTitle: deploying a modern data warehouse in just few clicks
data.description: Historically, building an analytics pipeline was a complicated and disjointed process, involving data, technologies, and people from across a business. But, with new improvements to the modern data warehouse pattern, building an end-to-end data pipeline is simpler than ever. We dive into how recent updates make it simpler to ingest, prep, model, and serve data in Azure. It's never been easier to build a modern data warehouse solution in Azure!

data.title: Deploying and A/B testing without risks with deployment slots
data.sortTitle: deploying and a/b testing without risks with deployment slots
data.description: Who hasn’t been scared when deploying a new feature to a website? Sometimes we feel that we will break everything, and the stress level is just not something we want to experience ever again. That's why the deployment slots feature of Azure App Services is such a nice experience. With deployment slots, you can deploy to a safe slot in the same conditions as your production environment. You can test in isolation, without risking breaking something. Then you can gradually route some of the traffic to the new features, for example to perform A/B testing. When you are satisfied with the results, you can simply switch the whole traffic to the new site. But don't fret, if something goes wrong, the old, safe site is just one mouse click away.
learningPath: Developer	Modernizing Data, Applications, and APIs to the Cloud

data.title: Deploying Microsoft 365? FastTrack can help you do it securely
data.sortTitle: deploying microsoft 365? fasttrack can help you do it securely
data.description: In this session, we look at how FastTrack can help you leverage the security-focused features of Microsoft 365. Come hear about tips and resources that can help you securely deploy Microsoft 365.

data.title: Detecting cloud native attacks and automating remediation
data.sortTitle: detecting cloud native attacks and automating remediation
data.description:
As the number of cloud-native attacks that no longer cross into the traditional perimeter of IT continues to increase, it’s increasingly important to focus on correlated detections across your cloud apps.

In this session we cover a breadth of unique cloud threat detections that we’ve built into Microsoft’s CASB such as suspicious mail forwarding rules, risky OAuth apps and malware detection. Then, we show you how you can easily automate remediation with custom workflows, using the systems of your choice.

data.title: Develop great workspaces with the Microsoft Teams platform: What’s new and what’s coming
data.sortTitle: develop great workspaces with the microsoft teams platform: what’s new and what’s coming
data.description: Join this session to learn what's new and next for creating great team workspaces in Microsoft Teams. Even from the first preview, Microsoft Teams has been designed to be extended by developers, so that every facet of the Teams experience can be custom-tailored to fit the teams that use it. From extensible tabs to compose extensions to bots, discover the many ways you can extend Teams, including new capabilities and updates. See best-practice examples from the hundreds of apps built for Teams with takeaways for every type of Teams developer scenario.

data.title: Developers guide to AI: A data story
data.sortTitle: developers guide to ai: a data story
data.description: In this theater session, we show the data science process and how to apply it. From exploration of datasets to deployment of services - all applied to an interesting data story. We also take you on a very brief tour of the Azure AI platform.

data.title: Developing richer Microsoft 365 employee profiles through Microsoft Graph
data.sortTitle: developing richer microsoft 365 employee profiles through microsoft graph
data.description: Are your users frustrated it takes too long to find someone who can help them with a simple question? Do you need to find that one person who knows that obscure process inside your organization? Perhaps a quick translation of something from Norwegian to English would speed things up? In this session, learn about the new Profile API and people schema on Microsoft Graph and how to develop rich employee profiles within your organization using them. Discover how using the semantic depth in the schema makes it possible to model and surface the depth of a user’s knowledge in addition to the breadth of it.

data.title: Developing secure applications in Azure
data.sortTitle: developing secure applications in azure
data.description: Security is everyone's responsibility and as a developer, it is critical that the code you write is secure, sensitive data is stored securely and not exposed to attack, and your applications are protected. In this session, we explore several Azure application scenarios and the DevSecOps principles and best practices you should apply to secure them. Join this session to get familiar with the services, tools, and methodologies to build secure applications on Azure.

data.title: Developing with the Fluid Framework
data.sortTitle: developing with the fluid framework
data.description: Learn about the Fluid Framework, a technology for building a new class of shared, interactive experiences on the web. This session goes into the details of the Fluid architecture and platform. This includes how Fluid can power high performance, low latency distributed applications, Fluid’s componentized document model that allows content to be re-used across application as collaborative building blocks, and intelligent agents that can work alongside humans to translate text, fetch content, suggest edits, perform compliance checks, and much more.

data.title: Digital transformation using Office 365: How key customers used O365 features to work more effectively together plus learn what’s new in Word, Excel and PowerPoint
data.sortTitle: digital transformation using office 365: how key customers used o365 features to work more effectively together plus learn what’s new in word, excel and powerpoint
data.description:
See how Office 365 can tackle real world scenarios with our intelligence features. Get a document started (Designer/Ideas), collaborate with colleagues and follow-up on tasks you craft for yourself our others. Come hear from Microsoft customers on how these new collaboration and intelligence features have helped their organizations be more productive.
 
We will also highlight some new features that will help you work smarter with analytics,  intelligence, modern inputs and collaboration features. Learn how to enable those in your workforce with our new features in the Office apps.

data.title: Discover Azure Stack HCI
data.sortTitle: discover azure stack hci
data.description: Discover the newest member of the Microsoft Azure Stack family: Azure Stack HCI. Hyperconverged infrastructure (HCI) is an exciting opportunity for IT – the next big wave of cloud-inspired innovation and consolidation. Use Azure Stack HCI to run virtual machines on premises flexibly and efficiently with familiar tools. This session presents the high-level solution architecture and describes key features that can help meet your business needs, whether that’s securing your datacenter, modernizing your branch offices or retail stores, accelerating performance for mission-critical databases, or just replacing an aging storage array to lower costs. Keywords: Hyper-V, Storage Spaces Direct, Software Defined Networking (SDN), Windows Admin Center.

data.title: Discover how a large Fortune 500 customer used workplace intelligence to drive digital transformation (customer panel)
data.sortTitle: discover how a large fortune 500 customer used workplace intelligence to drive digital transformation (customer panel)
data.description: When a large Fortune 500 company recognized that they were becoming too bureaucratic, they used Microsoft Workplace Analytics to diagnose the root causes and identify the opportunity to address these problems. Using the data-driven insights, the company was able to quantify the collaboration across the company aligned with day-to-day routines and with key processes and projects, and enabled the management to implement effective changes. A roll-out of MyAnalytics empowered employees to change their personal way of working. As a result, the company from the top management to individual employee, changed their ways of working, which led to more efficient processing, more effective collaboration, and higher levels of workplace satisfaction.

data.title: Discover shadow IT across all your SaaS, IaaS, and PaaS resources
data.sortTitle: discover shadow it across all your saas, iaas, and paas resources
data.description:
Our data shows an average of 1,000 cloud apps are used in enterprises today, while an increasing amount of PaaS adoption is driven by developers without IT oversight. In this session, we show you how Microsoft's Cloud Access Security Broker (CASB) enables you to discover all shadow IT in your organization across SaaS, PaaS, and IaaS resources, assess the risks, and control future access.

We cover available deployment options from secure web gateways to our unique integration with Microsoft Defender ATP, which provides the only endpoint-CASB capability on the market.

data.title: Discover, classify, and report on sensitive data with Rubrik Sonar
data.sortTitle: discover, classify, and report on sensitive data with rubrik sonar
data.description:
The amount of data being generated in data center and cloud locations continues to grow minute by minute. And while most administrators are focused on providing capacity and performance necessary to keep applications online, other concerns around data classification and governance arise. Data privacy regulations and data security provisions for safeguarding data - such as HIPPA, GDPR, and PCI DSS - are requiring massive amounts of focus and energy for compliance and auditing.

This session discusses the ability to discover, classify, and report on sensitive data without impacting your production environment with the newly released Rubrik Sonar.

data.title: Discovering the end-to-end Linux on Azure experience
data.sortTitle: discovering the end-to-end linux on azure experience
data.description: Learn from the Azure product team how we’re streamlining and securing your Linux migration to the cloud. In this session, we cover our investments in Linux on Azure, including tools you can leverage to migrate, deploy, and manage your Linux infrastructure on Azure. Using Red Hat, we illustrate these steps with live demos and best practices sharing.

data.title: Do more with Advanced eDiscovery: Custodian communications, working sets, and review
data.sortTitle: do more with advanced ediscovery: custodian communications, working sets, and review
data.description: Learn about expanded capabilities to complete more of common investigation and discovery workflows right within Microsoft 365.

data.title: Do more with your data from edge to cloud using Data Box Edge
data.sortTitle: do more with your data from edge to cloud using data box edge
data.description: Managing your business across multiple locations? Come learn how you can utilize Data Box Edge for intelligent edge and hybrid applications that interact with local data and devices to deliver fast results, and then aggregate that data in the cloud to perform deeper and cross location analytics.

data.title: Driving demand for digital process automation with Nintex and Microsoft
data.sortTitle: driving demand for digital process automation with nintex and microsoft
data.description: Nintex and Microsoft together can help you kickstart and accelerate your digital transformation journey. Come hear how a Fortune 500 Financial Services customer leveraged Nintex and Microsoft together to drive internal demand for digital process automation and track ROI across their businesses.

data.title: Driving end user adoption with partner services
data.sortTitle: driving end user adoption with partner services
data.description: End user adoption is critical to meet business objectives of a project, however you may not have all the skills or bandwidth to achieve desired results. Partners have deep experience with adoption and change management and can provide valuable services from advisory, coaching, training, to staff augmentation to ensure project success.

data.title: Driving engineering culture change at Microsoft: An experimental journey
data.sortTitle: driving engineering culture change at microsoft: an experimental journey
data.description: A high-performance culture is critical to a company’s success - leading to higher rates of innovation, customer delight and employee satisfaction. But how do you achieve this in a company as large and diverse as Microsoft? How do you steer hundreds of engineering teams, of all shapes and sizes, with varying levels of process maturity, toward a more DevOps-centric, agile engineering culture? In this session, Cindy Alvarez, a leader in the One Engineering System (1ES) team shares how Microsoft approaches culture change as well as learnings from her team's journey to help internal teams become high performing teams.

data.title: Driving Microsoft Surface adoption in healthcare
data.sortTitle: driving microsoft surface adoption in healthcare
data.description: Surface has become a critical part of the device adoption in healthcare with many of our payers and providers quickly taking advantage of the new sleeker and more modern device solutions. Join us as we take you on a journey and share with you how these strategies have been implemented and continue to mature in the healthcare arena. Learn more about how these innovative solutions can be adopted in your organization.

data.title: Driving retail and manufacturing industry transformation with SAP on Azure
data.sortTitle: driving retail and manufacturing industry transformation with sap on azure
data.description: Join us to hear customer stories illustrating "Why SAP on Azure in retail and manufacturing." Come learn why SAP on Azure can simplify your E2E sales process and deliver valuable insights to your connected factory environment.

data.title: Efficiently review communication contents with intelligent insights
data.sortTitle: efficiently review communication contents with intelligent insights
data.description: Learn how to refine email and Microsoft Teams contents with intelligent conditions, sensitive information types, inclusions and exclusions with ability to tag and comment. You can review experience built into Compliance Center with full reporting and audit capabilities.

data.title: Eliminate your weakest link with passwordless authentication
data.sortTitle: eliminate your weakest link with passwordless authentication
data.description: The era of passwords is over. Learn about how to start using and deploying the Microsoft suite of passwordless solutions that can help you provide secure options for your users to help protect your company from password spray, phishing and other attacks and eliminate passwords as your weakest link. Join the millions of users of FIDO2, Windows Hello, and Microsoft Authenticator in conjunction with Azure Active Directory that have made passwords a relic of the past.

data.title: Embrace Office 365 Groups: What's new and what's next
data.sortTitle: embrace office 365 groups: what's new and what's next
data.description: Office 365 Groups is the membership service that drives teamwork across Microsoft 365. It’s a core underpinning of Microsoft Teams, SharePoint, Outlook, Microsoft Power BI, Microsoft Dynamics CRM, and many other applications. In this session, learn the fundamentals and new innovations in Office 365 Groups, including management and governance at scale, best practices for driving usage and adoption, and self-service. We also share the Office 365 Groups roadmap with you – and how coming investments will help you drive new levels of collaboration.

data.title: Employees are taking data when they quit
data.sortTitle: employees are taking data when they quit
data.description: Recent studies report that 90% of insider data loss, leak, and theft goes undetected internally. Even worse, 60% of departing employees admit to taking data when they leave their job. Attend this session from Rob Juncker, SVP, Product, Research, Operations, and Dev at Code42, to explore risks affecting organization’s data today and why IT and security teams need to focus on the employee offboarding workflow to protect company IP when employees and contractors quit.

data.title: Empower your firstline workforce with Microsoft Teams
data.sortTitle: empower your firstline workforce with microsoft teams
data.description: From streamlining shift management to simplifying inventory processes, Microsoft Teams can help your firstline workers be more productive so they can spend more time assisting customers. Learn how Teams is transforming productivity and teamwork in the retail industry.

data.title: Enable technology that supports your field service organization in delivering connected and proactive field service
data.sortTitle: enable technology that supports your field service organization in delivering connected and proactive field service
data.description: Are you aware of all of the technologies that can support your field service organization in delivering the best experiences? In this session, learn how you can adopt and enable the cutting edge technologies that are fostering a new breed of field engineers. Across asset management, device management, technician empowerment with new communication tools, and the ability for you to leverage mixed reality to improve first-time fix rates.

data.title: End to end security for IoT
data.sortTitle: end to end security for iot
data.description: Join us in this theater session to discover how you can implement end-to-end security for your IoT solution: from your devices to edge and to IoT Hub. Monitor the health of your IoT devices in near real time and block compromised devices with Azure IoT Hub. Find and eliminate threats and manage your security posture including IoT with Azure Security Center.

data.title: End user training: Microsoft 365 learning pathways demo
data.sortTitle: end user training: microsoft 365 learning pathways demo
data.description: Microsoft is providing customers with a free customizable, on-demand training solution designed to increase usage and adoption of Microsoft 365 services in your organization. See this hands-on demo to download, configure, and roll out your own in-house training portal. Learn how to customize the training assets available to your employees, create your own custom playlists, or install our custom web part into your own training portal. Let the learning begin!

data.title: Engaging leaders and employees on Yammer
data.sortTitle: engaging leaders and employees on yammer
data.description: This session provides both the strategy and tools needed to supercharge engagement on Yammer and remove the distance between leadership and their modern, global workforce. Understand how to use Yammer to drive employee participation, address issues, and take important steps towards reaching company initiatives. Learn the components of a modern leadership engagement environment using Yammer, SharePoint, Microsoft Stream, and live events.

data.title: Enhance performance with AIOps in Azure
data.sortTitle: enhance performance with aiops in azure
data.description: Enterprises are using AI for IT operations (AIOps) to enhance or replace application and network performance monitoring and other diagnostics tools. Azure has been using AI/ML to strengthen the resiliency of its infrastructure in a way that is transparent to its users, and we want to share these best practices with you. Join us to discover how Microsoft has been using AIOps in Azure to improve the overall customer experience.

data.title: Enterprise AI scenarios for speech, technical edition
data.sortTitle: enterprise ai scenarios for speech, technical edition
data.description: Microsoft Azure Speech delivered remarkable service enhancements over the past year with industry-leading Neural Speech Synthesis. In this session, learn about our new features in real time and batch speech processing, enhancements to customize speech recognition for enterprise, deploying speech services on-premises using Docker containers, audio content generation, and much more. We also cover how to get started utilizing our speech stack to enable your speech scenarios such as call center automation and intelligent transcription.

data.title: Enterprise-grade Node.js on Azure
data.sortTitle: enterprise-grade node.js on azure
data.description: Node.js is a scalable JavaScript server runtime with a huge ecosystem of open source packages and a variety of front-end frameworks, like Angular, React, and Vue to build web apps. We explore an application using MongoDB, express, Angular and Node.js (MEAN stack) and how to debug it, use new Node.js SDKs for cloud data with Azure Cosmos DB, and deploy to the cloud with Docker on Azure App Service. Learn how Visual Studio Code, Microsoft's cross-platform editor, supercharges your productivity, including debugging front-end and server-side code, deploying, and even debugging remotely.

data.title: Enterprise-ready PDF solution in Microsoft Edge
data.sortTitle: enterprise-ready pdf solution in microsoft edge
data.description: Learn about doc signing, MIP, ink on PDF, and more PDF features built into Microsoft Edge that’ll force you to rethink the need for another PDF software.

data.title: Event-based automation across hybrid environments using PowerShell in Azure Functions
data.sortTitle: event-based automation across hybrid environments using powershell in azure functions
data.description: As customers start to move their workloads to the cloud, it becomes important to deliver a consistent automation solution that works against your existing infrastructure and management systems, both on-premises and in Azure. In this session, we discuss the just released support for PowerShell in Azure Functions and how this can be used to deliver event-based automation by seamlessly connecting to on-premises systems and those deployed in Azure. Learn how to bring your existing PowerShell knowledge to the cloud and take advantage of PowerShell 6, as well as best practices on architecture and solutions to successfully deliver on-demand services through automation.

data.title: Every team, connected: Develop Microsoft Teams apps with Microsoft Graph
data.sortTitle: every team, connected: develop microsoft teams apps with microsoft graph
data.description: The Microsoft Teams Graph APIs have grown considerably over the past year with many new APIs and types for Teams.  With team channel chat APIs, integrate Teams conversation experiences into your apps. Find out how to provision focused Teams experiences to every team in your organization, including managing the set of apps deployed to Teams.  Connect to the backing information behind every team, including files, plans, notes, and more.  This session shows how you can tightly connect to every facet of a team, and with several updates, see new ways for managing Teams applications that make it easier to distribute your apps and get them used.

data.title: Everyone is hackable. How long will it take you to notice?
data.sortTitle: everyone is hackable. how long will it take you to notice?
data.description:
Even with the best cloud security team, solutions, and best practices, you’re not bullet-proof. There are so many perimeters and attack vectors, it’s not a question of IF, but WHEN.
You’re unable to prevent every threat; you need to invest in detection as well. 

Once you’re hacked, it’s a matter of time. How fast can you detect the attack, analyze the vector, and remediate the incident to minimize damage?

Shira Shamban, threat intelligence expert and cloud security researcher at Check Point, shares, post-mortem, a real-world hack and how it may have been avoided. She explains the challenges of threat detection and how to turn your logs into super-logs, which are then used by ML algorithms to automatically protect you.

data.title: Experience more immersive meeting rooms with AI on Jabra PanaCast
data.sortTitle: experience more immersive meeting rooms with ai on jabra panacast
data.description:
The Jabra PanaCast is a plug-and-play camera certified for Microsoft Teams. Designed to improve meetings in huddle rooms by using three 13-megapixel cameras and patented real-time video stitching, it gives a full panoramic 180° view so users can enjoy a natural, inclusive human perspective, with no blind spots.

Come learn more about how the Jabra PanaCast AI includes object and facial recognition, whiteboard content capturing, intelligent zoom, and more.

data.title: Exploring the future of Windows with the Insider Program
data.sortTitle: exploring the future of windows with the insider program
data.description: “Where is the roadmap for new Windows and Office features?!?” -askes every IT professional and Enterprise Dev ever. Well, wish no more! In this session, you’ll hear from senior engineers working on Windows what is coming next and how you can use the Windows Insider Programs so your organization is prepared for it. We’ll show you how to get a head start on that next update and be ready to take advantage of all the new features at Ignite the day they’re available.

data.title: Extend the power of sensitivity labeling and protection to your own apps and ISV solutions with the Microsoft Information Protection (MIP) SDK
data.sortTitle: extend the power of sensitivity labeling and protection to your own apps and isv solutions with the microsoft information protection (mip) sdk
data.description: Learn how you can utilize the Information Protection developer platform to help you better secure your sensitive data with classification, labeling, and protection - and migrate faster to the Microsoft cloud. We showcase some of the latest integrations as examples of how these solutions help give customers more comprehensive protection of sensitive information.

data.title: Extending Azure Resource Manager (ARM), Azure's control plane
data.sortTitle: extending azure resource manager (arm), azure's control plane
data.description: Are you an enterprise that wants to transform how your teams consume and configure your own internal services, as well as partner offerings and Azure services? Or, are you a partner that wants to bring an existing or new SaaS solution to Azure? Do you have existing applications running on-premises which you want to manage through the cloud? In this session we discuss all the ways to customize and extend Azure Resource Manager (ARM) - Azure's control plane - including a new way to build resource providers, ways to create custom resources and ways to package applications so they can be offered as a service. Learn how you can build an Azure consistent service with minimal investment and get all the native Azure platform benefits like policy, granular authorization, tags, activity logs, portal experiences, and custom usage metering and billing similar to other Azure services.

data.title: Extending data classification, labeling, and protection to Microsoft Power BI to better secure your sensitive data
data.sortTitle: extending data classification, labeling, and protection to microsoft power bi to better secure your sensitive data
data.description: We recently announced the ability to apply sensitivity labels to Power BI artifacts to better protect dashboards, reports, and outputs. Come and see these new capabilities in action.

data.title: Extending data classification, labeling, and protection to SharePoint Online to better secure your sensitive data
data.sortTitle: extending data classification, labeling, and protection to sharepoint online to better secure your sensitive data
data.description: In this session, we give you the quick highlights of the latest information protection capabilities that can help you better protect your sensitive data in SharePoint.

data.title: Extending the new Microsoft Project with the Power Platform
data.sortTitle: extending the new microsoft project with the power platform
data.description: Learn how to work with Project data in the Microsoft Common Data Service. We show you how the Microsoft Power Platform enables you to quickly and easily create and deliver solutions for your organization.

data.title: External file sharing in Microsoft 365
data.sortTitle: external file sharing in microsoft 365
data.description: Microsoft 365 provides a rich set of solutions for collaborating with users both inside and outside of your organization. This session offers an in-depth look at existing and brand-new external sharing capabilities. Learn best practices for configuring external sharing and educating users on how to best leverage Microsoft Teams, SharePoint and OneDrive for collaborating with others.

data.title: FastTrack data migration services: How we can help
data.sortTitle: fasttrack data migration services: how we can help
data.description: Come to this session to hear how FastTrack can help make data migration easier while moving to Microsoft 365. Learn how we can help you to securely and successfully migrate your email and file share data to Microsoft Exchange Online, SharePoint Online, and OneDrive for Business.

data.title: Files are critical to your business: Modernize your file services with Windows Server 2019 and Azure
data.sortTitle: files are critical to your business: modernize your file services with windows server 2019 and azure
data.description: Organizations run on files - strip away the operating systems, user software, clouds, and vendor solutions and files are the whole point of IT. Learn how to migrate from legacy file servers to modern Windows Server 2019 and Microsoft Azure. Get a sneak peek into the new features, management, and security options coming to services like SMB, Storage Replica, and NFS. Watch Ned yell about SMB1 then give out lots of swag!

data.title: Find that needle in the haystack: Identifying and investigating compromised users and suspicious activities at the hybrid organization
data.sortTitle: find that needle in the haystack: identifying and investigating compromised users and suspicious activities at the hybrid organization
data.description: When an attacker compromises a single identity in the cloud, they can easily pivot to on-premises in order to laterally move and establish domain dominance. This session is a great opportunity to learn why identity security is paramount for any organization and what you can easily do to reduce the identity attack surface and monitor for suspicious activities. This session outlines the importance of identity security and why organizations need to prepare for the hybrid attack, when malicious actors move from cloud applications and then pivot to on-premises, where often companies keep their most precious information.

data.title: Finding your collaboration sweet spot with Office 365 Groups, SharePoint, Teams, and Yammer
data.sortTitle: finding your collaboration sweet spot with office 365 groups, sharepoint, teams, and yammer
data.description: You may be counting the cost of migrating enterprise employee collaboration into Office 365. In this session, find out how one company approached migrating a platform with 1.5 million pieces of content, 30,000 users and 1.5M monthly activities into Office 365. Get a behind-the-scenes look into how Office 365 Groups, SharePoint, Microsoft Teams, and Yammer work together to provide a global collaboration platform. We also dive into the technical details and best practices of migrating, architecture, deployment, and change management and feature real-life examples of project planning, education, and training artifacts, as well as a live demo of how these products can be extended and customized for success.

data.title: Five enterprises transformed by computer vision on the cloud and at the edge
data.sortTitle: five enterprises transformed by computer vision on the cloud and at the edge
data.description: Manufacturing, media, finance - these are just a few of the industries being transformed by the application of state-of-the-art computer vision. In this session we demonstrate how key technical advances are generating business value for customers with Azure AI, robotic process automation, and mixed reality.

data.title: Five hybrid cloud backup and disaster recovery mistakes to avoid
data.sortTitle: five hybrid cloud backup and disaster recovery mistakes to avoid
data.description: Protecting and backing up your data across a hybrid cloud environment is not an easy task.  Learn about the top pitfalls and mistakes to avoid if you are backing up your on-premises Windows and Hyper-V environments to Azure or protecting your Azure VMs or cloud-native workloads. Further, learn how progressive organizations are using Cohesity’s backup and data management software to redefine success for backup, archiving, and disaster recovery on Azure.

data.title: From CEO to Microsoft Regional Director: My journey as a woman in tech from Algeria
data.sortTitle: from ceo to microsoft regional director: my journey as a woman in tech from algeria
data.description: The journey of a woman in technology is certainly a challenging one – even more so in countries like Algeria where women continue to be vastly underrepresented in tech. Come hear from Ouafa Benterki, CEO and Founder of MTY Intelligent Software in Algeria, who was recently recognized as a Microsoft Regional Director – the first person in Algeria as well as the first Arab and African woman to be awarded this honor. That road to success was a long and arduous one where she faced many obstacles and difficulties along the way, fueled only by her passion for technology. Join this session to learn how she transformed obstacles into opportunities, and how a growth mindset ultimately helped her to achieve her goals.

data.title: From IT pros to heroes with Azure DevTest Labs
data.sortTitle: from it pros to heroes with azure devtest labs
data.description: Would you like to enable intuitive but controlled Dev and Test workflows for your developers? To enable your enterprise take advantage of cloud computing, the first step is to provision developer and test environments to all the engineering teams – the trick is how to do this in a fast and self-service but also cost-predictable, secure and safe way without introducing too much work and overhead. Learn how the IT orgs of our existing customers like Shell, Hexagon, and Daimler are using Azure DevTest Labs to create dev and test environments in Azure while enabling IT to minimize waste and control costs through a set of lab policies, Azure policies, schedules, Azure DevOps tasks, cost management, etc.

data.title: Future of work: Workforce evolution and human cloud
data.sortTitle: future of work: workforce evolution and human cloud
data.description: Advancements in technology over the past decade have resulted in a highly connected world that transmits more data at a faster pace than ever before. As business environments become more complex, leaders must adopt a more forward-thinking approach to adapt to a highly dynamic business environment. Implementing new technology is only part of the foundation for the future: company operations and organizational models must also evolve to make this happen. Organizations have been forced to find new ways to invest in their workforce, increase innovation, enhance collaboration, and manage their operations to adjust to a more competitive landscape. In this session we share the results of a study conducted in partnership with Harvard Business Review highlighting advancements in technology that will shape the modern workplace for the future. In addition, we dive deep into one aspect of the future of work – the race for global talent and the gig economy. This session shares Microsoft’s perspective on how to leverage technology to stay competitive.

data.title: GA launch of IPv6 for Azure VNETs
data.sortTitle: ga launch of ipv6 for azure vnets
data.description: Mobility, Internet of Things, enterprises with dwindling IPv4 reserves...they all need IPv6.   And now, Azure has it- a feature set that leapfrogs our competitors enabling full-fledged dual stack (IPv4+IPv6) architectures to be hosted globally in Azure and readily connected to on-premises networks. Join us for details...you won't want to miss the "IPv6 Party Tricks" slide to amaze your friends.

data.title: Gain fine-grained access controls of your administrative roles with Azure Active Directory custom roles
data.sortTitle: gain fine-grained access controls of your administrative roles with azure active directory custom roles
data.description: Learn how to control access to Azure Active Directory using Azure AD administrative roles, including capabilities like custom RBAC controls, and see what's coming for future access control capabilities.

data.title: Gaining business insights with open source analytics on Azure HDInsight: Patterns and best practices
data.sortTitle: gaining business insights with open source analytics on azure hdinsight: patterns and best practices
data.description: Azure HDInsight is an enterprise-ready managed platform for running the most popular open source analytics frameworks in the cloud. Join us and learn about the latest innovations in this space. We dive deep in to the HDInsight platform including security, cluster reliability, and monitoring. We discuss how to pick the right open source analytics framework, storage solution, or ISV application. We share the common patterns and best practices, based upon real-world use cases, with which you can put together secure, performant, and cost efficient big data analytics pipelines. Finally, we share our roadmap to better prepare for addressing emerging customer scenarios.

data.title: Gaining visibility into your company's data estate with Azure Data Catalog
data.sortTitle: gaining visibility into your company's data estate with azure data catalog
data.description: As customers embark on their modern data warehouse and analytics projects, they need to have better visibility into the data across their data estate. This session showcases improvements to Azure Data Catalog and dives into how customers can discover and gain more insight into their data. Come learn about the new features and capabilities in Azure Data Catalog, and how you can use them to ensure your company has a complete picture of your entire data estate.

data.title: Get a robust foundation on your cloud platform with proper governance practices
data.sortTitle: get a robust foundation on your cloud platform with proper governance practices
data.description: The most important activity a customer does when leveraging cloud is to set up a robust foundation and governance in place for current needs and future evolution. The experience of FastTrack for Azure engineers and PMs who have enabled thousands of customers through this stage are captured as best practices in the Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure blueprints. Hear from the engineer and PM who curated these blueprints with customers who benefited from leveraging it.

data.title: Get ahead with Outlook mobile: Intelligent technology that helps you stay on top of your day
data.sortTitle: get ahead with outlook mobile: intelligent technology that helps you stay on top of your day
data.description: From integration with Microsoft Teams to AI driven ways to engage with your inbox, come learn about the brand-new capabilities only available with Outlook for iOS and Android and get a sneak peek into what's next.

data.title: Get instant value from your SIEM: Best practices for Azure Sentinel
data.sortTitle: get instant value from your siem: best practices for azure sentinel
data.description: This session deep dives into the steps to get Azure Sentinel, Microsoft’s cloud-native SIEM solution, up and running quickly. We share workspace and data collection options, architecture, and best practices. Next, learn how to leverage built-in analytics to quickly enable alerting on your data. Lastly, we show you how to start automating response with SOAR capabilities.

data.title: Get more done with Microsoft Planner
data.sortTitle: get more done with microsoft planner
data.description: Microsoft Planner can help your team manage work and deliver great results. Whether you are new to Planner or consider yourself an expert, learn how to use Planner and find out more about recent new enhancements such as “Export to Excel” and “To-Do integration.” Also, in this session, we share more about the future roadmap for Planner.

data.title: Get more done with Windows Admin Center third-party extensions
data.sortTitle: get more done with windows admin center third-party extensions
data.description: Learn how to make the most out of Windows Admin Center with extensions for managing server hardware, storage devices, third-party applications and more from partners like Dell EMC, Lenovo, Pure Storage and Squared Up. Also, get a first peek at new extensions under development and see where the Windows Admin Center ecosystem is headed.

data.title: Get more from your data with cognitive search and Microsoft Azure
data.sortTitle: get more from your data with cognitive search and microsoft azure
data.description: Everyone has data, but should curation be the responsibility of the creator? We believe more powerful search is the answer, to be able to look inside documents and files to find exactly what you are looking for and not rely on manually tagging old files. Come and see how we brought a group of customers with a common challenge together to shape a cognitive search solution. We cover the challenges, the pitfalls, and the solutions leveraging a wide range of 15+ Azure services.

data.title: Get started with Microsoft Search in Bing and Edge
data.sortTitle: get started with microsoft search in bing and edge
data.description: Microsoft Search in Bing is a new search offering that helps you save time by bringing you the best of the web and work in a single experience. In this session learn how to make the most of world and work information, get tips and tricks on best practices, see demos of what’s new and what’s coming, and learn about the roadmap for Microsoft search in Bing and Edge.

data.title: Get the help you need with Azure support plans
data.sortTitle: get the help you need with azure support plans
data.description: Whether you're new to Azure or a cloud expert already deploying business-critical workloads, Azure support plans offer a variety of options to meet your needs. In this session, we provide an overview of the available plans and the benefits included in each, from a plan optimized for developers, to production workloads, business-critical functions, and beyond.

data.title: Get the most out of Microsoft Azure with Azure Advisor
data.sortTitle: get the most out of microsoft azure with azure advisor
data.description: Azure Advisor is a free Azure service that analyzes your configurations and usage and provides personalized recommendations to help you optimize your resources for high availability, security, performance, and cost. In this demo-heavy webinar, learn how to review and remediate Azure Advisor recommendations and take advantage of the new Advisor alerts feature so you can stay on top of Azure best practices and get the most out of your Azure investment.

data.title: Get the most out of passwordless authentication and avoid pitfalls
data.sortTitle: get the most out of passwordless authentication and avoid pitfalls
data.description: Millions of users are enjoying FIDO enabled credentials as a convenient MFA as well as an enabler for a passwordless world. Join us to gain tips for a seamless deployment  and user adoption with Microsoft-supported authentication tools like Windows Hello, Microsoft Authenticator, and FIDO security keys.

data.title: Get visibility into your hybrid network with Network Watcher
data.sortTitle: get visibility into your hybrid network with network watcher
data.description: You want Azure to be an extension of your enterprise network, but you are currently using two sets of tools for monitoring Azure and your on-premises network. Well, no more!   Attend this session to learn how you can use Network Watcher to monitor complex hybrid environments. We go over monitoring the health of software components (e.g. application gateway) from a single console and auditing your network activity in near real-time. Along the way we share the latest updates in Network Watcher, Azure Monitor and Traffic Analytics solutions that provide end-to-end visibility and faster troubleshooting on your network.

data.title: Getting started with deploying apps on Azure Red Hat OpenShift
data.sortTitle: getting started with deploying apps on azure red hat openshift
