data.description: Azure Red Hat OpenShift is a fully managed Red Hat OpenShift that builds on top of Kubernetes. Join this demo-filled session where we go through creating projects, deploying databases, building containers from code on GitHub, and running them on a jointly engineered and supported service by Microsoft and Red Hat.

data.title: Getting started with DevOps for .NET Windows desktop apps and Visual Studio App Center
data.sortTitle: getting started with devops for .net windows desktop apps and visual studio app center
data.description: We've all heard the DevOps pitch before. Deploy faster, ship fewer bugs, deliver customer value more frequently, and ultimately increase revenue. Join this practical session to learn how Visual Studio App Center can easily get you started with DevOps!

data.title: Getting started with Microsoft Cognitive Services and the Azure SDKs
data.sortTitle: getting started with microsoft cognitive services and the azure sdks
data.description: Join this session to see how the latest Azure SDKs makes developing and managing Azure resources at scale easier than ever. See how development productivity is boosted developing mobile apps. The session also provides a demo for quickly getting started with  Cognitive Services running in Azure.

data.title: Giving you the upper hand in combating web threats with Microsoft Defender ATP
data.sortTitle: giving you the upper hand in combating web threats with microsoft defender atp
data.description: Any time your users go online, there’s a risk that they might inadvertently access a malicious site or expose sensitive business information. Microsoft Defender ATP’s web protection leverages existing network protection capabilities to secure your devices against web threats. In this session, we’ll cover features such as URL allow/block, web threat reports, and web content filtering which will enable your security teams to easily manage, investigate, and respond to web threats.

data.title: Global transit network architectures with Azure Virtual WAN
data.sortTitle: global transit network architectures with azure virtual wan
data.description: Global transit network architectures are being adopted by enterprises to consolidate, connect, and control the cloud-centric modern enterprise IT footprint. In this session, we describe how new Azure Virtual WAN service use cases and functionalities help you do that. Learn how we enable simplification and ubiquitous network connectivity between hyper-distributed applications, branches, and users across the cloud and on premises.

data.title: Go behind the curtain with the Office Insider Program: Your feedback shapes the future of Office
data.sortTitle: go behind the curtain with the office insider program: your feedback shapes the future of office
data.description: Office Insiders play a key role in shaping the future of Microsoft Office. In this session, learn how the feedback from Office Insiders has shaped the Account Management feature within Office 365. In addition, explore the Office Insider program, why it's a "must" if you're involved in change management or validating line-of-business apps and find out how to be part of our growing Office Insider community.

data.title: Got Azure Information Protection? Navigating unified labeling, policy configuration, clients, and analytics
data.sortTitle: got azure information protection? navigating unified labeling, policy configuration, clients, and analytics
data.description: Many of the recent integrations and enhancements across the Microsoft Information Protection family of solutions have had implications on existing Azure Information Protection customers. In this session, we dive into key considerations in migrating to the Microsoft 365 Compliance Center, which sensitivity labeling experiences you should implement in Office apps, along with lessons learned based on our customer deployments.

data.title: Govern access for employees and partners with entitlements lifecycle management
data.sortTitle: govern access for employees and partners with entitlements lifecycle management
data.description: Azure Active Directory has new identity governance and administration capabilities to help scale and govern access management for your entire workforce including partners. Come check out the latest news and demos around entitlement lifecycle management.

data.title: Govern your workforce and guest user access with Azure Active Directory
data.sortTitle: govern your workforce and guest user access with azure active directory
data.description: Organizations are faced with an explosion of new, collaboration-focused SaaS apps and services, where it is increasingly becoming as easy to share resources with external partners as with employees. It is more challenging than ever to ensure timely access and productive collaboration while maintaining data security and access compliance. Come to this session to learn how Azure Active Directory can deliver identity governance and administration for both your employees and guest users, empowering the entire organization to participate and remove IT bottlenecks.

data.title: Governance and security for Microsoft Teams
data.sortTitle: governance and security for microsoft teams
data.description: Secure and manage your Microsoft Teams implementation by addressing the seven core concerns of Office 365 Governance. Learn how to manage provisioning, control the Teams lifecycle, leverage templates, and manage guests and org-wide teams. Create frictionless collaboration while maintaining IT controls that will keep your data safe and secure in your Office 365 tenant. Includes a review of best practices for team and channel configuration.

data.title: Grab Taxi and Bentley Systems: Leveraging real-time insights offered by Azure Stream Analytics for business innovation
data.sortTitle: grab taxi and bentley systems: leveraging real-time insights offered by azure stream analytics for business innovation
data.description: Learn how Grab Taxi and Bentley Systems are innovating with real-time insights offered by Azure Stream Analytics. Scenarios that leverage real-time analytics to deliver superior business outcomes continue to grow across every industry. Real-time customer insights, remote patient monitoring, predictive maintenance, fleet management, fraud detection, high frequency trading are just a few. In this session, we show how you can leverage a variety of services in Azure and easily build secure, scalable, and repeatable real-time analytics patterns that span from cloud to the intelligent edge. We showcase new features rolling out the week of Microsoft Ignite, and provide a glimpse into our roadmap.

data.title: H&M's quest of bringing world-class developer experience with Azure and DevOps
data.sortTitle: h&m's quest of bringing world-class developer experience with azure and devops
data.description: Learn the why, what, how of the global retailer H&Ms enterprise wide adoption of Azure DevOps in the quest of enabling a world class developer experience and faster feature creation to the business. H&M went from 0 to 100 Azure DevOps Team projects in three months. This sessions summarizes the approach, learnings, challenges, and outcomes.

data.title: Hands on with the new Microsoft Search API in the Microsoft Graph
data.sortTitle: hands on with the new microsoft search api in the microsoft graph
data.description: Learn how to connect your world of information with Microsoft Search with the new Microsoft Search public API in the Microsoft Graph. In this session, learn how to integrate results from Microsoft Search into your own applications, programmatic access to search, and how to build a tailored search experience through guidance, demos, and more.

data.title: Harness the power of Bing Maps Location Insights in your Enterprise Applications
data.sortTitle: harness the power of bing maps location insights in your enterprise applications
data.description: In the modern workplace, location is key. Bing Maps helps your business take location-relevant data into account in day to day business decisions. Whether you are planning new sites, optimizing your offerings based on local situations, or providing your customers with highly relevant local experiences, Bing Maps has location data and APIs for you. In this session, you will learn about the Microsoft mapping offerings for Location Recognition, Local Search, and Local Insights.

data.title: How customers are implementing Microsoft Information Protection solutions to secure their important data
data.sortTitle: how customers are implementing microsoft information protection solutions to secure their important data
data.description: In this session, we showcase real-world examples of how customers have deployed our information protection solutions, the impact on their environment, and key lessons learned.

data.title: How DNV GL uses Kubernetes for machine learning and enterprise-wide microservice oriented apps
data.sortTitle: how dnv gl uses kubernetes for machine learning and enterprise-wide microservice oriented apps
data.description:
DNV GL has leveraged the flexibility and elasticity of Kubernetes to build a machine learning  (ML) platform to efficiently roll out new applications in production systems, boosting the core business of managing risk by inspections and certification of assets, designs, and processes.

Learn about the challenges and pain points of adopting Kubernetes in a controlled environment and core experiences related to security, monitoring support, and DevOps processes that have given DNV GL the experience needed for migrating large-scale systems to Kubernetes.

data.title: How Microsoft Core Services evolved its own monitoring practices by embracing DevOps on Azure
data.sortTitle: how microsoft core services evolved its own monitoring practices by embracing devops on azure
data.description: The move to the cloud requires a new approach of doing infrastructure operations and management. As development teams move to build their applications in the cloud, operations teams must evolve to a new cloud operation model. In this session, Microsoft Core Services Engineering and Operations (CSEO)—the pros who run the critical products and services that power the company's internal business applications—share their own journey of moving to Azure. Learn how through the adoption of a DevOps culture the team moved away from mundane work of centralized IT monitoring to become enablers of developer teams to self-serve their own monitoring and leverage Azure Monitor.

data.title: How Microsoft does DevOps
data.sortTitle: how microsoft does devops
data.description: Come hear a whistle-stop tour of Microsoft's nine-year DevOps journey so far, explaining why the company embarked on this transformation and what benefits it has already seen. Martin goes through a set of lessons he and his team learned, mistakes they made along the way, and how they adjusted the processes, culture, and tooling to help address them.

data.title: How Microsoft uses Identity Protection to protect its assets without disruptions
data.sortTitle: how microsoft uses identity protection to protect its assets without disruptions
data.description: Identity security is one of the most critical measures you can take for your organization today. To continually strengthen your identity security, you need crystal clear visibility into when and what type of attacks your users are exposed to. Come learn how Microsoft implements Azure Active Directory Identity Protection in its own IT environment and gain best practices to help you deploy the same principles in your organization.

data.title: How the new Office apps on Windows, the web, and mobile can help simplify your employees’ lives
data.sortTitle: how the new office apps on windows, the web, and mobile can help simplify your employees’ lives
data.description: The Office app on Windows 10, Office.com, and the Office app for mobile devices are changing the way people get the most out of Office. Come learn about how these experiences can help improve your employees’ productivity. We also walk through demos that show how you can easily customize these experiences for your organization.

data.title: How to accelerate your journey to Microsoft 365
data.sortTitle: how to accelerate your journey to microsoft 365
data.description: Want to get the most out of your Microsoft 365 investment? Join this session and learn how Microsoft can help accelerate your move to the cloud with deployment and adoption expertise, tools, and resources. We have self-serve digital assets, in-product experiences, plus Microsoft engineering teams and a partner ecosystem that you can leverage. Hear how FastTrack can help deploy Windows 10 and Microsoft Office 365 ProPlus and migrate your email and file share data.

data.title: How to build high performance, mission-critical apps using Azure Cosmos DB
data.sortTitle: how to build high performance, mission-critical apps using azure cosmos db
data.description: In this session, we discuss how to build mission-critical multi-tenant systems on Azure Cosmos DB that scale out to handle a global user base. We begin by covering key concepts surrounding performance isolation, security isolation, high availability, disaster recovery, and SLAs. Then, we dive deep by walking through the Azure Cosmos DB design considerations and capabilities – including partitioning strategies and multi-master.

data.title: How to capitalize on the best of Microsoft 365 with Microsoft Surface
data.sortTitle: how to capitalize on the best of microsoft 365 with microsoft surface
data.description: Attend this session to learn how Surface continues to adopt first and best the latest tech features of Microsoft 365 so you can deploy, manage, and secure your investment. The session shares real-world examples of how Surface allows you to capitalize on Microsoft 365. We take a deep dive into where Surface solves the “jobs to be done” in the enterprise and review how to turn customer insight into action with Get Modern with Surface PoC resources.

data.title: How to choose the right infrastructure management tool for the job
data.sortTitle: how to choose the right infrastructure management tool for the job
data.description: Azure supports provisioning and managing its cloud infrastructure using a variety of open-source and first-party tools. Although this provides customers with ultimate in flexibility, it can also result in confusion as to which tool to use, and when. In this session we provide you with some guidelines, scenarios, and best practices for choosing ARM, Azure CLI, Terraform, PowerShell, or Ansible.

data.title: How to improve Power BI content deployment efficiency
data.sortTitle: how to improve power bi content deployment efficiency
data.description: BI professionals continuously improve reports and dashboards to provide their users the best information and experience, but managing all that content can be a challenge. Learn about the new way to develop, test, and deploy new and updated Power BI content so you can easily spot discrepancies and always know how changes affect your users.

data.title: How to manage governance and automation in Teams for Education
data.sortTitle: how to manage governance and automation in teams for education
data.description: This session will cover how districts like Brisbane Catholic Education manage over 33,000+ monthly active users of Teams across 144 schools using the governance policies and automation tools available to Teams in Education. Learn how to manage automation at scale with School Data Sync. For further and higher education see how universities allow staff and students to self create teams to improve learning outcomes while meeting their governance requirements using Teams policy.

data.title: How to move VMWare workloads to Azure
data.sortTitle: how to move vmware workloads to azure
data.description: Discover how to move VMware-based workloads to the cloud seamlessly and integrate your VMware environment with Azure. We demonstrate how to manage existing environments with the same VMware tools you already know. Learn how to get scale, automation, and fast provisioning for your VMware workloads on global Azure infrastructure. Modernize your VMware workloads by integrating with native Azure services and take advantage of Azure pricing and benefits for Windows Server and SQL Server.

data.title: How to move your existing apps to MSIX
data.sortTitle: how to move your existing apps to msix
data.description: Whether you are an IT professional or a developer, we have you covered. We go over different options for both developers and IT pros that can enable you to move your existing installers to MSIX.

data.title: How to operationalize making ongoing security posture assessments and improvements part of your organization’s DNA
data.sortTitle: how to operationalize making ongoing security posture assessments and improvements part of your organization’s dna
data.description: One of the greatest threats your organization faces is the fact that its security posture is nowhere near what it could be. The security tools customers use are often under-utilized and misconfigured leaving them vulnerable to exploits that are often old news. To address this you need to make ongoing security posture/hygiene assessments and improvement part of your organizations DNA. Join us to learn how you can operationalize Microsoft Secure Score into your daily walk so you can continuously assess, max out, and maintain the best possible security posture and hygiene.

data.title: How to operationalize maxing out your security posture with the all new Microsoft Secure Score
data.sortTitle: how to operationalize maxing out your security posture with the all new microsoft secure score
data.description:
Over 90% of cyber-related incidents are made possible due to deficiencies in security related configurations and hygiene and most customers are completely unaware how exposed they are. Microsoft recognizes that state-of-the-art security technologies are not enough and that our solutions need to be coupled with capabilities that help you address the people and process issues that are actually one of the greatest challenges. 

Come join us to learn how a customer operationalized Microsoft Secure Score so that they could continuously assess, max out, and maintain the best possible security posture and hygiene.

data.title: How to re-use your Windows Server licenses in Azure with Azure Hybrid Benefit
data.sortTitle: how to re-use your windows server licenses in azure with azure hybrid benefit
data.description: Microsoft Azure offers unbeatable cost saving options for Windows Server and SQL Server workloads in Azure. Azure Hybrid Benefit offers savings for on-premises customers who have licenses with Software Assurance and are migrating their workloads to Azure. For Windows Server Datacenter, keep it running on-premises AND save on Azure VMs. Come and learn about how you can easily deploy Windows workloads in Azure and save on cost with the Azure Hybrid Benefit.

data.title: How to run the Global DevOps Bootcamp community event (with 10.000 participants) on Azure
data.sortTitle: how to run the global devops bootcamp community event (with 10.000 participants) on azure
data.description: Ever wanted to run a community event at scale? With Global DevOps Bootcamp, we ran an event for 10,000 participants worldwide and provisioned for every team of attendees a website, an Azure DevOps account, for event organizers an event registration site and most of all we build challenges that helped people learn to apply SRE practices in their provided solutions. Now how do you build an architecture that scales to support such an event? How well does the cloud actually scale? What did we learn? In this session, we share how we made this happen with, of course, the help of many volunteers around the globe. Think Azure Service Bus, Azure App Services, Azure SQL, Application Insights. and much more. Learn what works and what doesn't.

data.title: How to select the right Microsoft Teams device across different space types
data.sortTitle: how to select the right microsoft teams device across different space types
data.description: Take 20 minutes to learn about our Microsoft Teams device portfolio for different space types and understand which device fits your organizational need

data.title: How to use analytics to  drive your Microsoft 365 adoption
data.sortTitle: how to use analytics to  drive your microsoft 365 adoption
data.description: With the right data at your disposal, surfaced at the right time, you can quickly take action to provide productive, collaborative, and secure experiences for your organization. In this session, see how this works, experiencing demonstrations of how the Microsoft 365 admin center provides analytics that help you drive your adoption goals and get the most out of Microsoft 365.

data.title: How to use and create AI solutions with Azure Data Box Edge and Azure Stack
data.sortTitle: how to use and create ai solutions with azure data box edge and azure stack
data.description: Join us to learn about the hybrid patterns you can deploy today for free in Microsoft Azure Stack and Azure Data Box Edge. These include AI solutions for retail and industrial safety as well as cognitive services running in semi-connected and fully-disconnected mode.

data.title: How to use automation for Linux workloads deployment on Azure
data.sortTitle: how to use automation for linux workloads deployment on azure
data.description: Automation is a life saver for IT implementers and site reliability engineers. A good configuration could save time and energy while maintaining the best performance possible for all your pipelines. Join the Azure Customer Support team to hear about best practices on how to use Terraform + Ansible to deploy your Linux workloads running on Azure, easliy connect services that matter and reduce manual work and overhead.

data.title: How to use GitHub effectively in your company
data.sortTitle: how to use github effectively in your company
data.description: Every developer knows GitHub, but how do you bring those powerful tools from the open source community into your company and use them to help change your culture to be more collaborative, to build on and contribute to open source while protecting your organization from security risks, to become an open source enterprise. In this session learn from GitHub practical tips and tricks on how to use GitHub effectively inside your enterprise and how to convince your company that it's the right way to go.

data.title: How to use new intelligent tools in Workplace Analytics to lead organizational transformation
data.sortTitle: how to use new intelligent tools in workplace analytics to lead organizational transformation
data.description: When your organization uses Office 365 to collaborate and create, you generate signals that provide new levels of insight into how work gets done. New intelligence in Workplace Analytics enables you with tools that transform those insights into action. Join our product experts for demos and discussions to learn how leading organizations uncover opportunities for change with organizational network analysis (ONA), enable targeted transformation with manager-deployed change management programs, and get immediately actionable insights through powerful new dashboards so that they can make better, data-driven decisions. Discover how these new capabilities can help you transform your organization and elevate your position as a strong partner to the business.

data.title: Human resource capabilities within Microsoft Dynamics 365 Talent (Core HR)
data.sortTitle: human resource capabilities within microsoft dynamics 365 talent (core hr)
data.description: Great investments are being made in the core Human Resource capability of Dynamics 365 for Talent. This session takes you through the roadmap and demos user experiences that will blow your mind!

data.title: Hybrid governance and management is here
data.sortTitle: hybrid governance and management is here
data.description: If your environment spans cloud and on-premises then you've come to the right session. The new hybrid management capabilities provides an at-scale single pane of management for on-premises and cloud using the best of what the cloud can offer. Come learn about our strategic hybrid management investments and view our upcoming offering for bringing cloud server management to your on-premises environment.

data.title: Hyper-V roadmap
data.sortTitle: hyper-v roadmap
data.description: Hyper-V powers Microsoft Azure, Azure Stack and Azure Stack HCI. It puts the hyper in Hyper-V Containers. It makes your web browser more secure, and your Windows Desktop development environment a bit more “penguin-y”. It emulates holograms and thwarts malware. Come to this session to learn about all the new developments in the world of Hyper-V, and to gain insights into where it is going in the future.

data.title: Implementing MLOps in the real world
data.sortTitle: implementing mlops in the real world
data.description: MLOps is DevOps for machine learning and brings continuous integration, delivery, and learning to the machine learning lifecycle. Learn how to take MLOps from theory to reality in this short session.

data.title: Implementing privacy and compliance standards in Microsoft Azure
data.sortTitle: implementing privacy and compliance standards in microsoft azure
data.description: Compliance with standards and regulations is increasingly a required part of digital transformation. Azure is a platform built with privacy and compliance in mind, with the most comprehensive set of compliance offerings, and built-in tools that enable you to quickly build compliant solutions. Learn about the Azure commitment to privacy and compliance and some of our newest compliance-enablement tools.

data.title: Improve and automate workflows with mixed reality, Microsoft Dynamics 365, and Power Apps
data.sortTitle: improve and automate workflows with mixed reality, microsoft dynamics 365, and power apps
data.description: Transform and redefine workforce productivity by blending the physical and digital worlds with mixed reality. Using Microsoft Dynamics 365, Microsoft Power Apps, and mixed reality, reinvent how your field service technicians solve work orders and reduce their first time fix rates. In this session, learn and see how firstline workers can learn complex tasks and increase efficiency when using digital information overlaid with physical objects and environments with the power of mixed reality. See how these solutions empowered with Microsoft Business Applications are automating and improving real-world challenges and solving complex issues today.

data.title: Improve workplace productivity and save money with GPU partitioning in Azure virtual desktops
data.sortTitle: improve workplace productivity and save money with gpu partitioning in azure virtual desktops
data.description: Supercharge the modern workplace with GPU enabled virtual desktops. Learn why today’s applications need GPUs to deliver a more responsive experience and maximize user productivity. Learn how modern IT organizations can extend cloud dollars with fractional GPU acceleration.

data.title: Increase M&A agility by integrating quickly and securely with identity
data.sortTitle: increase m&a agility by integrating quickly and securely with identity
data.description: M&A is an increasingly important growth driver for modern enterprises but with increasing complexity of technology solutions, it can be a major challenge for IT and Security teams. Join this session to learn how to consolidate directories and enable access to resources from day one, simplify collaboration and eliminate cybersecurity threats with Identity as a control plane.

data.title: Increase your .NET productivity with Visual Studio and Visual Studio for Mac
data.sortTitle: increase your .net productivity with visual studio and visual studio for mac
data.description: Come to this session to pump up your .NET productivity by learning about the latest and greatest additions to Visual Studio and Visual Studio for Mac. This demo-heavy session includes tips for navigating, writing, refactoring, testing, and cleaning up your code. Learn about the new AI powered IntelliSense and collaborative development with Live Share.

data.title: Innovations to boost productivity with Azure-managed MySQL, Postgres, and MariaDB databases
data.sortTitle: innovations to boost productivity with azure-managed mysql, postgres, and mariadb databases
data.description: Cloud is fueling the growth of open source databases such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, and MariaDB. More than 70% of new applications are developed with these databases. Azure offers a fully-managed database service used in industries such as financial, retail, and manufacturing—powering mission-critical, LOB, and real-time operational analytical applications. These apps demand enterprise-grade security, hyperscale performance and scalability, high availability, and advanced performance management. This demo-filled session from the people who build the service focuses on new and upcoming innovations across these key areas. Gain a clear understanding of these innovative capabilities, and how you can apply them to boost productivity.

data.title: Inside Azure datacenter architecture with Mark Russinovich
data.sortTitle: inside azure datacenter architecture with mark russinovich
data.description: Join Mark Russinovich, Azure CTO, to learn how Microsoft Azure enables intelligent, modern, and innovative applications at scale in the cloud, on-premises, and on the edge. Microsoft Azure has achieved massive, global scale, with more than 50 announced regions consisting of over 100 datacenters, and it is growing fast. It delivers the promise of cloud computing, including high-availability, extreme performance, and security, by custom designing software and hardware to work best together. Mark takes you on a tour of Azure datacenter architecture and implementation innovations, describing everything from Azure global infrastructure, to how we enable large-scale enterprise scenarios on both cloud and edge, and more.

data.title: Insider info from Microsoft’s CISO
data.sortTitle: insider info from microsoft’s ciso
data.description: In this session, Bret Arsenault, CVP and CISO at Microsoft discusses the most common challenges faced by security executives today and how he tackles each one. Hear him discuss topics like: how to manage devices and endpoints in a heterogeneous environment, implementing a Zero Trust strategy, migrating to the cloud, and managing the complexity of multiple security vendors. He describes how he organizes his approach to strategy and how he’s leveraging AI to solve challenges.

data.title: Integrate speech and text translation into your apps using Azure Cognitive Services Translator
data.sortTitle: integrate speech and text translation into your apps using azure cognitive services translator
data.description: Want to add multi-language user experiences in more than 60 languages in your applications, websites, tools, and solutions? Join us for a hands-on theater session on how to use the Azure Cognitive Services Translator API's collection of AI algorithms in the cloud, to build multi-language user experiences in your products.

data.title: Integrated support for Linux on Azure workloads overview
data.sortTitle: integrated support for linux on azure workloads overview
data.description: Bring your mission critical apps to Azure! Azure Professional Support provides you the most comprehensive coverage and unique industry leading integrated co-located support options with 24/7 experts to assist you online to troubleshoot your urgent needs. Learn about what Azure Support options are, how does integrated support work for your Red Hat / SUSE workloads running on Azure, and explore the simple ticketing experience from our customer support team of experts.

data.title: Introducing Form Recognizer for AI driven information extraction from forms
data.sortTitle: introducing form recognizer for ai driven information extraction from forms
data.description: One of the challenges just about every business faces is converting forms to a useful digital format. Come learn how you can extract text, key value pairs and tables from your forms. Extract information using our OCR, pre-built models or train and publish a model that fits your specific form types. See how customers are extracting data from forms to improve their business processes. We show demos, success stories, and introduce the technical concepts to get you started.

data.title: Introducing PowerApps portals for external users
data.sortTitle: introducing powerapps portals for external users
data.description: Learn how Microsoft PowerApps customers can create websites over data stored in Common Data Service that can be accessed by external users with a wide variety of identities including personal accounts, LinkedIn, and other Azure Active Directory organizations as well as allow anonymous browsing of content.

data.title: Introducing the Streaming Data Warehouse with Azure SQL Data Warehouse
data.sortTitle: introducing the streaming data warehouse with azure sql data warehouse
data.description: Come and see how the new integration between Azure SQL Data Warehouse and Azure Stream Analytics makes it possible to ingest hundreds of megabytes of real-time event streams to support real-time ingestion and analytics scenarios. In this session, learn how to leverage Stream tables in your Azure SQL Data Warehouse to ingest Event Hubs data while supporting your business critical insights with much lower latencies.

data.title: Introduction to Microsoft Teams for government with a "ask me anything"
data.sortTitle: introduction to microsoft teams for government with a "ask me anything"
data.description: Audience members will learn about existing & future capabilities coming to Microsoft Teams in GCC, GCC High, and DOD. Discover the top reasons why Microsoft Teams deployments fail or drop in usage right after deployment for most US and World Wide Government customers. Join us for this unique opportunity to talk directly with members of the Microsoft Teams Product Group that focus on Microsoft Teams for Government with a special "Ask me anything" at the end of the session!

data.title: iOS and iPadOS device management with Microsoft Intune
data.sortTitle: ios and ipados device management with microsoft intune
data.description: Discover the features that make Microsoft Intune a leader for managing iOS and iPadOS devices. Dive into the demos for iOS 13 support, user enrollment, SSO automatic enrollment customization, and derived credentials.

data.title: It’s not technology but people that are your first line of defense. It’s time to harden them!
data.sortTitle: it’s not technology but people that are your first line of defense. it’s time to harden them!
data.description:
How did that last breach start in your organization? How about that last compliance related fire drill? Chances are it all started because of human action (e.g.: click on link, failed to notice non-compliance). Our goal at Microsoft is to deliver technology to help mitigate risks, but the reality is humans are also part of the equation. We need to harden them with fully integrated attack simulation and user training capabilities so you can:

•	Identify exploitable employees and weaknesses in your defenses
•	Reduce employee related risks and improve the effectiveness of your defenders
•	Raise your security posture and meet regulatory and compliance obligations

Come join us to learn about the integrated attack simulation and user training capabilities that we are adding to Microsoft 365.

data.title: Java on Azure: Building Spring Boot microservices
data.sortTitle: java on azure: building spring boot microservices
data.description:
Spring Boot and Spring Cloud are the de-facto choices for many companies building microservices, using Java. 

In this session, we share our best practices and tools to go from development to production using Spring Boot and Azure, with a specific focus on microservices configuration, resiliency and scalability in the cloud. We also cover monitoring and security and discuss how Spring Boot applications can scale and handle failure on Azure. 

If you are thinking about building microservices, this is a session you don't want to miss.

data.title: Jumpstart your Azure Stack HCI deployment
data.sortTitle: jumpstart your azure stack hci deployment
data.description: It’s time to deploy hyperconverged infrastructure – where do you start? In this session, we talk through key design choices and best practices for Azure Stack HCI, how to find and buy the best hardware, and we demo how to deploy the software stack, including Hyper-V and Storage Spaces Direct, with Windows Admin Center. Accelerate your next project with these tips directly from the experts.

data.title: Keep users productive and data secure in a cloud-first world: Secure browsing with Microsoft Edge
data.sortTitle: keep users productive and data secure in a cloud-first world: secure browsing with microsoft edge
data.description: As the world moves to the cloud and web apps, the browser is one of the most critical pieces of a security infrastructure. This deep dive will cover how the new Microsoft Edge keeps your users, your network and your critical data secure, while allowing your users to be productive anywhere and on any device, including innovative browser isolation via Application Guard, protection of your corporate assets with Conditional Access and Microsoft Information Protection (MIP). Learn how integration with M365 Intelligent security brings it all together for the most secure browser in the enterprise.

data.title: Know your data: Top five tips and tricks to better understand your sensitive data landscape
data.sortTitle: know your data: top five tips and tricks to better understand your sensitive data landscape
data.description: For many customers, the first step in implementing a comprehensive information protection strategy is gaining visibility into and an understanding of the sensitive data that exists across their organization. Join us for a quick look at the tools you can use to discover, identify, classify, and analyze sensitive information across devices, apps, on-premises and in the cloud. This information can help you define your protection and governance policies, based on your unique needs.

data.title: Knowledge mining for biomedical text: Using Text Analytics, Form Recognizer, and Cognitive Search to unlock value from clinical documents
data.sortTitle: knowledge mining for biomedical text: using text analytics, form recognizer, and cognitive search to unlock value from clinical documents
data.description: Healthcare professionals today are faced with the challenge of managing overwhelming collections of textual data. Whether it’s PubMed articles, lab reports, gray literature, or electronic health records, practitioners need access to new tools that allow them to find, manage, and learn from different kinds of textual data. In this talk, we show how Cognitive Services and Azure Search are being used to help manage – and extract insight from – large amounts of clinical text. In addition to discussing best practices for leveraging the power of Azure Search, we show how Form Recognizer can be used to reliably extract content from structured records, and how new features in Text Analytics can be used to help safeguard sensitive data and reduce the compliance burden for managing personally identifiable information (PII) and protected health information.

data.title: Knowledge mining: AI-driven content understanding with cognitive search on Azure
data.sortTitle: knowledge mining: ai-driven content understanding with cognitive search on azure
data.description: Come learn how to apply AI to understand your business documents. Cognitive search allows you to apply AI (cognitive skills) to your data to extract entities and relationships from your unstructured documents, turning them into your private knowledge store. In this session, learn how to deploy a cognitive search solution on your data, including customer testimonies and demos. We also introduce the new knowledge store that is now part of cognitive search, and explore new features and capabilities (complex type, storage-optimized SKU, etc.)

data.title: Latest Microsoft Information Protection partner solutions to help protect your sensitive data
data.sortTitle: latest microsoft information protection partner solutions to help protect your sensitive data
data.description: In this quick theater session, learn about the latest updates to the Microsoft Information Protection SDK and how it can be used to extend classification, labeling, and protection capabilities to other apps and services. We also showcase some of the latest and greatest partner integrations!

data.title: Learn about new, innovative and intelligent devices for Microsoft Teams
data.sortTitle: learn about new, innovative and intelligent devices for microsoft teams
data.description: Learn what’s new with Microsoft Teams Devices that will bring the modern workplace experiences to life across all spaces and conference rooms in your organization.

data.title: Learn best practices to improve workload performance with Azure Disks
data.sortTitle: learn best practices to improve workload performance with azure disks
data.description: Come learn about how you can best leverage the new disk offerings to optimize your workload. We show you step by step how to measure performance and scale your application as your workload requirements change. We cover popular workloads and how to optimize them to achieve the best performance characteristics on the Microsoft Azure platform.

data.title: Learn from Lufthansa about their journey running Linux workloads on Azure
data.sortTitle: learn from lufthansa about their journey running linux workloads on azure
data.description:
"Join Lufthansa's IT leaders to learn about how Microsoft Azure became the cloud of choice and how Lufthansa's Technik team built their solution on Azure, with implementation strategy and experience sharing of running full Red Hat solution stack with Azure integrations. 
Reference Case study: https://customers.microsoft.com/en-us/story/lufthansa-technik-partner-professional-services-azure "

data.title: Learn from Siemens: Solving business and IT needs with a pioneering taxbot
data.sortTitle: learn from siemens: solving business and it needs with a pioneering taxbot
data.description: Siemens employees need accurate and timely access to information related to import/export tax questions. As internal sites proliferate, being able to access accurate information quickly and readily is key. Siemens worked with Avanade and Accenture to create and implement an intelligent bot, called TAXsphere, which can respond immediately to employees’ most-pressing tax questions within minutes, not hours or days. In this session, learn 10 things about the strategy, methodology, and key findings from creating such a solution in a complex multinational environment. Includes live demo.

data.title: Learn how FastTrack can help migrate your data to Microsoft 365 at no additional cost
data.sortTitle: learn how fasttrack can help migrate your data to microsoft 365 at no additional cost
data.description: Do you want to migrate your data to Microsoft 365? If so, come to this session to learn how FastTrack experts can help you to migrate your email and file share data at no additional cost. Hear customer stories about how FastTrack securely and successfully migrated email and file data to Exchange Online, SharePoint Online, and OneDrive for Business.

data.title: Learn how FastTrack can help to securely deploy Microsoft 365
data.sortTitle: learn how fasttrack can help to securely deploy microsoft 365
data.description: With security being top of mind for organizations moving to the cloud, come join our team of FastTrack experts who share tips, best-practices, and resources to help you securely deploy Microsoft 365. FastTrack is your advisor to deploy Microsoft 365 at no additional cost.

data.title: Learn how to create AI Builder models and use them across the Microsoft Power Platform
data.sortTitle: learn how to create ai builder models and use them across the microsoft power platform
data.description: Learn about the functionalities and best practices to achieve your digital transformation through the Power Platform and AI Builder. AI Builder provides AI templates (Binary Classification, Text Classification, Object Detection, Form Scanning) that you can tailor to easily add intelligence to your apps and processes in PowerApps and/or Microsoft Flow.

data.title: Learn how to run network-attached storage workflows in Azure
data.sortTitle: learn how to run network-attached storage workflows in azure
data.description: Learn about the various file storage solutions available in Azure. Walk away with ideas on how to decide which file solutions are right based on your specific scenario. Focusing primarily on HPC, this session will dive into Azure NetApp Files, Azure HPC Cache and related Azure products.

data.title: Learn more about intelligent information governance across all your data
data.sortTitle: learn more about intelligent information governance across all your data
data.description: As data explodes in the modern workplace, organizations recognize data is an asset but also a liability. Learn how Microsoft 365 can help your customers establish a comprehensive information governance strategy to keep, classify, label, and apply policies on your data.

data.title: Learn why SAP customers with leading brands and large mission critical landscapes are migrating their SAP to Azure
data.sortTitle: learn why sap customers with leading brands and large mission critical landscapes are migrating their sap to azure
data.description: Come learn why customers are choosing SAP on Azure, the benefits of running SAP in Azure and how the Microsoft/SAP partnership offers a trusted path for business transformation. Hear how customers embarked on their journey of migrating large-scale, mission-critical SAP deployments including migrations to SAP HANA and SAP S/4HANA.

data.title: Lessons learned from implementing real-world machine learning solutions: Common patterns and best practices
data.sortTitle: lessons learned from implementing real-world machine learning solutions: common patterns and best practices
data.description: With the exponential rise of data, we are undergoing a technology transformation, as organizations realize the need for insights-driven decisions. Artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) technologies can help harness this data to drive real business outcomes across industries. Azure AI and Azure Machine Learning service are leading customers to the world of ubiquitous insights and enabling intelligent applications. This session introduces you to some of the most common and valuable patterns we see for machine learning in the real world, including product recommendations in retail, load forecasting in energy production, image processing in healthcare, predictive maintenance in manufacturing, and many more.

data.title: Lessons learned from open-sourcing Windows Calculator
data.sortTitle: lessons learned from open-sourcing windows calculator
data.description: We believe in Windows as a development platform, and we believe in our developers. Through open-source, we aspire to partner with the developer community to build better user experiences and learn from each other. We led with Calculator, because the app has such an interesting history, and we can’t wait to see where we can take this app, together. In this session, we talk about how we moved Windows Calculator to open source, leveraging technologies like Azure Pipelines for public builds and WinAppDriver for automated UI testing. We also discuss what we've learned from working in the open with the community, what we're working on next, and how you can get involved in the project.

data.title: Lessons learned migrating SAP applications to Azure: Customers and partners
data.sortTitle: lessons learned migrating sap applications to azure: customers and partners
data.description: Discover how SAP on Azure partners help customers migrate SAP applications to Azure. From planning and assessment to deployment, SAP on Azure partners are dedicated to making the best possible migration experience.

data.title: Lessons learned running Linux-based workloads on Azure
data.sortTitle: lessons learned running linux-based workloads on azure
data.description: Every day, thousands of Azure customers launch a wide range of critical Linux-based workloads that go from ephemeral batch compute to long-running enterprise software packages. And they're in good company, since over half the VMs on Azure run Linux today. But what about Day 2? What are the best practices that we can apply during the architecture and design phases? Come join us for a 3-way session where we will share how commercial partners (such as Red Hat), customer programs (such as FastTrack for SAP) and large teams at Microsoft all operate Linux-based workloads on Azure.

data.title: Leverage Voice, Pen, and Touch for on-the-go productivity in the Modern Workplace
data.sortTitle: leverage voice, pen, and touch for on-the-go productivity in the modern workplace
data.description: We would talk about different ways to stay productive in Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote, Whiteboard, on tablet and mobile using dictation, pen, and touch, how to think through what scenarios organizations should target enabling, and how you can use these apps/endpoints in concert with Whiteboard and Hub for team-based collaboration.

data.title: Lifecycle of a Java app from initial deployment to running in production using Terraform and Ansible
data.sortTitle: lifecycle of a java app from initial deployment to running in production using terraform and ansible
data.description: In this session, learn best practices for using open source tools to manage the full lifecycle of your Java applications in an enterprise Kubernetes (AKS) environment. Using configuration and infrastructure-as-code such as Ansible and Terraform, developers can focus on their application code. This demo-heavy session shows developers how to stand up the environment required by their Java application; quickly deploy their application code and move it to production.

data.title: Lifecycle Services for Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations roadmap and strategy
data.sortTitle: lifecycle services for microsoft dynamics 365 finance and operations roadmap and strategy
data.description: During this session, get a glimpse into the investments and roadmap for Microsoft Dynamics Lifecycle Services. Learn abou the Self Service Deployment capability and how this will take you to zero down-time updates!

data.title: Linux based web app development made easy on App Service
data.sortTitle: linux based web app development made easy on app service
data.description: App Service provides an easy on-ramp into Azure for Node.js, Python, Java, and PHP developers. Intrinsic build capabilities, SSH command line access, free SSL certificates, support for popular OSS frameworks, rich monitoring and diagnostics capabilities, virtual network integration and options to deploy your app as either source code or a Docker container, are all provided on an enterprise grade platform that scales with your business needs.

data.title: Live! MyAnalytics and Workplace Intelligence help you be productive everyday
data.sortTitle: live! myanalytics and workplace intelligence help you be productive everyday
data.description: Come see demos of insights that Microsoft AI can provide, specifically how Microsoft AI can help you make the most of your day and be more productive, whether you’ve made commitments to others, organizing a customer meeting in Outlook, or planning your next sprint with remote colleagues over Teams.

data.title: Love all your identities – Building digital relationships with your customers and partners
data.sortTitle: love all your identities – building digital relationships with your customers and partners
data.description: It can be easy to lose sight of securing and managing partners and customers effectively, especially when you have disconnected identity solutions. Come learn how you can provide seamless and secure digital experiences for partners, customers, citizens, and others with the level of customization and control your business requires. Get the latest capabilities and best practices for enabling the use of third-party identity providers, governing guest access, and more in Azure Active Directory.

data.title: Machine learning and AI with SQL Server 2019 big data clusters
data.sortTitle: machine learning and ai with sql server 2019 big data clusters
data.description: The SQL Server 2019 big data cluster provides a scalable and enterprise-ready platform with native support for R, Python, Spark, SQL, and HDFS. In this session, use the Team Data Science Process (TDSP) along with these features and explore various scenarios for machine learning on big data clusters, including leveraging AI with containerized Cognitive Services.

data.title: Machine learning on Azure: Ask me anything
data.sortTitle: machine learning on azure: ask me anything
data.description: Join the leadership team for the Azure machine learning platform for a no-holds-barred discussion on the platform, capabilities, customer learnings, and futures. This is a one-of-its-kind opportunity for decision makers, practitioners, and developers to hear it straight from the horse's mouth. Come with your questions, both technical and strategic, discuss customers patterns, and share your list of asks for the platform team. Having gone through all the amazing sessions on the Azure machine learning platform, you should have all the clarity you need to implement robust solutions. Use this session to jumpstart the solutions with discussions on best practices, learnings and recommendations from the product leadership.

data.title: Machine learning simplified: From ideation to deployment in minutes with Azure Machine Learning
data.sortTitle: machine learning simplified: from ideation to deployment in minutes with azure machine learning
data.description: Artificial intelligence is right here, right now—and making AI real for businesses is our goal. Azure Machine Learning offers powerful tools for all levels of data science, including a powerful, simple drag and drop authoring environment with no-code needed. You can go from ideation to deployment in a matter of clicks and visually design your machine learning models with ease. Whether you are new to machine learning, a data scientist or a developer, you can leverage this platform to accelerate your data science journey.

data.title: Machine learning with Python using serverless Azure Functions
data.sortTitle: machine learning with python using serverless azure functions
data.description: The growth in problems being by solved machine learning (ML) these days is astounding. Meanwhile serverless applications are also growing strong due to its undeniable efficiency benefits. Now it is possible to use serverless technologies, like Azure Functions written in Python, with existing ML models to build powerful intelligent applications. Come learn how to achieve serverless ML from real-world examples based on top Azure customers.

data.title: MacOS device management with Microsoft Intune
data.sortTitle: macos device management with microsoft intune
data.description: Dive into the latest demos for macOS support, including FileVault 2 support and a breadth of new capabilities including VPP, macOS Catalina support, automatic enrollment customization, and support for Microsoft Edge for macOS.

data.title: Make data protection a partner to your automation workflows
data.sortTitle: make data protection a partner to your automation workflows
data.description:
Imagine a world where backup data may be used to quickly create a development environment at the push of a button. We walk through automation concepts, apply them to your on-premises or cloud infrastructure, and give live demos using Rubrik’s fully robust set of REST APIs. 

Join us as we walk through calling REST APIs to create workflows that instantiate dev environments on-premises and in the cloud. We even throw in a bonus example of leveraging orchestration engines to build, test, and validate that your data can truly be restored.

data.title: Make the most of Azure to reduce your cloud spend
data.sortTitle: make the most of azure to reduce your cloud spend
data.description: Explore how you can obtain the most out of Azure. Experience how Azure reservations, low-priority VMs, incremental snapshots, burstable VMs and ephemeral OS disks can help substantially reduce spending. We’ll also briefly discuss how you can analyze and set budgets to monitor and optimize your costs and usage with Azure Cost Management and Azure Advisor.

data.title: Make the most of your blue team: Empower defenders with the correlated incidents and automation in our threat protection stack
data.sortTitle: make the most of your blue team: empower defenders with the correlated incidents and automation in our threat protection stack
data.description: Security alerts are a classic example of drinking from the proverbial firehose: How can security teams digest all that data to know what’s happening and why it matters, at speed to contain a threat before the damage is done? Come see how Microsoft Threat Protection correlates and prioritizes signal, surfacing the most critical threats across the enterprise, helping teams understand where the threat is currently impacting the organization, and automating incident response to help them do more with fewer resources.

data.title: Manage and optimize your cloud cost with Azure Cost Management
data.sortTitle: manage and optimize your cloud cost with azure cost management
data.description: Are you looking to get better visibility into your cloud spend, would you like to understand how to manage and optimize your cloud spend? If so come see how the Azure Cost Management suite of features can help you get a better handle on your Azure and/or AWS cloud spend.

data.title: Manage your cloud security posture and monitor compliance with Azure Security Center
data.sortTitle: manage your cloud security posture and monitor compliance with azure security center
data.description: Misconfigurations are the #1 threat in cloud platforms. Join us to discover the latest enhancements for Security Center security posture management capabilities: implement security best practices across your machines, data services, and apps. This session also covers newly added IoT capabilities to reduce attack surface for your Azure IoT solution and remediate issues before they can be exploited.

data.title: Manage your end-to-end machine learning lifecycle with MLOps
data.sortTitle: manage your end-to-end machine learning lifecycle with mlops
data.description: MLOps is all about helping you bring your machine learning workflows to production. This session shows you how to get to production faster with optimized experiences for model training, packaging, validation, deployment and monitoring - and automate + audit all of this within your existing DevOps tooling. With ML Ops you can store and version models in production, collect continuous feedback on model behavior, and maintain quality models to keep your business and customers ahead. Target audience for this session includes data engineering, data science and AppDev personas.

data.title: Managing and securing devices in a hybrid identity world
data.sortTitle: managing and securing devices in a hybrid identity world
data.description: If you're operating a hybrid identity environment, it may be confusing which domain you should join your devices to and how to ensure maximum device security. Come learn best practices on device management with Azure Active Directory and how to secure them with Microsoft Security solutions.

data.title: Managing client deployments and updates for Microsoft Teams
data.sortTitle: managing client deployments and updates for microsoft teams
data.description: Learn how to manage client deployments for Microsoft Teams across platforms. From planning your client deployment to managing updates on an on-going basis, this session provides you with a deep dive into the processes and management tools you need to know to be successful.

data.title: Managing cloud native applications with Azure Blob Storage
data.sortTitle: managing cloud native applications with azure blob storage
data.description: In this session we cover when to use Azure Blob Storage; how to architect, provision, monitor, secure, and optimize to reduce costs. The four top scenarios covered include: cloud native applications, analytics, HPC, and archive/cold data storage. We also introduce new features that increase the use cases and manageability of blobs.

data.title: Managing Surface UEFI BIOS settings with Microsoft Intune
data.sortTitle: managing surface uefi bios settings with microsoft intune
data.description: Introducing Device Firmware Management Configuration Interface (DFCI) as managed through Microsoft Intune for Surface devices. Now you can lock down the BIOS menu as part of Windows Autopilot device setup and manage BIOS settings for all your devices from the Microsoft 365 Device Management Admin Center. Learn how to add DFCI management to your Autopilot deployment, configure settings for boot options and hardware restrictions, and retire devices from DFCI management.

data.title: Managing your ML lifecycle with Azure Databricks and Azure Machine Learning
data.sortTitle: managing your ml lifecycle with azure databricks and azure machine learning
data.description: Machine learning development has new complexities beyond software development. There are a myriad of tools and frameworks which make it hard to track experiments, reproduce results, and deploy machine learning models. Learn how you can accelerate and manage your end-to-end machine learning lifecycle on Azure Databricks using MLflow and Azure ML to reliably build, share, and deploy machine learning applications using Azure Databricks.

data.title: Mark Russinovich shares the future of cloud native applications
data.sortTitle: mark russinovich shares the future of cloud native applications
data.description: Join Mark to learn the details on upcoming announcements in Azure Compute.

data.title: Match workloads to a hybrid cloud mix of Azure and Azure Stack for best fit consumption and management
data.sortTitle: match workloads to a hybrid cloud mix of azure and azure stack for best fit consumption and management
data.description: You accepted the advantages of cloud but determining workload placement is one of the biggest challenges. Get it wrong, it’s expensive. Placement also differs for product managers, developers, or IT operations. How is that addressed? HPE’s expertise, tooling ecosystem and methodologies helps discover and assess your entire application portfolio taking various viewpoints and operational criteria into data-based analysis determining application placement strategy and planning. We call this HPE Right Mix Advisor. Once you have your right mix of hybrid cloud defined, you can use HPE GreenLake Hybrid Cloud for Microsoft Azure and Azure Stack to achieve an as-a-service experience, the efficiencies of which allow you to focus all resources on driving innovation.

data.title: Maximize security with Windows Server 2019 and Azure
data.sortTitle: maximize security with windows server 2019 and azure
data.description: This session demonstrates end-to-end how to secure your servers using all the security features of Windows Server 2019, including ones you may not have heard about. You’ll see how your Azure cloud-native and on-prem (e.g. hybrid) servers can be the most secure by leveraging features and services such as Azure Disk Encryption/BitLocker, Azure Security Center, Microsoft Defender Advanced Threat Protection, Credential Guard, System Guard, and more.

data.title: Maximizing ROI in SQL Data Warehouse with enhanced workload management
data.sortTitle: maximizing roi in sql data warehouse with enhanced workload management
data.description: SQL Data Warehouse now offers enhanced workload management capabilities that optimize query execution to ensure that high-value work gets priority access to system resources. With features such as workload importance, customers can use a single SQL Data Warehouse database to more efficiently run multiple workloads, taking away the complexity of separate data warehouses for each solution. With this new capability, SQL Data Warehouse enables better control, utilization, and optimization over deployed resources.

data.title: Maximizing your Azure Databricks deployment
data.sortTitle: maximizing your azure databricks deployment
data.description: Looking to get the most out of your Azure Databricks resources? Whether you’re new to Spark or an Azure Databricks veteran, attend and learn the tips, tricks, and best practices for working with Azure Databricks. Based on experiences with real industry customers, these best practices cover deployments, management, security, networking, monitoring, machine learning, and more. Come see how the power of Azure Databricks’ managed Spark experience can benefit your analytics pipeline!

data.title: Meet Microsoft Surface
data.sortTitle: meet microsoft surface
data.description: Designed by Microsoft, the Surface portfolio is engineered to deliver the best Windows 10 and Office 365 experiences at home and work. Together with our customers, we are leading to support world-class deployment, management and security as part of business and education transformation.

data.title: Microservices and cloud native: Standard Bank's DevOps journey
data.sortTitle: microservices and cloud native: standard bank's devops journey
data.description:
At Standard Bank we're always exploring new technologies, and we've deployed two separate apps in the insurance space built using microservices and relying on many Azure services. However, the real hero in our digital transformation journey was Azure DevOps.
 
We look at how we used Azure Pipelines and other DevOps services on Azure to build and deploy our apps. This includes App Center (for building and distributing Kotlin, Swift, and React Native apps), and infrastructure-as-code with Azure Pipelines and ARM to automate our infra and app deployments.

We also explain how Azure DevOps has had a positive effect on our working environment, boosting team confidence, and why we feel it is the ideal platform for us moving forward.

data.title: Microsoft 365 admin center demo-fest: Crash course on latest and greatest management tools
data.sortTitle: microsoft 365 admin center demo-fest: crash course on latest and greatest management tools
data.description: Join us for a demo-fest of the latest innovations in the Microsoft 365 admin experiences. You will walk away with new tools in your toolbelt to streamline common admin tasks and processes so you can be more agile every day.

data.title: Microsoft 365 admin: Ask us anything
data.sortTitle: microsoft 365 admin: ask us anything
data.description: Bring your questions! We're here to help. A panel of experts from across Microsoft 365 admin center, device management, Exchange, SharePoint, and security and compliance will answer your questions about Microsoft 365 administration.

data.title: Microsoft 365 network performance testing, scoring, and recommendations
data.sortTitle: microsoft 365 network performance testing, scoring, and recommendations
data.description: Does your Microsoft 365 network architecture design need a tune-up? The Microsoft 365 admin center now includes network diagnostics and performance recommendations. We dive into the tests performed for the Microsoft 365 network performance recommendations, and how to use the test results and recommendations to improve your Office 365 user experience.

data.title: Microsoft 365: Empowering everyone with AI
data.sortTitle: microsoft 365: empowering everyone with ai
data.description: Microsoft 365, the world’s productivity cloud, empowers connected experiences, integrated workflows, and intelligent security. With a workforce more diverse than ever before—five generations, many different languages, a wide range of disabilities, 70% of which are invisible—creating these empowering experiences for each and every person is a significant undertaking. Join this session to learn how AI-powered capabilities built into Microsoft 365 can empower everyone, and get an inside look at what we’re up to and what we have planned.

data.title: Microsoft Azure Backup: Deep dive into Azure's built-in data protection solution
data.sortTitle: microsoft azure backup: deep dive into azure's built-in data protection solution
data.description: Find out how Azure Backup comprehensively protects your data assets in Azure through a simple, secure, and cost-effective solution that requires zero-infrastructure. In this session we present important enhancements to built-in capabilities of Azure Backup to secure your data, and to govern and optimize data-protection for your expanding estate in Azure. Learn more about the support for a new set of workloads such as SAP, SQL, Linux, and Azure Files; as well as new capabilities such as cross-region restore and security enhancements that bolster the data-protection promise.

data.title: Microsoft Azure Data Box Edge overview
data.sortTitle: microsoft azure data box edge overview
data.description: Learn about the latest innovations on Azure Data Box Edge to enable edge computing for your business.

data.title: Microsoft Azure Portal: Ten tips to get more out of Azure
data.sortTitle: microsoft azure portal: ten tips to get more out of azure
data.description: If you're new to Azure or a seasoned Azure user, come learn everything that's new in the Azure Portal to be more productive managing Azure resources. We also walk you through tips and tricks for creating and managing your resources efficiently.

data.title: Microsoft Azure: PowerShell secrets management
data.sortTitle: microsoft azure: powershell secrets management
data.description: Advanced scripts that touch many systems require multiple secrets and types of secrets particularly when orchestrating across heterogeneous clouds. The best practice is to not hard code any secrets in scripts, but currently this requires custom code on different platforms to handle securely. In PowerShell 7, a new secrets management model will allow users to securely use secrets to automate complex cloud orchestration and development. Find out how to enhance your Azure development experience with PowerShell secrets management.

data.title: Microsoft commercial marketplace: Acquire key integrated business applications for Microsoft 365
data.sortTitle: microsoft commercial marketplace: acquire key integrated business applications for microsoft 365
data.description: Explore new key Microsoft 365 integrated solutions that deliver next-level productivity for your organization with the Microsoft commercial marketplace. In this session, discover how these applications integrate with your IT security and compliance requirements. Learn how you can quickly acquire and automatically deploy these solutions to your company to achieve bigger and quicker business success, and how you can manage application governance with business decision makers.

data.title: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central embedded in Office 365
data.sortTitle: microsoft dynamics 365 business central embedded in office 365
data.description: This fast-paced session shows you how SMCs are driving value to ALL employees with an embedded ERP solution across Office 365 and the Microsoft Power Platform. Come see how one company has extended Dynamics 365 Business Central from installer to accountant to save time, money, and effort to their specific internal processes.

data.title: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central embedded in Office 365 (Repeat)
data.sortTitle: microsoft dynamics 365 business central embedded in office 365 (repeat)
data.description: This fast-paced session shows you how SMCs are driving value to ALL employees with an embedded ERP solution across Office 365 and the Microsoft Power Platform. Come see how one company has extended Dynamics 365 Business Central from installer to accountant to save time, money, and effort to their specific internal processes.

data.title: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central: A unified solution
data.sortTitle: microsoft dynamics 365 business central: a unified solution
data.description: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central is a unified solution with many other Microsoft services. Come to this session to better understand the unification points and how to get started on each. Examples include Outlook, Word, Excel, Power BI, PowerApps, and Microsoft Flow, to name a few.

data.title: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Commerce roadmap and strategy
data.sortTitle: microsoft dynamics 365 commerce roadmap and strategy
data.description: Learn about the new capability being made available as part of the Dynamics 365 Commerce offering. Hear about the new functionality as well as about all the investments being made in what was previously known as Dynamics 365 for Retail.

data.title: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance roadmap and strategy, and globalization roadmap
data.sortTitle: microsoft dynamics 365 finance roadmap and strategy, and globalization roadmap
data.description: Learn about the roadmap and key recent investments made to Dynamics 365 Finance from the Microsoft Engineering team. During this session, see the new functionality recently released regarding settlement capability. Also, learn about configurable business documents and the roadmap we have for globalization capabilities in the future.

data.title: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Sales and Sales Insights Roadmap: A vision for meeting the demands of the modern buyer
data.sortTitle: microsoft dynamics 365 sales and sales insights roadmap: a vision for meeting the demands of the modern buyer
data.description: Customer expectations are higher than ever – how can sales teams deliver to the demands of the modern-day buyer and meet revenue goals at the same time? In this session, hear how Microsoft Dynamics 365 Sales, Dynamics 365 Sales Insights and LinkedIn, plus the new mixed reality Product Visualize application, are helping to solve these challenges. Get an overview of our strategy and vision, product roadmap, and recent releases, and learn directly from the team building our sales solutions.

data.title: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management roadmap and strategy
data.sortTitle: microsoft dynamics 365 supply chain management roadmap and strategy
data.description: Learn about the roadmap and key recent investments made to Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management from the Microsoft Engineering team. During this session, see capabilities such as Asset Management, Planning Optimization, as well as a long list of other key capabilities that will be available soon!

data.title: Microsoft Graph Toolkit: Two lines of code to get started with Microsoft Graph
data.sortTitle: microsoft graph toolkit: two lines of code to get started with microsoft graph
data.description: The Microsoft Graph Toolkit offers reusable and functional web components for common experiences that work with any web framework. With only few lines of code, any web application can leverage Microsoft Graph through web framework agnostic components, such as a people picker, person card, tasks, agenda (calendar) and more. These components work with Microsoft Graph without any work from the developer and work great in any modern web application, SharePoint web parts, Microsoft Teams tabs, and more. Join our demo-heavy theater session to learn how to, with only few lines of code, authenticate users and build Microsoft Graph powered experiences.

data.title: Microsoft identity platform best practices for developers
data.sortTitle: microsoft identity platform best practices for developers
data.description: This session walks through the details of how the Microsoft identity platform works for authentication and authorization. We cover how developers can architect their solutions for the best user experience, best practices for working permissions and consent, and debugging techniques for authentication and authorization.

data.title: Microsoft Office Privacy Controls and Diagnostic Data
data.sortTitle: microsoft office privacy controls and diagnostic data
data.description: Office uses the power of the Microsoft Cloud to deliver exciting new capabilities to individuals and organizations. Diagnostic data is used to help Microsoft keep Office and these experiences secure, up to date, and performing as customers expect. Some organizations have wondered what happens to this data; how it's used; and how they might control the flow.  The product truth has undergone revolutionary change over the past year, including the ability for commercial customer IT departments to control this data. Attendees of this session will gain a deep understanding about diagnostic data, identify the benefits of diagnostic data to organizations and their users, learn about the controls provided IT to view and manage this data, and hear from a customer that has implemented the controls.

data.title: Microsoft OneDrive deployment and adoption deep-dive
data.sortTitle: microsoft onedrive deployment and adoption deep-dive
data.description: OneDrive transforms file sharing and collaboration. Learn how to deploy the OneDrive client at scale, leverage features like files on-demand and known folder move to improve desktop compliance and network performance. Explore best practices for adoption, and how to get the right stakeholders involved. Discover tips, tricks, and training for users and admins.

data.title: Microsoft Planner in Microsoft 365
data.sortTitle: microsoft planner in microsoft 365
data.description: Find out how you can seamlessly integrate Planner with other Microsoft 365 technologies such as To-Do, Teams, Office documents, and SharePoint.

data.title: Microsoft Power BI: Business intelligence strategy, vision, and roadmap update
data.sortTitle: microsoft power bi: business intelligence strategy, vision, and roadmap update
data.description: Power BI enables customers and partners to do more with their data. Come to this session and join our business intelligence leadership as we share the latest information about our strategy, vision, and roadmap for Power BI.

data.title: Microsoft Power BI: Delivering business value with AI
data.sortTitle: microsoft power bi: delivering business value with ai
data.description: Learn about the latest AI capabilities in Power BI and the upcoming roadmap with a focus on the latest changes in Q&A, AI visualizations, and AutoML. Learn how these innovations can deliver business value.

data.title: Microsoft Power BI: Paginated reports and SSRS 2019 and the hybrid cloud
data.sortTitle: microsoft power bi: paginated reports and ssrs 2019 and the hybrid cloud
