data.description: Join us to learn what's new for SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS) in 2019 and the path forward in the cloud with paginated reports in Power BI, organizations to view and interact with their pixel-perfect paginated reports right alongside their existing Power BI interactive reports. We cover report authoring, subscriptions, management, migration, and more.

data.title: Microsoft Power BI: Roadmap for enterprise information management – data lineage and impact analysis, data protection, and data discovery
data.sortTitle: microsoft power bi: roadmap for enterprise information management – data lineage and impact analysis, data protection, and data discovery
data.description: BI professionals use Microsoft Power BI today to build complex analytical projects spanning multiple data sources, artifacts, and dependencies. This session covers some of the new experiences we’re introducing to help administrators and professionals to manage and govern these advanced analytical projects. Come and learn more about how we are empowering our users to track lineage and understand impact across their projects, discover their organizational assets, or set granular policies and controls, all key to their daily work.

data.title: Microsoft PowerApps: Tried and tested techniques for establishing a Center of Excellence
data.sortTitle: microsoft powerapps: tried and tested techniques for establishing a center of excellence
data.description: Learn how enterprise IT departments have established a Center of Excellence (CoE) to drive internal adoption of Microsoft PowerApps and handle governance for hundreds of production apps. Using examples from organizations such as London Heathrow airport, SNCF, Chevron, and internally at Microsoft, we walk through strategies, best practices, and tooling approaches that have helped land low-code powered digital transformation.

data.title: Microsoft Project and Microsoft Planner reporting and dashboards
data.sortTitle: microsoft project and microsoft planner reporting and dashboards
data.description: Come learn how to build reports and dashboards for the new Project and Planner.

data.title: Microsoft Surface engineering deep dive: Behind the scenes of hardware innovation
data.sortTitle: microsoft surface engineering deep dive: behind the scenes of hardware innovation
data.description: Explore how Surface brings new technologies and capabilities to light while maintaining a consistent delivery of premium, quality products. Learn how the Surface engineering process can help your organization deliver better experiences and empower your users. Dive into the details of how devices are designed and built from the ground up for stability, security, and performance.

data.title: Microsoft Surface Hub 2S IT pro deep dive
data.sortTitle: microsoft surface hub 2s it pro deep dive
data.description: Come to this session for a deep dive review of the new Surface Hub 2S. We will review the latest in UEFI integration, 4K best-in-class touch display and purpose built, walk-up-and-use OS.  Learn the steps needed to physically install, integrate into Microsoft 365, and techniques for adoption into the enterprise. You’ll walk away with a firm understanding of the product from the inside out and how to easily deploy, manage, and secure this amazing device.

data.title: Microsoft Surface in education: Making it simple for IT while improving experiences for teachers and students
data.sortTitle: microsoft surface in education: making it simple for it while improving experiences for teachers and students
data.description: Schools are looking for ways to improve classroom time, improve learning outcomes, and minimize the overhead to IT with the implementation of new technology. Microsoft Surface portfolio of devices continues to enable teachers and students to more with their teaching and learning while ensuring IT leaders and teams are supported with the Microsoft stack with ease of deployment, management, and care. Join us to learn how schools globally are harnessing the capabilities of Surface to transform the classroom while IT teams are embracing the new capabilities that Surface brings to improve deployment and management experiences.

data.title: Microsoft Surface – the best device for your modern workplace tech refresh
data.sortTitle: microsoft surface – the best device for your modern workplace tech refresh
data.description: Learn the characteristics of a highly productive Windows 10 device that is built ready for the modern management and security of Microsoft 365. As you evaluate your next tech refresh, you’ll want to ensure your investment lets you take advantage of all the innovations built into Windows 10 and ultimately Microsoft 365. We discuss and illuminate the key focus areas that challenge IT professionals and TDMs. Lead Surface product makers share the innovation and collaboration that takes place throughout Microsoft engineering to build a device that adopts first and best the distinct advancements within Microsoft 365.

data.title: Microsoft Teams architecture update
data.sortTitle: microsoft teams architecture update
data.description: Join us for a deep dive into the architecture of the Teams clients and the microservices it talks to: who does what, how and where data is stored, and how it's kept secure and compliant. Learn about our investments to improve performance, reduce memory use and network bandwidth, deliver rich new "One Microsoft" features, and how we're re-writing our clients on a new platform while still releasing every week. Learn how Teams will support VDI, and about the latest enhancements to the scalable microservices that power Teams.

data.title: Microsoft Teams demonstration
data.sortTitle: microsoft teams demonstration
data.description: See the hub for teamwork in action with 20 minutes of solid demonstration of the core capabilities of Microsoft Teams for file sharing, meetings, and app integrations.

data.title: Microsoft Teams for firstline workers: Delighting guests and visitors in customer service industries
data.sortTitle: microsoft teams for firstline workers: delighting guests and visitors in customer service industries
data.description: It takes a village to create unforgettable experiences for your customers. Whether it is a guest at a hotel or a visitor in a theme park, Microsoft Teams enables your firstline workers to stay connected and easily collaborate to bring magical moments to life. Join us to learn how the latest capabilities in Teams are revolutionizing the hospitality industry.

data.title: Microsoft Teams for firstline workers: Increasing coordination across your production line
data.sortTitle: microsoft teams for firstline workers: increasing coordination across your production line
data.description: Behind a great product, there is a group people who work together every day to transform an idea into reality. Empower your manufacturing workforce with the communication and collaboration capabilities they need to increase productivity, enforce quality control standards, and create amazing products for your customers more efficiently.

data.title: Microsoft Teams for firstline workers: Unlocking the best experience for retail customers
data.sortTitle: microsoft teams for firstline workers: unlocking the best experience for retail customers
data.description: From streamlining shift management to simplifying inventory processes, Microsoft Teams can help your firstline workers be more productive so they can spend more time assisting customers. Learn how Teams is transforming productivity and teamwork in the retail industry.

data.title: Microsoft Teams for government workers
data.sortTitle: microsoft teams for government workers
data.description: Microsoft Teams is the new hub for teamwork for government! Learn the fundamentals of Microsoft Teams in this introductory session with a focus on what features government organizations use most. See in action how Microsoft Teams can empower U.S. and worldwide government agencies with the capabilities they need to enable effective collaboration while helping to protect sensitive information. The demo will be from a Microsoft Office 365 GCC tenant.

data.title: Microsoft Teams on your phone: Tips, tricks, and what makes it unique
data.sortTitle: microsoft teams on your phone: tips, tricks, and what makes it unique
data.description: An average adult spends nearly three hours a day on their mobile phone. Come learn how the Microsoft Teams mobile app can help you optimize your time and stay productive. Learn what’s unique about the Teams mobile app experience, and how Teams mobile can help light up unique scenarios for your business.

data.title: Microsoft tools and programs can jumpstart your SQL Server migration to Azure
data.sortTitle: microsoft tools and programs can jumpstart your sql server migration to azure
data.description: Windows Server and SQL Server are best on Azure. With unmatched security, unparalleled innovation, unbeatable offers and built-in hybrid, Azure is the best destination for your workloads. In this session, we are bringing together prescriptive guidance and tools you need to bring your data workloads to Azure. The Azure Migration Program uses Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure methodology, tools such Azure Database Migration Service, resources, and best practices. Azure Migration Program will enable you to simplify and accelerate your move to the cloud, working hand in hand with Microsoft experts and specialized migration partners. Make the move with confidence.

data.title: Migrate and protect your production applications running on Azure Disks
data.sortTitle: migrate and protect your production applications running on azure disks
data.description: Migrating an organization's data and applications and building a business continuity plan is a critical function of an IT team. Microsoft Azure offers unique platform capabilities including Incremental Snapshots, direct upload, and programmatic access to disks which enables highly optimized migration and data protection solutions on Azure. Come join us to deep dive on these unique capabilities and how you can leverage them in your environment.

data.title: Migrate or build internet-scale applications using MySQL
data.sortTitle: migrate or build internet-scale applications using mysql
data.description: MySQL is used to power industry’s mission-critical internet applications and is the most widely used relational open source database. Learn how you can use Azure’s fully-managed MySQL service to secure the database, meet all your compliance policy and controls, maintain business continuity, and deliver optimal performance. If you are looking to modernize and migrate to Azure, we show you how you can achieve this goal with best practices. Come and learn from success stories from our customers that you can apply to your next project.

data.title: Migrate your NFS workloads to Azure Blob Storage
data.sortTitle: migrate your nfs workloads to azure blob storage
data.description: Workloads that use NFS 3 on premises can migrate to Azure Storage using the scale, low cost, and manageability of Azure Blobs. In this theater we demo NFS, highlight performance, roadmap, and additional management capabilities that provide a high scale, low cost NFS offering.

data.title: Mining your data for gold with Luis and Elad
data.sortTitle: mining your data for gold with luis and elad
data.description: Recent advancements in AI are enabling a new level of mining structured and unstructured data across a broad range of industries. Join Luis Cabrera and Elad Ziklik to walk through the latest announcements and use cases in knowledge mining.

data.title: Mission critical performance with SQL Server 2019
data.sortTitle: mission critical performance with sql server 2019
data.description: SQL Server has provided enterprises the capability to manage all facets of their relational data. Join us to learn about improvements that SQL Server 2019 is shipping for making your favorite database platform more intelligent, available, and faster. We provide insights into how customers are realizing better ROI with SQL Server 2019 and explain the new enhancements for intelligent database, in-memory database, and high availability. Come learn about the new functionality in SQL Server including data virtualization, new features for mission critical security and HADR, and new scenarios for Linux.

data.title: Mission-critical Azure at any scale
data.sortTitle: mission-critical azure at any scale
data.description: To satisfy mission-essential workloads on Azure, Microsoft’s Critical Infrastructure Engineering team develops reference implementations of both hyper-scale workloads and forward-deployed edge systems that can still deliver cloud-level reliability and flexibility at any scale. In this session we review proven architectures that can ensure Azure enables unique scenarios such as embedding Azure in vehicles to support rapid-deployment anywhere in the world, AI solutions for disaster response and crowd management, disconnected and low-connected environments and multi-petabyte workloads such as Accumulo on Azure. Learn how Microsoft builds systems to survive, when everything else doesn’t – and techniques you can apply to less critical systems.

data.title: Mobile app development reimagined with Xamarin and .NET
data.sortTitle: mobile app development reimagined with xamarin and .net
data.description: Xamarin enables C# developers to become native iOS, Android, and Windows mobile app developers overnight. In this session, learn how to leverage your existing .NET and C# skills to create iOS and Android mobile apps with .NET, Visual Studio, and Xamarin. This session also gives you the tools to determine how much existing C# code can go mobile to iOS and Android, plus helps you determine the architecture necessary to support maximum code sharing and reuse. Finally, we cover the Xamarin platform and show you how to create native iOS, Android, and Windows apps with several live coding adventures. You will leave with the knowledge necessary to create your first iOS and Android mobile app in C# with Xamarin and Visual Studio.

data.title: Modern Exchange IT admin experiences
data.sortTitle: modern exchange it admin experiences
data.description: You, our IT professional community, spoke and we listened. You told us the Exchange Admin Center (EAC) was a little dated (that was the polite feedback, some was considerably more colorful). You told us it was disjointed and counterintuitive, so we built a new one with new features in the Microsoft 365 admin center! You also told us Exchange Online PowerShell had performance issues, disconnects, and timeouts. So, we built new cmdlets that have great performance, are super reliable and support OAuth. Come and hear all about these new tools and get your first look at the improved Exchange admin experience!

data.title: Modernize your authentiation with Azure Active Directory
data.sortTitle: modernize your authentiation with azure active directory
data.description: Embrace modern authentication for your users and their single sign-on into apps with Azure Active Directory. Come see the latest tools that can help you plan and deploy a rollout of cloud authentication and also migrate your apps to cloud management and security.

data.title: Modernize your hybrid identity with Azure Active Directory
data.sortTitle: modernize your hybrid identity with azure active directory
data.description: Come to this session to learn how to transform your identity and access management to a modern cloud-first hybrid solution using Azure Active Directory. In this session, learn essentials for hybrid identity including integration hybrid directors, connecting applications across clouds, automating processes, and more.

data.title: Modernize your IT environment and applications with Windows Containers
data.sortTitle: modernize your it environment and applications with windows containers
data.description: This session provides an introductory overview of Windows containers with a pivot to showcase how to modernize your IT and apps with containers. We’ll cover container concepts, demonstrate how to get started on Windows Server/Windows 10 with Docker for Windows, and share best practices on containerizing traditional Windows applications. If you are either new to containers or a veteran, an IT pro/system engineer or an app developer/architect, you want to stay on-premises or you are ready for the cloud, we are excited to partner with you on this modernization journey!

data.title: Modernize your Microsoft Dynamics 365 business applications using mixed reality
data.sortTitle: modernize your microsoft dynamics 365 business applications using mixed reality
data.description: Advance your business applications and improve process workflows by blending the physical and digital with mixed reality. In this session, learn about how mixed reality solutions such as the Microsoft HoloLens and Microsoft Dynamics 365 Remote Assist, Guides, Layout, and Product Visualize evolve how firstline workers interact with the people, places, and things most important to them and your business. See how using holograms and IoT sensors to recognize physical environments can empower your business to be more intelligent, efficient, and effective. Modernize your Dynamics 365 and business application ecosystems by infusing the power of Microsoft mixed reality solutions.

data.title: Modernize your retail stores or branch offices with Azure Stack HCI
data.sortTitle: modernize your retail stores or branch offices with azure stack hci
data.description: Your requirements are clear: every location needs a few local, highly-available virtual machines to run critical infrastructure like security cameras or point-of-sale that simply can’t move to the cloud. How can Azure Stack HCI help? Come learn how to design the perfect two-node hyperconverged cluster on a tight budget, and tricks to manage and monitor at fleet scale using cloud-based Azure management services. Keywords: Hyper-V, Storage Spaces Direct, Windows Admin Center

data.title: Modernize your WinForms & WPF applications with .NET Core and Windows 10
data.sortTitle: modernize your winforms & wpf applications with .net core and windows 10
data.description: Come learn about the future for your WPF and Windows Forms applications. Understand how .NET Core and MSIX can give you more control of your application and runtime deployment.  Find out how Windows 10, XAML Islands, and WinUI can bring modern platform capabilities and UI to your existing applications.

data.title: Monitoring your environment to optimize the Microsoft Teams experience
data.sortTitle: monitoring your environment to optimize the microsoft teams experience
data.description: Learn how the Microsoft Teams admin center can help you ensure your are delivering the best experience to your users by providing you insights about the state of your Teams environment.

data.title: Move to Windows 10 and Office 365 ProPlus with guidance from FastTrack
data.sortTitle: move to windows 10 and office 365 proplus with guidance from fasttrack
data.description: Explore how FastTrack can help your organization move to Windows 10 and Microsoft Office 365 ProPlus, so your users can work securely from anywhere. Also, learn how to protect business data and devices by addressing essential security and compliance issues, and find out how FastTrack can help you address any application compatibility issues that you may encounter along the way.

data.title: Moving from Microsoft Dynamics 365 on-premises to online
data.sortTitle: moving from microsoft dynamics 365 on-premises to online
data.description: In this session, we describe and explain the services available to customers and implementation partners to assist in the migration from a CRM on-premises organization to the cloud. We present how our migration tool and services can greatly simplify the move from a CRM on-premises organization to Dynamics 365 Customer Engagement Online while explaining how the costs and hurdles for the migration can be significantly reduced.   Additionally, we describe the mechanism with which an eligible customer can be nominated into the FastTrack managed process and gain access to these services and the key learnings through the migration process.

data.title: Moving the Web Forward: Microsoft Edge for web developers
data.sortTitle: moving the web forward: microsoft edge for web developers
data.description: The next version of Microsoft Edge is built on a new foundation, powered by Chromium. This foundation will empower you with a consistent set of developer tools and enable you to deliver powerful standards-based and hybrid application experiences using web technologies. In this session, we’ll share how our upcoming release simplifies cross-browser testing and enables the latest capabilities for your sites and LOB apps, plus our ongoing contributions to Chromium that improve the browser experience for everyone. Finally, we’ll reveal what’s next for web developers in Microsoft Edge.

data.title: MSIX App Attach: The future of app delivery in virtual environments
data.sortTitle: msix app attach: the future of app delivery in virtual environments
data.description: Containerize and dynamically mount apps to virtual machines in Azure—without having to create a footprint on the OS partition. MSIX App Attach represents the final step in the journey to fully dynamic workspaces in the cloud, building on earlier innovations around roaming user profiles, and this session gives you the knowledge you need to take that final step.

data.title: Must attend: Introducing the next-generation of analytics on Microsoft Azure
data.sortTitle: must attend: introducing the next-generation of analytics on microsoft azure
data.description: Join us to learn about the latest cloud analytics innovations from Azure Data. From changing the way you think about managing data in the cloud to simplifying how you build a modern data warehouse solution, come see how we are redefining cloud analytics. Watch live demos, learn the latest updates, and hear directly from customers how running their analytics in Azure is transforming their business.

data.title: NBD: Training ML models with Microsoft Graph data connect
data.sortTitle: nbd: training ml models with microsoft graph data connect
data.description: Attend this session to discover a new set of tools we’ve created to make it even easier to work with Microsoft 365 datasets at scale. We show you how easy it is to set up a development environment, enable sample data flows, and create powerful analytics and insights that can transform organizational productivity, collaboration, well-being and more.

data.title: Need help moving to Windows 10 and Office 365 ProPlus? FastTrack is here to help!
data.sortTitle: need help moving to windows 10 and office 365 proplus? fasttrack is here to help!
data.description: FastTrack is your advisor to help deploy Windows 10 and Microsoft Office 365 ProPlus at no additional cost. Come to this session to hear best practices and customer stories from FastTrack experts. Also, learn how we can help in your journey to securely onboard Windows 10 devices and Office 365 ProPlus, and keep your devices up to date.

data.title: New cloud-based disaster recovery capabilities in Azure Site Recovery
data.sortTitle: new cloud-based disaster recovery capabilities in azure site recovery
data.description: Azure Site Recovery (ASR) is the built-in business continuity/disaster recovery (BC/DR) technology that streamlines failover from on-premises to Microsoft Azure, Azure Stack, or across Azure regions. In this session, learn how to minimize RTO and RPO objectives for your applications and take advantage of the latest capabilities to manage Windows, Linux-based apps, and specific considerations for web apps, SAP, and data-intensive workloads. We share real-world best practices on how Microsoft and our customers are using ASR at scale.

data.title: New innovations in modern Windows 10 PC security
data.sortTitle: new innovations in modern windows 10 pc security
data.description: Join us to learn how we can help you protect your end-users that handle mission-critical data in some of the most data-sensitive industries. Hear the latest news about the exciting new modern Window 10 Pro PCs that come with the highest level of hardware, software, and identity protection ready right out of the box. We’ve partnered with our OEM partners to tightly integrate hardware, firmware and the Windows 10 operating system, so this new class of PCs is always protecting against threats, with device security rooted in hardware and guarded with secure, evolving cloud-based software to protect your data and identities. In this session, see a variety of PCs from some of your favorite OEMs.

data.title: New, fast, and reliable Exchange Online Powershell cmdlets
data.sortTitle: new, fast, and reliable exchange online powershell cmdlets
data.description: Join us as we demo the new EXO PowerShell experience. We’ve created new EXO cmdlets which solve the performance, disconnect, and timeout issues that often troubled admins as they managed their EXO environment. We explain the changes we made and how they address the issue and share the new features enabled by our new cmdlets. See how to leverage the new fast and reliable cmdlets to achieve the productivity gains from these small tricks and edits.

data.title: Next-generation agent experiences for customer service
data.sortTitle: next-generation agent experiences for customer service
data.description: In this session, learn about the next generation of the agent experiences and how it empowers agents to deliver personalized and efficient services to meet the rising customer needs. See how agents can work simultaneously on different customer interactions via different channels (e.g. chat, SMS and phone) in contextually rich sessions. Learn how the recently added productivity tools, like macros, can be used by agents to perform repetitive error prone tasks in a single click. Also, learn how agents can leverage the guidance scripts and smart assistants to deliver a high quality service experience to customers, while adhering to the organizational processes. Finally, learn about how to customize these productivity tools for your organizational needs.
products: Dynamics 365	Virtual Agent for Customer Service

data.title: Next-generation Azure Data services (new product announcements)
data.sortTitle: next-generation azure data services (new product announcements)
data.description: Save this breakout session slot to learn more about new product announcements regarding Azure Data services that will be made at Microsoft Ignite.

data.title: No more spreadsheets - assess and manage your IT risks with Compliance Score
data.sortTitle: no more spreadsheets - assess and manage your it risks with compliance score
data.description: Are you still using spreadsheets to track and manage your security and privacy controls? Are you still relying on point-in-time assessment to manage your IT risks? If yes, come to this session to learn more about how you can leverage Compliance Score to automate risk assessments, manage your data protection controls in a cloud-based tool, and continuously monitor and improve your IT risks with Compliance Score.

data.title: Now is the time to modernize your datacenter and migrate your applications to Microsoft Azure Stack
data.sortTitle: now is the time to modernize your datacenter and migrate your applications to microsoft azure stack
data.description: Successfully migrating your workloads to Azure Stack isn’t just about the lift and shift. Focus on modernization of customer workloads as well as the operations around them. Learn how to improve operational aspects of customer workloads using cloud services on Azure Stack before redesigning existing solutions. This session covers a migration framework, partner ecosystem for migration tools, ways to start an Infrastructure as Code practice, operational benefits of using Azure Stack and tie into the DevOps practices from an infrastructure perspective.

data.title: Office 365 email enhancements that makes your organization smart, safe, and secure
data.sortTitle: office 365 email enhancements that makes your organization smart, safe, and secure
data.description:
Despite the popularity of social messaging apps, 62% of business professionals prefer email for business communications. With the number of emails delivered daily worldwide forecast to grow 18% by 2023, the criticality of email for businesses is unquestionable. In this session we pull the curtain back on some new and improved Office 365 email features for admins and users - things like the following:
 
•	New Exchange Admin Center and Mail Flow dashboard and insights 
•	Better protect your organization’s email with customizable recipient limits and authenticated SMTP management 
•	Send-from-proxy aliases give users greater messaging flexibility
•	New Office 365 Message Recall revamps the popular Outlook feature for the cloud

data.title: Office 365 Groups: Ask us anything
data.sortTitle: office 365 groups: ask us anything
data.description: Do you have questions about Office 365 Groups? We have the experts with the answers! Groups are a cornerstone of teamwork in Microsoft 365, providing cross application group membership so teams can easily collaborate in their favorite apps. This interactive panel of Microsoft and MVP experts will answer any question you may have about Office 365 Groups usage, adoption, governance, product roadmap, and more. There should be lots to talk about. Don’t be shy!

data.title: Office document collaboration
data.sortTitle: office document collaboration
data.description: As the pace of change in the business environment and volume of information continue to rapidly increase, effective collaboration has become a mission-critical tool for individuals and organizations worldwide. Achieving better outcomes through collaboration requires the ability to tap into experts from your network, stay informed of changes to your document, and the ability to participate from any device. Furthermore, the definition of collaborative work is expanding to not only include people working together, but also people working in collaboration with artificial intelligence to achieve more. In this session we discuss the trends behind collaborative work and the latest document collaboration capabilities in Office 365 (and demonstrate how collaboration features can help you be more creative and productive)

data.title: One browser for modern and legacy web apps: Deploying Microsoft Edge and Internet Explorer mode
data.sortTitle: one browser for modern and legacy web apps: deploying microsoft edge and internet explorer mode
data.description: We have worked with numerous companies – ranging from 1000’s to 100,000’s of seats – to move from multiple browser environments to a single browser environment. We’ll share lessons learned and best practices for piloting and deploying the next version of Microsoft Edge by leveraging our investments in Internet Explorer mode, SCCM, and Intune.

data.title: One more thing: Microsoft Edge on macOS
data.sortTitle: one more thing: microsoft edge on macos
data.description: Introducing Microsoft Edge for macOS! In this session, we share how Microsoft Edge feels at home on Mac, how you can be more productive and secure using it, and our manageability story.

data.title: Oops, I deleted my Office365 or Azure data...now what?
data.sortTitle: oops, i deleted my office365 or azure data...now what?
data.description: Moving to the cloud means less things to worry about such as infrastructure and backup, right? Think again. Does your support desk get calls about fat-fingered deletions all the time? As companies adopt cloud technologies such as Microsoft Azure and Office 365, it’s important to understand corporate data responsibility, and what you can do to make sure your data is protected. Learn more about your developing data management strategy for cloud, best practices tips, and customer stories.

data.title: Optimal network connectivity for Office 365 performance: What is it and how to get there
data.sortTitle: optimal network connectivity for office 365 performance: what is it and how to get there
data.description: Optimal network connectivity is critical for great user experience in Office 365. Is your company on the path of changing its network for the cloud? Are you wondering if your network has minimal possible latency to Office 365 for your users and will remain future proof as the cloud continues to evolve? Then this session is for you. Hear directly from the Office 365 product group about principles of optimal connectivity for SaaS, review reference architecture for networking, and learn how various industry network solutions integrate with Office 365. You’ll leave with an understanding of optimizations as well as common pitfalls that stand between your users and delightful productivity cloud experiences!

data.title: Optimize your apps with quality tools for PowerApps
data.sortTitle: optimize your apps with quality tools for powerapps
data.description: Learn how to build, test, and troubleshoot high-quality and high-performance PowerApps apps by using built-in tools like App Diagnostics, PowerApps Test Framework, Solution Checker, and App Checker.

data.title: Optimizing coexistence on your path to Teams
data.sortTitle: optimizing coexistence on your path to teams
data.description: Determine the most suitable approach based on your current Skype for Business implementation and business goals with Teams. This session will review options for coexistence between Skype for Business and Teams, including scenario based considerations.

data.title: Optimizing the Microsoft Teams experience with data and analytics
data.sortTitle: optimizing the microsoft teams experience with data and analytics
data.description: Are your users taking full advantage of Microsoft Teams? Is your environment set up to deliver the best experience possible? Does your management know the business value provided by Teams and M365? Come out to this session and get a strong "YES!" to each of these questions as we discuss in depth the data and analytics capabilities of Microsoft Teams. Learn how data driven insights can accelerate adoption, improve service quality, and help optimize your network.

data.title: Optimizing Workforce Itinerary Scheduling and Travel Time with Bing Maps
data.sortTitle: optimizing workforce itinerary scheduling and travel time with bing maps
data.description: Modern workforce management requires state-of-the-art geospatial technologies and solutions. Do you have field staff that you need to assign to visit multiple customer locations? Do you want optimized routes for those visits? Save time and reduce costs by leveraging the recently released Bing Maps Multi-Itinerary Optimization API.

data.title: OS internals (for nerds only)
data.sortTitle: os internals (for nerds only)
data.description: Innovation in the core operating system platform is the foundation of enabling new scenarios core to securing, operating, and reducing cost across your datacenter. Hear directly from the operating system architects how they approach and design the technology behind features such as memory partitions, kernel soft reset, Windows Hypervisor Platform, isolated VMs, and system insights leveraging machine learning. Much of this technology has never been talked about publicly, until now – this is a session you won’t want to miss!

data.title: Outlook for Mac - re-invented!
data.sortTitle: outlook for mac - re-invented!
data.description: We know how much our customers love their Apple devices and we've invested lots of time and effort over the last year in Outlook for Mac. Come see the updated user experience rolling out first to early adopters right now. Rebuilt on the Microsoft sync technology, we showcase performance updates as well as new capabilities that align with the most demanding expectations of your executives and power users.

data.title: Outlook for Windows: In-app support brings you closer to the product team
data.sortTitle: outlook for windows: in-app support brings you closer to the product team
data.description: Outlook for Windows has just introduced the first version of in-app troubleshooting for end-users and in-app support for tenant admins. What does this mean for you and your users? We share what we have available today and our vision for the future. We also delve into how you can be part of our journey and influence how we choose what to build next, making support and the Outlook product even better!

data.title: Outlook for Windows: What's new and what's next
data.sortTitle: outlook for windows: what's new and what's next
data.description: Outlook for Windows has been around a long time and we all pretty much depend on it every day, don't we? We know how much our users depend on it and with every release we do our best to improve and make things even better, carefully. In this short and packed session we let you in on how we're continuing to improve the core Outlook desktop experience you all know and love.

data.title: Outlook mobile: The gold standard for secure communications in the enterprise
data.sortTitle: outlook mobile: the gold standard for secure communications in the enterprise
data.description: Outlook for iOS and Android helps separate work and personal data, even without device enrollment! Keep your users happy and productive while seamlessly managing how data can move between applications. We share details of our roadmap to further help keep your sensitive data safe with app configuration and protection capabilities, the Microsoft Information Protection sensitivity labeling, and our mobile S/MIME roll out. There is no better client for managing your enterprise email data.

data.title: Overview: Microsoft 365 workloads
data.sortTitle: overview: microsoft 365 workloads
data.description: Microsoft Graph is the API for Microsoft 365. Across Office 365, Windows, and Enterprise Mobility and Security you can use Microsoft Graph to power your custom application needs. Join this session to learn about the latest additions to Microsoft Graph and the tools, SDKs, and API capabilities you can incorporate in your projects. You'll take away code and tools you'll undoubtedly use as you build apps and services.

data.title: PaaSport to paradise: Lifting and shifting with Azure SQL Database + SSIS in Azure Data Factory
data.sortTitle: paasport to paradise: lifting and shifting with azure sql database + ssis in azure data factory
data.description: This session focuses on the all PaaS solution of Azure SQL DB/Managed Instance (MI) + SSIS in Azure Data Factory (ADF) to lift and shift, modernize, and extend ETL workflows. We first show you how to provision Azure-SSIS Integration Runtime (IR) – dedicated ADF servers for running SSIS – with SSIS catalog (SSISDB) hosted by Azure SQL DB/MI, configure it to access data on premises using Windows authentication and virtual network injection/self-hosted IR as a proxy, and extend it with custom/open source/third-party components. We next show you how to use the familiar SSDT/SSMS tools to design/test/deploy/execute your SSIS packages in the cloud just like you do on premises. Finally, we show you how to modernize your ETL workflows by invoking/scheduling SSIS package executions as first-class activities in ADF pipelines and combining/chaining them with other activities, allowing you to trigger your pipeline runs by events, automatically (de)provision SSIS IR just in time, etc.

data.title: Personalizer, an Azure Cognitive Service powered by reinforcement learning
data.sortTitle: personalizer, an azure cognitive service powered by reinforcement learning
data.description: How can enterprises personalize content rapidly and understand the nuances of user’s behavior. How did we approach this within Microsoft for personalizing content in Bing, MSN, and Xbox? Personalizer enables enterprise use of reinforcement learning for personalization with two lines of code! It enables full learning loop that runs at digital speed and learns from a simple reward score that optimizes towards your business’s goals. In this presentation we cover the why, what, and how behind Azure’s personalization service with practical scenarios and use cases.

data.title: Plan and implement a successful upgrade from Skype for Business to Microsoft Teams
data.sortTitle: plan and implement a successful upgrade from skype for business to microsoft teams
data.description: Explore the end-to-end Skype for Business to Teams upgrade experience, inclusive of technical and user readiness considerations. This session offers guidance for a successful upgrade as well as shares best practices and tips for avoiding common pitfalls when planning your upgrade. Hear from a customer who successfully completed their upgrade leveraging change management fundamentals and adoption resources to enable their users to embrace new ways of working.

data.title: Plan for Z-Day 2020: Windows Server 2008 end of support is coming!
data.sortTitle: plan for z-day 2020: windows server 2008 end of support is coming!
data.description: Windows Server 2008 still roams the earth. Support ends on January 14th: Z-Day! Learn how to migrate off legacy infrastructure machines with the Storage Migration Service, in-place upgrades, cluster rolling upgrades, and Azure Migrate. Modernize your on-premises workloads, explore Azure IaaS options, and get insider information on the roadmap. Watch Ned battle your servers that are going end-of-support with just a few clicks!

data.title: Planning and managing licensing and capacity for PowerApps and Microsoft Flow
data.sortTitle: planning and managing licensing and capacity for powerapps and microsoft flow
data.description: Do you have questions around how to plan licensing and capacity for your organization's or team's applications or processes? If so, then this is the session for you. We talk about the current and incoming capabilities of the platform and how you can take advantage and choose the right plans for your organization.

data.title: Power BI and Microsoft Information Protection: The game changer for secure BI
data.sortTitle: power bi and microsoft information protection: the game changer for secure bi
data.description: BI professionals use Microsoft Power BI today to build complex analytical projects spanning multiple data sources, artifacts, and dependencies. This session covers some of the new experiences we’re introducing to help administrators and professionals to manage and govern these advanced analytical projects, including Active Directory integration, BYOK, and Row Level Security, focusing on MIP and MCAS integration.

data.title: Power BI Premium: Microsoft's platform for enterprise BI
data.sortTitle: power bi premium: microsoft's platform for enterprise bi
data.description: Power BI Premium is Microsoft's enterprise BI platform that enables you to build comprehensive, enterprise-scale analytic solutions that deliver actionable insights. This session dives into the latest capabilities and future roadmap. Various topics are covered such as performance, scalability, management of Power BI artifacts, and monitoring. Learn how to use Power BI Premium to create semantic models that are reused throughout large, enterprise organizations.

data.title: Power your marketing with the 360-degree customer view and AI
data.sortTitle: power your marketing with the 360-degree customer view and ai
data.description: Optimize your demand generation with highly targeted audience segment based on 360-degree customer profiles from Microsoft Dynamics 365 Customer Insights and then let AI-based scheduling and marketing insights fuel your marketing execution for greater efficiencies.

data.title: PowerApps top 10: Major new capabilities that are shaping the future of low code
data.sortTitle: powerapps top 10: major new capabilities that are shaping the future of low code
data.description: Low-code app development is evolving rapidly, and Microsoft PowerApps is leading the way. This session recaps the incredible momentum in the platform – with a focus on showing off the top new features recently released that are expanding what’s possible for citizen and pro developers alike. From AI to external portals, we share a complete overview of the major innovation areas happening in PowerApps and how your can use these capabilities to bring the next level of digital intensity to your organization.

data.title: Powershell 7
data.sortTitle: powershell 7
data.description: Welcome to the new cross platform PowerShell 7. PowerShell 7 is cloud friendly, packed with new capabilities, and is fully compatible with Windows PowerShell so that you can run all your Windows automation using PowerShell 7.

data.title: PowerShell unplugged with Jeffrey Snover and Jason Helmick
data.sortTitle: powershell unplugged with jeffrey snover and jason helmick
data.description: Join Jeffrey Snover, the inventor of PowerShell, and Jason Helmick for their annual PowerShell update. During this talk, learn about the latest and coolest PowerShell features to help you automate and manage the Windows, Linux, hybrid cloud and the Microsoft Graph. Make sure you are well-caffeinated and your seatbelts are fastened – there is a LOT to talk about.

data.title: Prepare for the next era of insights using Azure Data Lake Storage
data.sortTitle: prepare for the next era of insights using azure data lake storage
data.description: In this session, learn how to build state-of-the-art data lakes using key capabilities of Azure Data Lake Storage. Learn how to derive insights quickly, collaborate and share insights effectively within or outside your organization. Protect your investments by eliminating data silos in your organization and leverage the performance and scalability of best-of-breed cloud storage. Learn how to use various patterns and best practices to build your data analytics solutions and see how our customers have solved real business problems.

data.title: Profiling your ASP.NET applications in Visual Studio 2019
data.sortTitle: profiling your asp.net applications in visual studio 2019
data.description: Learn how to use the powerful tools in the Diagnostics Hub to identify and fix performance issues in your ASP.NET applications running on premises and in Azure. See demos of the most common CPU and memory issues and how to solve them quickly and easily using Visual Studio and the Microsoft Azure Portal. Whether you’re new to Visual Studio or have been using it for years, you’re sure to learn some cool tips and tricks that will help you write more robust and performant applications!

data.title: Propelling your career to the next level with Microsoft Azure and Pluralsight
data.sortTitle: propelling your career to the next level with microsoft azure and pluralsight
data.description:
With the rapid change of technology in the cloud, it can be difficult to understand how to get started and get experience in order to advance your career.

In this session, start down the road to your career in Microsoft Azure. After a brief introduction on what the Microsoft cloud entails, the session covers the path to the most common Azure roles. Learn about the new Microsoft role-based certifications and how you can use Pluralsight’s platform, Microsoft Docs, and Microsoft Learn to guide your skill development. Walk away with insights on how to build a skill development plan and put it into action. Join this jam-packed theater session on how to rock your Azure role!

data.title: Protect against waves of email attacks - Introducing campaign views in Office 365 ATP
data.sortTitle: protect against waves of email attacks - introducing campaign views in office 365 atp
data.description: Email attacks continue to be an entry point for attacks against enterprise customers, that can trigger most damaging consequences. An email attack against a victim is never one email alone, but the attacker will usually target more victims and persist relentlessly in trying to break through the filters over and over again, via waves of email attacks - which we call campaigns. Join us to learn how you can leverage campaign views in Office 365 ATP to better protect against waves of attacks and effectively hunt, investigate and remediate attacks.

data.title: Protect your cloud workload from threats using Azure Security Center
data.sortTitle: protect your cloud workload from threats using azure security center
data.description: Azure Security Center continues to extend its threat protection capabilities to counter sophisticated threats on cloud platforms. Together we explore trending threats that we’ve identified as well as best practices for detecting and preventing threats at the infrastructure-as-a-service (IaaS) layer as well as in platform-as-a-service (PaaS).

data.title: Protect your data in Microsoft Teams
data.sortTitle: protect your data in microsoft teams
data.description: See in action the advanced security capabilities of Microsoft Teams including data loss prevention, information barriers and more. In this demo-rich session, see concrete examples of how Teams can help you work with confidence knowing that your information is secured.

data.title: Protect your sensitive data and information in Azure
data.sortTitle: protect your sensitive data and information in azure
data.description: As more data is migrated to Azure, customers need information protection and governance policies on this data to stay secure and compliant. Azure contains a variety of data – SQL databases, big data repositories, logging information, and unstructured files accessed by users and applications. With data of all kinds growing exponentially in the Azure environment, the challenge is in balancing the need to protect sensitive data with the need to enable data sharing workflows. Learn about the new solutions from Microsoft that help you address these complex challenges by enabling you to discover, classify, label, and protect sensitive data in Azure.

data.title: Protected, productive mobile browsing with Microsoft Edge mobile and Microsoft Intune
data.sortTitle: protected, productive mobile browsing with microsoft edge mobile and microsoft intune
data.description: Microsoft Edge mobile offers innovative, protected-browsing experiences that can help users be more productive than ever. Explore the full range of enterprise offerings we're building for Microsoft Edge mobile and the management capabilities available with Microsoft Intune integration. Walk through the controls you can leverage in Microsoft Edge to create the most value for your organization – from enabling a smooth onboarding process and customizing the end user experience to securing corporate resources. You'll also see how to quickly and easily migrate your organization from the Microsoft Intune managed browser to Microsoft Edge mobile.

data.title: Protecting any app – in the cloud and on-premises
data.sortTitle: protecting any app – in the cloud and on-premises
data.description:
You want to enforce the principles of zero-trust across all your apps, but your environment is hybrid – your resources reside on-premises, in the cloud, and in private networks, your devices aren’t all managed, your users aren’t all employees, and your authentication is complex.

In this session, we discuss how Microsoft Cloud App Security provides end-to-end security on top of apps and resources, including IaaS, PaaS, and SaaS, regardless of where they reside and how they’re accessed. We also share the continuous investments we’re making as we continue to expand our support for any app and any resource.

data.title: Protecting sensitive files and data can be hard. Choose the right data protection options that balance security and worker productivity
data.sortTitle: protecting sensitive files and data can be hard. choose the right data protection options that balance security and worker productivity
data.description: Microsoft Information Protection solutions provide a wide range of flexible protection actions that you can apply based on data sensitivity. Not all data is created equal, and it's important to apply the right protection actions while minimizing the impact on end-users. In this session, we discuss the tradeoffs and best practices in protecting your data. This includes assessing your protection options, such as encryption, access restrictions and visual markings - as well as understanding your key management options. This will equip you to implement the protection policies you need to meet your requirements.

data.title: Protecting sensitive information in Office apps and Office 365 services: A deeper look at the latest enhancements
data.sortTitle: protecting sensitive information in office apps and office 365 services: a deeper look at the latest enhancements
data.description: There have been many enhancements to classification, labeling, and protection capabilities across Office apps and Office 365 services. Come and learn about the latest capabilities and how these can be implemented to better protect sensitive information across your Office 365 environment.

data.title: Quantum computing: Computing with a probabilistic universe with Mark Russinovich
data.sortTitle: quantum computing: computing with a probabilistic universe with mark russinovich
data.description: Quantum computing algorithms can solve problems in seconds that would take millions of years on classical computers. Mark describes the kinds of problems that quantum computing accelerates, then introduces quantum physics, the qubits that are the foundation for quantum computing, quantum gates, and then algorithms. He uses the Microsoft Quantum Development Kit with its Q# language and simulator to demonstrate concepts and show that even though scalable quantum computers are several years away, quantum-inspired algorithms are solving problems more efficiently today.

data.title: Quick tour of the latest and greatest Data Loss Prevention capabilities in Microsoft 365 to help prevent oversharing of sensitive information
data.sortTitle: quick tour of the latest and greatest data loss prevention capabilities in microsoft 365 to help prevent oversharing of sensitive information
data.description: Join us as we highlight the top new DLP capabilities that help prevent sensitive emails and files from getting into the wrong hands. This includes policy configuration options, the latest detection methods and other recent enhancements that you can use as part of a comprehensive data security strategy.

data.title: Re-designing the modern workplace adoption: A new perspective
data.sortTitle: re-designing the modern workplace adoption: a new perspective
data.description: The Microsoft 365 suite enables organizations to collaborate, communicate, and manage information in a more effective way. At the same time, many organizations need some assistance in adopting the new ways of working, so they can get the maximum value from this unique and holistic collaboration platform. This session discusses the importance of organizational culture in obtaining the business outcomes driven by the successful adoption of Microsoft 365. The session also explores the role of the enterprise collaboration architecture, a unique framework which marries organizational dynamics with the various tools in the platform, as it guides business and IT decision makers in fast-tracking sustainable adoption and an acceleration of business outcomes.

data.title: React Native: Build rich apps for Windows and mobile applications easily using JavaScript
data.sortTitle: react native: build rich apps for windows and mobile applications easily using javascript
data.description: React Native lets you build rich, native apps using JavaScript. Now you can use it to build beautiful applications for Windows in addition to iOS, Android! Come hear about the new capabilities added since //Build 2019, learn about how Office is using React Native in their apps, and find out about investments across Microsoft to help developers using React Native. React Native lets you build rich, native apps using JavaScript. Now you can use it to build beautiful applications for Windows in addition to iOS, Android! Come hear about the new capabilities added since //Build 2019, hear about how Office is using React Native in their apps, and about investments across Microsoft to help developers using React Native.

data.title: Real customers, real challenges, and the real power of Microsoft Threat Protection
data.sortTitle: real customers, real challenges, and the real power of microsoft threat protection
data.description: Learn more about MTP from your peers who are using Microsoft’s threat protection solutions to correlate threat signals from across the organization, identifying, prioritizing, and responding to attacks before they can wreak havoc. Join us for a customer panel led by Microsoft Security CVP Rob Lefferts to find out how security teams are protecting assets across the enterprise while getting time back in their day to focus on core business initiatives.

data.title: Real detection stories! See how MTP's defeated actual attacks and adheres to the MITRE framework
data.sortTitle: real detection stories! see how mtp's defeated actual attacks and adheres to the mitre framework
data.description: Today, attackers rely on the cloud as much as defenders rely on it for protection. Hybrid attacks that originate from cloud services and propagate to physical endpoints are no longer exceptional stories. Who needs code execution exploits when a mail rule from the cloud can spawn a shell? Who needs backdoor persistence on endpoints when stealing sign-on tokens could be enough to steal data from a different device? Come listen to real stories of such attacks and the techniques behind them, and see how Microsoft Threat Protection is building enhanced signal across endpoints, identities, and cloud services to secure your entire estate and expose threats using the MITRE ATT&CK framework.

data.title: Real-world blockchain: Trust and transparency at blazing speed with Azure Blockchain Service
data.sortTitle: real-world blockchain: trust and transparency at blazing speed with azure blockchain service
data.description:
The trust and transparency of blockchain is reducing the friction and cost of sharing workflows across organizational boundaries. From Starbucks’ supply chain to J.P. Morgan’s interbank payments, our biggest customers are partnering with Azure to build new, industry-shaping utilities. 

Azure Blockchain Service is the enterprise foundation for building this new class of multi-party apps. Customers choose Azure Blockchain Service because it provides the confidentiality they need without sacrificing the speed, throughput and integration to existing SaaS, services, and data that they expect from Azure. Learn all about new Azure Blockchain features, developer experience, and additional ledger support in the context of real-world customer scenarios. In this demo-heavy session, see how businesses are using the technology and how developers can go further, faster using Azure Blockchain.

data.title: Realize Ultimate Security with Microsoft Surface – The Most Secure Device for Today’s Enterprise
data.sortTitle: realize ultimate security with microsoft surface – the most secure device for today’s enterprise
data.description: See how a Microsoft 365 Powered Surface, deployed by Windows AutoPilot and managed by Microsoft Intune, from OS to UEFI, creates a secure and productive modern workplace.  We will walk you through the Surface journey from factory assignment of an M365 tenant, white glove deployment of cloud-based policies/applications/settings, your end customers' setup experience/immediate use and finally the lifecycle management of the device to include the remote reset to a new user or eventual retirement. You will walk away with a firm understanding of the advantages of cloud-based device deployment with Surface and the tools needed to transition your infrastructure to Microsoft 365 modern management.

data.title: Reduce IT friction with seamless identity end-user experiences
data.sortTitle: reduce it friction with seamless identity end-user experiences
data.description: In a world where every employee needs a sea of applications and tools to do their job, and your end-users are getting increasingly mobile, so much productivity is lost on simply finding the right app, remembering right password, and reaching out to IT to retrieve lost credentials. Learn how you can become your organization hero by eliminating access friction and deliver a seamless and secure user experience.

data.title: Reduce risk with Microsoft 365 Access Control Technologies
data.sortTitle: reduce risk with microsoft 365 access control technologies
data.description: Learn the best practice to demo and sell access control capabilities including Office 365 privileged access management and Customer Lockbox.

data.title: Reducing time to development of SAP solutions by 100x with Azure Logic Apps
data.sortTitle: reducing time to development of sap solutions by 100x with azure logic apps
data.description: Handling mission-critical processes is tricky business. Much of the technical debt that companies assume comes from architecting systems that have multiple layers of redundancy, to mitigate the chance of outages that may severely impact customers. Microsoft Azure provides out-of-the-box ways to run your critical processes, without fear of outages and incurring costs associated with managing your own infrastructure. A new innovation in this category comes from the Logic Apps team. In this session, they demonstrate a new SAP connector that helps companies easily integrate with the ERP systems that are key to the day-to-day success of their business. With this connector, implementations that use to take months, now only take days, or even hours!

data.title: Responsible AI: Building trustworthy, secure and transparent machine learning
data.sortTitle: responsible ai: building trustworthy, secure and transparent machine learning
data.description: With the recent popularity of machine learning algorithms such as neural networks and ensemble methods, machine learning models become more like a ‘black box,’ harder to understand and interpret. To gain the user’s trust, there is a strong need to develop tools and methodologies to help the user to understand and explain how predictions are made. In this talk, we present the Azure Machine Learning 'Machine Learning Interpretability (MLI) toolkit' which incorporates the cutting-edge technologies developed by Microsoft and leverages proven third-party libraries. Using MLI toolkit, data scientists can explain machine learning models using state-of-art technologies in an easy-to-use and scalable fashion.

data.title: Role-based access control in Microsoft 365: Improve your operations and security posture
data.sortTitle: role-based access control in microsoft 365: improve your operations and security posture
data.description: Role-based access control is essential for improving the security posture of your org, while providing IT with a focused experience based on permissions. In this session we demo new features that provide more granular control; improve visibility into who has admin access; and make it easier to find the least permissive role. We explain the architecture behind these features, so you leave with a technical depth and holistic understanding that you can apply in your org to reduce your exposure and improve your daily operations.

data.title: Run Python in production without compromising your security
data.sortTitle: run python in production without compromising your security
data.description: Scripting languages such as Python provide great power to developers, but also allow intruders an unfair ability to infiltrate and persist without raising the alarm. This session shows how to integrate new features in Python 3.8 with your existing security detectors, to help you confidently use Python in production.

data.title: Run your Linux workloads faster leveraging the Azure platform enhancements
data.sortTitle: run your linux workloads faster leveraging the azure platform enhancements
data.description: Join our platform engineering team to hear about the investments and tools we built and contributed upstream for low latency networking, RDMA over SRIOV, infiniband, low latency storage, large size VMs, and more! Learn about the joint collaboration we have across Red Hat, SUSE, and Canonical to make Linux runs great on Azure, and see how to enable these features in your production environment and make your workloads run smoother on Azure.

data.title: Run your most demanding enterprise file workloads in Azure with Azure NetApp Files
data.sortTitle: run your most demanding enterprise file workloads in azure with azure netapp files
data.description:
A large estate of enterprise applications running file-storage doesn’t have much of a choice but to run on expensive on-premises infrastructure. Migrating to cloud is hard, and often falls short of customers' high expectations around performance and data protection. 
Enter Azure NetApp Files (ANF) – the industry’s first, bare-metal, file-based storage service seamlessly integrated into Microsoft Azure. ANF offers unmatched performance, rich data management, and only takes minutes to get up and running. Unlike other offerings, Azure NetApp Files is an Azure first-party service - sold and supported by Microsoft.
This session provides a brief introduction to Azure NetApp Files, including use cases and demo, and then goes deeper on the capabilities and roadmap. Top workloads include: HPC, lift-and-shift of complex file-based apps, and SAP HANA.

data.title: Run your own Windows Insider Program with Group Policy and Intune
data.sortTitle: run your own windows insider program with group policy and intune
data.description: Start your Windows 10 deployment before everyone else! In this session, we’ll introduce you to theWindows Insider Program and show you how it can keep you up to date with the latest in Windows. Learn what the program is, hear from other successful Insiders, and We show you how we flight early builds of Windows with GPO/Intune via Windows Update.

data.title: Run your own Windows Insider Program with WSUS and SCCM
data.sortTitle: run your own windows insider program with wsus and sccm
data.description: Start your Windows 10 deployment before everyone else! In this session, we’ll introduce you to the Windows Insider Program and show you how it can keep you up to date with the latest in Windows. Learn what the program is, hear from other successful Insiders, and We show you how we flight early builds of Windows with SCCM and WSUS.

data.title: Running mission-critical analytics with Azure SQL Data Warehouse
data.sortTitle: running mission-critical analytics with azure sql data warehouse
data.description: When the largest enterprises need a home for their mission-critical analytics, they choose Azure SQL Data Warehouse. Whether you’re migrating from an existing legacy appliance or developing a new solution in the cloud, only Azure SQL Data Warehouse has the scale, performance, and feature-set needed to run the most demanding tier 1 enterprise workloads. This demo-rich session showcases a spectrum of new and existing capabilities in the context of common analytics scenarios, and demonstrates how the performance, security, and workload management capabilities of the platform can be applied to implement an enterprise data warehouse with the cost efficiency that only the cloud provides.

data.title: Running Postgres at scale on-premises and in the cloud
data.sortTitle: running postgres at scale on-premises and in the cloud
data.description:
Postgres is the world's fastest growing open-source database. It runs in many places, including on Azure (through our Azure Database for PostgreSQL offering), and in your own data center on-premises. With the Hyperscale (Citus) technology, you can scale out Postgres to hundreds of terabytes of data, and accelerate your query performance through parallelism.

We take a closer look at how we can utilize the Hyperscale (Citus) technology in different scenarios and walk through the use cases where you can accelerate and scale out your database.

data.title: Running upgrades for mission critical SQL Server
data.sortTitle: running upgrades for mission critical sql server
data.description: Upgrades should be approached with the same rigor and processes as a full software or hardware project – a solid methodology is required for success. Microsoft provides you with all the tools you need to achieve a seamless, reliable upgrade experience. In this session, we demonstrate some of the free tools that Microsoft provides in order to ensure your SQL Server upgrade is a success along with our compatibility-based upgrade framework.

data.title: SAP migration Do’s and Don’ts: Planning and executing a large scale SAP landscape migration
data.sortTitle: sap migration do’s and don’ts: planning and executing a large scale sap landscape migration
data.description: A SAP on Azure partner shares a customer journey for large scale SAP landscape migration starting with migration planning, migration tools, project timelines, and Azure architecture choices. Also, hear about lessons learned along the way and pitfalls to avoid in executing such a mission-critical migration.

data.title: SAP workloads on Azure: Best practices and improvements
data.sortTitle: sap workloads on azure: best practices and improvements
data.description: Interested in making your life easier while running SAP workloads on Azure? In this session the Azure engineering team covers recent improvements and best practices in the areas of SAP workload deployment and monitoring on Azure. We talk about the nearest roadmap and improvements such as new HLI SKUs and use of Optane technology for your SAP workloads. We illustrate some of the technology in live demos.

data.title: SCOM 2019: Customer Success stories and what’s next
data.sortTitle: scom 2019: customer success stories and what’s next
data.description: System Center Operations Manager 2019 has provided significant enhancements in Azure integration, HTML5 dashboards, improved notifications, Linux workload support and more. Hear from large enterprise customers as they share their real world experiences of successful deployments of SCOM 2019. The session will also share new advancements coming in SCOM 2019 UR1 for hybrid management, Azure management pack, Storage Spaces Direct monitoring, improved security, simplified patching, Linux support and reliability of Linux monitoring.

data.title: Seamless connectivity to Azure with Windows Server and hybrid networking
data.sortTitle: seamless connectivity to azure with windows server and hybrid networking
data.description: Being able to connect your on-premises workloads to Azure to create a hybrid network is one of the keys to being successful in the cloud. Windows Server has all the tools needed to create the type of connectivity you require. In this session, we touch on the basics of using Windows Server VPN connections with Azure, then we jump into a new way to use Windows Server to stretch subnets enabling you to migrate existing machines into Azure without changing their IP addresses. Finally, we show how new SDN extensions in Windows Admin Center make it easy to connect and maintain security with site-to-site connections into Azure.

data.title: SecOps teams - don't drown in a sea of alerts! Use automation for efficient incident response
data.sortTitle: secops teams - don't drown in a sea of alerts! use automation for efficient incident response
data.description: Security teams responsible for investigating and responding to incidents often deal with a massive number of signals from widely disparate sources. As a result, rapid and efficient incident response continues to be the biggest challenge facing security teams today. The sheer volume of these signals, combined with an ever-growing digital estate of organizations, means that a lot of critical alerts miss getting the timely attention they deserve. Security teams need help to scale better, be more efficient, focus on the right issues, and deal with incidents in a timely manner. Join us to learn how automation in Office 365 ATP can help address some of these challenges and make the SecOps teams more effective and efficient.

data.title: Secure your sensitive data! Understanding the latest Microsoft Information Protection capabilities
data.sortTitle: secure your sensitive data! understanding the latest microsoft information protection capabilities
data.description: Understand the latest Microsoft Information Protection capabilities that can help you protect your sensitive data - wherever it lives or travels. We take a closer look at new policy and configuration options, enhanced end-user experiences, enhancements to data inspection and classification, and key integration points across Microsoft 365 and third-party solutions. We show the product experiences in action and provide practical tips on how to get the most out of these capabilities.

data.title: Secure your virtual machines in Azure today
data.sortTitle: secure your virtual machines in azure today
data.description: You just migrated to Azure and now is the time to make sure you are following security best practices for virtual machines.  Learn how to use Secure Score to improve your security posture, protect from threats, ensure updates are turned on, protect your public IP addresses and more.

data.title: Securing AWS and Google Cloud Platform
data.sortTitle: securing aws and google cloud platform
data.description:
In this session we show you how to create end-to-end security strategy for your IaaS and PaaS resources on AWS and GCP, using Microsoft Security solutions.

We show you how to discover all resources across these platforms to uncover potential Shadow IaaS and PaaS, assess your cloud security posture against risks, and improve your current configuration. Beyond security configuration hardening, we show you how to enforce real-time user session controls using our reverse proxy. This enables scenarios such as blocking uploads to AWS S3 buckets if the session is coming from an untrusted source.

data.title: Securing Azure IaaS virtual machines
data.sortTitle: securing azure iaas virtual machines
data.description: In this session, learn the top five things that you can do to improve the security posture of your Azure IaaS VMs, including secure administration practices, security configuration management, as well as being notified of critical security events.

data.title: Securing Exchange Online from modern threats
data.sortTitle: securing exchange online from modern threats
data.description: Email has been around for a long time, and still serves as a key collaboration medium in the modern workplace. Even after all these years, email is still a high priority target for attackers, and a very effective way for insider threats to steal your data and your money. In this session, we explore how admins, partners, and insiders lead to data breaches in Exchange Online and how external attackers live off the land by using native product capabilities to entrench and exfiltrate. We also explore what you can do to prevent, detect, investigate, and remediate those attacks!

data.title: Securing your cloud perimeter with Azure Network Security
data.sortTitle: securing your cloud perimeter with azure network security
data.description: Do you know how to design an enterprise grade network perimeter in the cloud using the defense-in-depth approach? Come and learn about Azure's cloud-native network security capabilities for protecting your infrastructure and applications by creating a secure perimeter at the network level.

data.title: Securing your data with Azure SQL Data Warehouse
data.sortTitle: securing your data with azure sql data warehouse
data.description: As better performance and more scalability enables companies to consolidate their data and democratize access, security becomes an even greater concern. Developing an enterprise data warehouse solution requires a comprehensive set of security controls, from securing a single cell to monitoring an entire database for security threats. The comprehensive security model in Azure SQL Data Warehouse gives you the fine-grained controls you need to secure your data at every level, a necessity for any enterprise solution. Come learn the best practices of existing security features and check out the newest security features in Azure SQL Data Warehouse!

data.title: Security and compliance in Microsoft Teams
data.sortTitle: security and compliance in microsoft teams
data.description: Join us to learn how the advanced security capabilities of Microsoft Teams help you create policies to secure your information and protect company data. We show the latest features that enable secure collaboration while helping customers meet their obligations under 42 national, regional, and industry-specific regulations.

data.title: Security in overdrive! Best practices for configuring Microsoft Defender ATP
data.sortTitle: security in overdrive! best practices for configuring microsoft defender atp
data.description: One-click security for endpoints? Is it magic? Come and find out how. In this session we’ll cover the enterprise grade manageability of Microsoft Defender ATP, that provides security admins rich configuration, baselines, reporting, extensibility options, and a dedicated experience. Additionally, we’ll demonstrate how security and IT admins can collaborate on securing the organization while balancing business needs.

data.title: Security needs that are driving the evolution of identity standards
data.sortTitle: security needs that are driving the evolution of identity standards
data.description: As digital transformation has evolved the ways in which we work, innovations in standards have followed to solve new and complex threats and challenges that have risen from the evolving identity landscape. Join Pamela Dingle, Director of Identity Standards at Microsoft, as she looks at the current wave of standards which have served mobility and security needs and looks forward to new identity challenges in the future. Walk away with a strong understanding of identity standards, without having to read all of the specifications, and help modernize your organization.

data.title: Security solutions from Microsoft, but not just for Microsoft services
data.sortTitle: security solutions from microsoft, but not just for microsoft services
data.description: In this session we discuss how Microsoft Security suite provides end-to-end security for third-party services across popular SaaS apps like Slack, Salesforce, and IaaS/PaaS services like AWS and Google Cloud platform and how you can extend the security strategy implemented for Microsoft services like Office 365 and Azure to any of your other apps and services.

data.title: Selecting the correct network connectivity service for your workloads
data.sortTitle: selecting the correct network connectivity service for your workloads
data.description: Network is at the core as enterprises plan and design their cloud strategy. Azure offers multiple options for connecting on-premises sites, data centers, and users to the cloud and even the ability to use the Microsoft network, one of the largest in the world, as your WAN.
