We dive deep into some of the latest innovations and capabilities for VPN, ExpressRoute, and global routing preferences to enable fast and reliable networking architectures. Additionally, we talk about best practices for disaster recovery, high availability, and how to avoid some common missteps that customers take when designing and implementing this mission-critical connectivity service.

data.title: SentryOne success story featuring Microsoft Teams and Crestron Flex
data.sortTitle: sentryone success story featuring microsoft teams and crestron flex
data.description: Follow the real world journey of SentryOne during their recent rollout of Microsoft Teams® Rooms from Crestron. Join Connor Bright, IT Services Engineer at SentryOne, and Andrew Gross, Microsoft Alliance Director of Sales & Operations at Crestron, for the inside story on how Crestron Flex™ Microsoft Teams Rooms have helped foster and enhance collaboration in a variety of meeting and public spaces across the new SentryOne campus and abroad. They’ll walk you through the entire rollout process, from system design, to time-saving deployment and management using the Crestron XiO Cloud™ service, to user adoption. SentryOne is a leading provider of database performance monitoring and data DevOps solutions.

data.title: Serverless Kubernetes with Azure Functions and Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS)
data.sortTitle: serverless kubernetes with azure functions and azure kubernetes service (aks)
data.description: Serverless and event-driven computing are enabling developers to build and run apps faster than ever before. Microsoft Azure provides flexible options on running serverless workloads to bring the benefits of serverless to every environment. This session showcases how Virtual Nodes, KEDA, and powerful tooling allow you to bring event-driven Azure Functions and containers to your Azure Kubernetes clusters for a flexible and productive app experience.

data.title: Share big data easily and securely with other organizations leveraging Azure Data Share
data.sortTitle: share big data easily and securely with other organizations leveraging azure data share
data.description: Learn how Azure Data Share can help you share big data efficiently and securely with your business partners and customers. In this session, learn about how you can leverage cross-organization data sharing to enhance analytics and drive new revenue streams. We walk you through some of the most common data sharing scenarios, and provide you with an overview of the Azure Data Share service. Join us for a live demo of sharing data code-free from a variety of sources such as Azure Blob Storage, Azure Data Lake Storage, and Azure Data Explorer.

data.title: SharePoint news and communication sites: Inform and engage your organization
data.sortTitle: sharepoint news and communication sites: inform and engage your organization
data.description: SharePoint empowers communicators to create compelling communications and share important information and updates with the right audiences, across devices. Explore the capabilities of SharePoint news, end-to-end, and discover innovations for organizational news that transform employee communications. Learn how SharePoint communication sites let you share vision, knowledge, resources and services across the organization. And, discover how these capabilities integrate with Yammer, Stream, and Microsoft Teams to deliver powerful, flexible solutions for communicators.

data.title: Ship it! Build for any platform with Azure Pipelines, and make shipping fun and stress-free
data.sortTitle: ship it! build for any platform with azure pipelines, and make shipping fun and stress-free
data.description: Azure Pipelines is an extremely powerful and flexible CI/CD system build for any language and any platform. We explore the full capabilities of Azure Pipelines in this deep dive and unleash some of its power! We start by creating pipelines with YAML, using templates, clicking through the UI, and even automate pipeline creation with CLI tooling. We show how to build across different platforms, using different source repos. We use some lesser-known, powerful features like container jobs, matrix strategies, and checks, to make our pipeline fast and robust. Finally, we cover what's new (caching and pipeline artifacts), take a look at what's on the roadmap, and add some fun tips for inspiring your team to invest in automation.

data.title: Simple identity management
data.sortTitle: simple identity management
data.description: In today’s evolving threat landscape it’s more important than ever to make sure that people are who they say they are. Learn how to efficiently add users to the organization in a standardized manner, configure modern identity security, assign licenses, and more.

data.title: Simplify sign in and authorization with the Microsoft identity platform
data.sortTitle: simplify sign in and authorization with the microsoft identity platform
data.description: Building a secure and usable authentication experience has been difficult and time-consuming. Whether you’re building an app to reach consumers or enterprises, the Microsoft identity platform is here to help. In this session, learn how to authenticate personal Microsoft or Azure Active Directory accounts, and securely access APIs in your apps. Once integrated with the Microsoft identity platform, see how you can start accessing data in Microsoft Graph to build richer applications.

data.title: Simplifying Natural Language Processing (NLP) models using Azure Cognitive Services
data.sortTitle: simplifying natural language processing (nlp) models using azure cognitive services
data.description: In this session, learn how to train and deploy complex NLP models without any AI expertise using the Language Understanding (LUIS) Cognitive Services. LUIS enables developers to quickly create enterprise-ready, conversational application that communicates with a user in natural language to complete a task. We provide tips on how to best leverage LUIS for your scenarios, and see how the newly released features can further improve your language models.

data.title: Sliding laterally: How attackers move through your network
data.sortTitle: sliding laterally: how attackers move through your network
data.description: Learn how Azure Advanced Threat Protection can help detect lateral movements across your organization.

data.title: SQL Server 2019 big data clusters: Architecture, deployment, and security
data.sortTitle: sql server 2019 big data clusters: architecture, deployment, and security
data.description: The SQL Server 2019 big data cluster platform provides a scalable and enterprise ready technology that can handle data of any sort. Next to the native support for R, Python, Spark, SQL, and HDFS, it also provides a way to deploy applications cluster. In this session, learn the architecture of big data clusters, its primary uses, and how to deploy and secure the environment, with a focus on the latest security and other improvements to the system.

data.title: SQL Server 2019 on containers and Kubernetes
data.sortTitle: sql server 2019 on containers and kubernetes
data.description: Containers are the new virtual machines. Containers present a new way to deploy, manage, and run SQL Server never possible before. This session presents an internal view of how SQL Server embraces Kubernetes and how SQL Server features integrates with Kubernetes. We cover the architecture of containers, how we have built SQL Server to run on Kubernetes, and how we enable minimal downtime upgrade using containers. Walk away with knowledge of practical scenarios where SQL Server in containers may be the right deployment model for you.

data.title: SQL Server from ground to the cloud
data.sortTitle: sql server from ground to the cloud
data.description: SQL Server is the world’s leading operational database. Today 98 of the Fortune 100 companies use it to power their mission critical applications across all verticals. In this one session we show why so many enterprises bet their business on SQL Server. We start by showing the latest features in SQL Server 2019, including an introduction to the analytics features in SQL big data clusters. Cloud is the next frontier for most enterprises and Azure SQL is the leader when it comes to market share and richness of feature set. Microsoft has reinvented database scale for the cloud; SQL Hyperscale offers limitless database, global distribution running on thousands of cores. We introduce Azure SQL Database serverless, which can save enterprises 5X their database spend by delivering a true pay-as-you-use model. We also show how SQL Server running on edge devices is enabling new types of IoT applications by moving 70% of computation to the edge.

data.title: SQL Server in Azure Virtual Machine reimagined
data.sortTitle: sql server in azure virtual machine reimagined
data.description: With SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machine, get the combined performance, security, and analytics of SQL Server, backed by the flexibility, security, and hybrid connectivity of Azure VMs. In this session, we discuss new features recently announced for SQL Server on Azure VM with SQL VM resource provider around enhanced manageability, improved performance, flexible licensing, and integration of SQL VM with unified Azure SQL Service.

data.title: SQL Server Machine Learning platform
data.sortTitle: sql server machine learning platform
data.description: In this session we show how you can use the SQL Machine Learning platform using Azure Data Studio. We walk through with the experience to collect and query data from an edge device, and then show you how to prepare, visualize, and build ML models using Python and Spark on top of the data. We show how to manage machine learning models using MLflow and save the models securely into SQL Server. We then show how we can deploy the models back into Azure SQL Database Edge or Azure SQL Managed Instance and how you run native predict on the edge for real-time scoring of the data providing a unified experience to do machine learning from the edge to the cloud.

data.title: SQL Server on Linux in Azure Virtual Machines: Get started in minutes
data.sortTitle: sql server on linux in azure virtual machines: get started in minutes
data.description: Join this session to learn how to get started and optimize SQL Server on Linux in Azure Virtual Machines. This interactive session includes demos about how to get started and best practices for optimizing SQL Server on Linux in Azure.

data.title: State of the browser: Microsoft Edge
data.sortTitle: state of the browser: microsoft edge
data.description: Microsoft Edge is on a mission to create the best browser for enterprises: rock-solid fundamentals, intelligent security, the most productive and secure end-user experience, flexible manageability; and deep integration with M365. The next version of Microsoft Edge is ready for business. We’ll share the history and roadmap for the next version of Microsoft Edge.

data.title: Stay connected to your Azure environment on the go with the Microsoft Azure mobile app
data.sortTitle: stay connected to your azure environment on the go with the microsoft azure mobile app
data.description: In today's world, you're constantly on the go. In this session, learn how you can stay connected with your Azure resources using the Azure mobile app. Learn how you can monitor the health and status of your Azure resources, quickly diagnose and fix issues, and run commands to manage your Azure resources, all from your mobile device.

data.title: Staying up to date with the Microsoft Azure roadmap
data.sortTitle: staying up to date with the microsoft azure roadmap
data.description: Cloud services like Azure are evolving faster and unlike any other technology we use today. However, as a technologist responsible for helping your organization keep up with this pace of change and make sense of it all, it is easy to be overwhelmed. In this session, the Azure Service Operations team shares how we track, manage, and communicate change – so you can stay ahead of new capabilities, changes, and deprecations in Azure.

data.title: Stop paying someone else to do it: Automatically monitor, secure, and update your on-premises servers from Azure with Windows Admin Center
data.sortTitle: stop paying someone else to do it: automatically monitor, secure, and update your on-premises servers from azure with windows admin center
data.description: Get a first-hand look at how Windows Admin Center can help you easily connect your on-premises servers to Azure management services. You can relax, knowing Azure will keep your servers up to date, alert you of any changes to server health, and protect your on-premises environment with intelligent cloud-based security insights.

data.title: Streaming data with Azure Event Hubs and Kafka
data.sortTitle: streaming data with azure event hubs and kafka
data.description: Come learn about the newest Azure Event Hubs support for Kafka, enabling both fully-managed and open-source streaming solutions.

data.title: Streamline your business processes and development with Azure Active Directory APIs in Microsoft Graph
data.sortTitle: streamline your business processes and development with azure active directory apis in microsoft graph
data.description: The availability of Azure AD APIs in Microsoft Graph has grown over the past year to help developers streamline access to Azure AD. In fact, all Azure AD Graph APIs are now available in Microsoft Graph and more Azure AD APIs have been added to Microsoft Graph. In this session come learn how to use Azure AD APIs in Microsoft Graph to query user profiles, find other users, manage organizational relationships, track assignments, or create original solutions that incorporate existing organizational data.

data.title: Streamline your business processes with automation using Microsoft Teams and Microsoft Flow
data.sortTitle: streamline your business processes with automation using microsoft teams and microsoft flow
data.description: Learn about the potential for integrating Microsoft Teams, Microsoft 365, and the Power Platform. We give you a quick overview of the value of the products and discuss how they can transform how work gets done. We also demonstrate the potential of the Microsoft Flow combined with Microsoft Teams.

data.title: Streamline your business processes with Microsoft Teams and the Microsoft Power Apps
data.sortTitle: streamline your business processes with microsoft teams and the microsoft power apps
data.description: Learn about Microsoft Teams, Microsoft 365, and the Power Platform. We give you a quick overview of the value of the products and discuss how they can transform how work gets done. We then demonstrate how easy it is to get started with Microsoft Power Apps.

data.title: Streamline your business processes with Microsoft Teams and the Microsoft Power Platform
data.sortTitle: streamline your business processes with microsoft teams and the microsoft power platform
data.description: Learn about Microsoft Teams, Microsoft 365, and the Power Platform. We walk you through the combined products' business value and demonstrate how these products can change how work gets done. We walk you through the pain points that are mitigated by Microsoft + Power Platform, like reducing switching costs and creativity-loss by making Teams the hub for business processes. Then, we show how these products can empower everyone in your or your customer's organization with approachable business automation and apps.

data.title: Superlative protection, unparalleled intelligence: Learn why Office 365 ATP is the most trusted solution
data.sortTitle: superlative protection, unparalleled intelligence: learn why office 365 atp is the most trusted solution
data.description: Office 365 Advanced Threat Protection (Office 365 ATP) leverages trillions of signals per day from billions of sources to quickly and accurately detect advanced attacks and protect more users than any other vendor. The service provides unique insights and extensive visibility into the threat landscape based on vast amount of threat intelligence, machine learning, security research and development data. Analyzing such a huge amount of data also continuously improves the machine learning algorithms leading to highest accuracy and effectiveness in the industry. Join us to learn why a majority of customers trust and rely on Office 365 ATP to protect against sophisticated attacks such as phishing and zero-day threats.

data.title: Surface AutoPilot: The easiest deployment for today’s mobile workforce
data.sortTitle: surface autopilot: the easiest deployment for today’s mobile workforce
data.description: See how a Microsoft 365 Powered Surface, deployed by Windows AutoPilot and managed by Microsoft Intune, from OS to UEFI, creates a secure and productive modern workplace. We walk you through the Surface journey from factory assignment of an Microsoft 365 tenant, Whiteglove deployment of cloud-based policies/applications/settings, your end customer’s setup experience/immediate use and finally, the lifecycle management of the device to include the remote reset to a new user or eventual retirement. You will walk away with a firm understanding of the advantages of cloud-based device deployment with Surface and the tools needed to transition your infrastructure to Microsoft 365 modern management.

data.title: Tailoring Microsoft Teams and delegating administration in Office 365
data.sortTitle: tailoring microsoft teams and delegating administration in office 365
data.description: Government agencies and large private sector organizations frequently have centralized IT departments supporting numerous departments or lines of business with wildly diverse digital workspace needs. The challenge is they all sit under the same Office 365 tenant and are constrained to the same tenant-wide settings. Departments have different numbers of users, deal with different sensitivity of information and are overseen by different industry regulations—shouldn’t they have different policies for their digital workspaces in Office 365? Join Dux Raymond Sy for this interactive session and learn how to tailor Office 365 for each department’s needs while lessening IT burden and delegating common non-technical tasks to business owners.

data.title: Take back the advantage: Max out your security posture with the all new Microsoft Secure Score
data.sortTitle: take back the advantage: max out your security posture with the all new microsoft secure score
data.description:
Over 90% of cyber related incident are made possible due to deficiencies in security related configurations and hygiene and most customers are completely unaware how exposed they are. Microsoft recognizes that state-of-the-art security technologies are not enough and that our solutions need to be coupled with capabilities that help you address the people and process issues that are actually one of the greatest challenges. 

Come join us to learn how the all new version of Microsoft Secure Score will help you max out your security posture and enable you to drive important status, prioritization, and trade-off discussions with the CISO and other related security leaders in your organization.

data.title: Take productivity to the next level with Outlook Add-ins
data.sortTitle: take productivity to the next level with outlook add-ins
data.description: Hundreds of millions of people spend 80% of their day getting work done in Outlook. Learn how you can integrate your company’s business processes seamlessly into your Outlook users’ daily routine. We share all the latest news from the Outlook extensibility world, including new types of scenarios you can enable across Windows, Online, Mac, iOS and Android. We also show you how we transformed the feedback from our community about e-mail compliance, secure communications, tracking, and more into features you can use to delight your customers today!

data.title: Taking applications and content to the edge
data.sortTitle: taking applications and content to the edge
data.description: Join us as we dive into application delivery services at the network edge and how we're changing how application experiences are built, optimized, and secured in the cloud. We walk through the direction of Azure’s global network and how to use the Microsoft global network (WAN) and services such as Azure Front Door (AFD), Content Delivery Network (CDN) and Web Application Firewall (WAF) at the edge to enable and build fast global and secure internet applications and content delivery plans, cost effectively with Azure.

data.title: Tap into Microsoft Teams Rooms with Logitech
data.sortTitle: tap into microsoft teams rooms with logitech
data.description: Logitech Room Solutions for Microsoft Teams include everything you need to build out conference rooms. Available in small, medium, and large configurations, Logitech Room Solutions for Microsoft Teams Rooms come pre-configured with a mini PC, a Logitech conferencecam, and the Logitech Tap touch controller. In this session, we cover best practices that simplify and speed up deployments across room types, layouts, and use cases. Also, learn about the latest innovations that drive positive user experiences, increased returns on investment, and higher adoption rates for Teams in meeting rooms.

data.title: Tasks at Microsoft: Creating a coherent ecosystem
data.sortTitle: tasks at microsoft: creating a coherent ecosystem
data.description: Find out about the exciting new initiative helping you find your tasks where you need them, regardless of where you captured them. In this session, learn how to streamline all of your tasks from Outlook, To-Do, Planner, Office documents, Project, and Teams into a single list.

data.title: Tech for social impact: The road ahead
data.sortTitle: tech for social impact: the road ahead
data.description: Microsoft is investing in purpose-built technology in Azure, modern workplace, and business applications. Join Microsoft Tech for Social Impact Chief Technology Officer Erik Arnold to learn about the new innovation now available to you directly from Microsoft and from our partners. We cover new applications available in Microsoft Dynamics, a modern data architecture for program insights, collaboration solutions, and how the Microsoft Power Platform supports small nonprofits.

data.title: Test and debug MSIX apps remotely using Windows Device Portal
data.sortTitle: test and debug msix apps remotely using windows device portal
data.description: Windows Device Portal is a developer mode feature of Windows 10 that lets you configure and manage your device remotely over a network or USB connection. We'll go over the basics of using Device Portal and show you some cool tips and tricks to help you troubleshoot and view the real-time performance of your apps and Windows device.

data.title: The ABCs of WVD migration
data.sortTitle: the abcs of wvd migration
data.description:
Success with Windows Virtual Desktop migration requires foundational and continuous assessment, monitoring, and analytics. In this session, learn the answers to the following questions:

• Which Windows workloads are a good fit for Windows Virtual Desktop migration?
• What is the best configuration for Windows 10 multi-user to ensure consistent end-user experience?
• How many user workloads can you fit on each Windows 10 multi-user tenant?
• Which Windows 7 workloads can be migrated to Windows 10 multi-user?
• Which VDI workloads are a good fit for Azure-hosted Windows Virtual Desktops, and which are a better fit for on-premises VDI?

data.title: The evolution of Windows feature update deployment
data.sortTitle: the evolution of windows feature update deployment
data.description: Learn about upcoming improvements to the feature update experience that will reduce downtime and the number of reboots required for end users. We show you how to use familiar tools to roll out feature updates in environments with connected devices, disconnected devices, and a mixture of both. If you already have devices running Windows 10, version 1903—or are looking to better understand the value of staying current with the latest updates—add this session to your schedule.

data.title: The future of Microsoft OneNote: Notes unleashed
data.sortTitle: the future of microsoft onenote: notes unleashed
data.description: Come gaze into the crystal ball and discover the future of OneNote! Over the past year, the OneNote team has made huge strides with improved navigation creating a unified and familiar experience across devices. With improvements like an even faster, more robust and reliable sync engine and fan favorite features like Dark Mode, OneNote is the go-to for all modern organization and note taking. But, what's coming next is still going to blow you away. Be the first to know what the OneNote team has in store for this year and beyond!

data.title: The future of Microsoft Project is here
data.sortTitle: the future of microsoft project is here
data.description: The new Microsoft Project is here! Come join us to find out how new Project, built on the Microsoft Power Platform, can help your teams be more collaborative through Microsoft 365 tools and Teams, and work flexibly while you get the successful outcomes and compliance you and your organization need.

data.title: The key to intranet success is people: How to keep people at the center of your digital workplace initiatives
data.sortTitle: the key to intranet success is people: how to keep people at the center of your digital workplace initiatives
data.description: What if you built a modern intranet and nobody came? The intelligent intranet requires great technology - but unless that technology addresses key outcomes for the people who are going to use it, your great solution won't get adopted. In this session, learn how to keep people at the center of your intelligent intranet - how to gather user outcome goals, provide engaging training, plan governance that delivers, and how to manage change in a constantly changing world.

data.title: The modern Windows Command Line: Windows Terminal
data.sortTitle: the modern windows command line: windows terminal
data.description: The Windows Command Line Team announced at Microsoft Build 2019 that they were open-sourcing the Windows Command Line infrastructure and the new Windows Terminal app. In this session, the Windows Command Line team delves into the internals of the Windows Command Line and Windows Terminal app and demonstrate how it all works, and what's new since the announcement.

data.title: The Modern Windows Command-Line: Windows Subsystem for Linux 2
data.sortTitle: the modern windows command-line: windows subsystem for linux 2
data.description: The Windows Subsystem for Linux (WSL) community has given amazing feedback on how we can improve through platforms like Twitter, Github, and UserVoice. Our team has taken that feedback to heart. In this session, they'll be showing off how the new WSL architecture will improve your development environment with faster file performance speed, Linux file access from Windows, better support for Linux applications, and more.

data.title: The new Microsoft Project: Built for teams
data.sortTitle: the new microsoft project: built for teams
data.description: Teams work the way they want, and organizations get the results they need. Learn about the new Project experience and how it's built for teams to work together to deliver projects with Microsoft Teams.

data.title: The new Microsoft Project: Built for teams
data.sortTitle: the new microsoft project: built for teams
data.description: Teams work the way they want, and organizations get the results they need. Learn about the new Project experience and how it's built for teams to work together to deliver projects with Microsoft Teams.

data.title: The now and then of cloud native application in the enterprise using containers
data.sortTitle: the now and then of cloud native application in the enterprise using containers
data.description:
The rapid rise of digital-native businesses have disrupted traditional business models and established industry sectors. Cloud native applications, built on top of Kubernetes, DevOps, and API technologies, are designed to capitalize on the scalability and flexibility of cloud to assist your digital transformation. 

Join Brendan Burns, co-founder of Kubernetes, on a journey to cloud native applications.  Learn about cloud-native development model using familiar tools, the path to innovation with velocity, and agile operations where security and resilience can be automated. Also, get a sneak peek into the future where cloud native and existing systems converge, and learn how we can simplify the journey for you.

data.title: The power of the new Microsoft Project and Microsoft 365
data.sortTitle: the power of the new microsoft project and microsoft 365
data.description: Come learn how the new Project fits within the bigger picture of Microsoft 365. In this session, we walk through an end-to-end scenario of a project from ideation to closure. Through this jouney, we demonstrate how AI, Microsoft Teams, PowerApps, Microsoft Flow, Power BI, and IoT combined with the new Project experience can change the way your teams work.

data.title: The rise of Klintwalker: Mastering your inner developer
data.sortTitle: the rise of klintwalker: mastering your inner developer
data.description:
There is no manual in life. It is scary, but it also means you can play by your own rules. In the past 20 years of moving between four continents, running three businesses, working as a software developer, freelancer, classic car dealer and guide in Africa, I have come out on the other side. 

Digesting what life throws at you and knowing what to focus on, what to disregard and what to burn with fire is hard. In this talk I share all of the nuggets of wisdom and advise from success, failure, and amazing opportunities. Learn from my mistakes. I want you to succeed and this hour might just be the mint in your mojito, the pineapple on your pizza or whatever it is you need in life to push you further.

data.title: The science behind how Azure Active Directory defends your organization and protect identities
data.sortTitle: the science behind how azure active directory defends your organization and protect identities
data.description: Most compromised identities show a deviation from the user’s normal behavior in their interactions with the Identity Provider. It might seem easy to detect compromised account by using simple rules based on past behavior but these simple rules generate too many false positives, and the signal gets lost in the noise. ​Come get a peek under the hood of Microsoft's security engine and learn how we use behavioral analytics and other risk signals to design a high-quality identity compromise detection algorithm working in real time.

data.title: There is a new Outlook on the web: See what's new, fresh, and exciting
data.sortTitle: there is a new outlook on the web: see what's new, fresh, and exciting
data.description: We've been very busy the last year,and we want you to learn all about the new Outlook on the web. Come and learn how the intelligence we've built into Outlook on the web can help manage your mailbox better than ever before. We also share details about new and upcoming security updates and features that can help you keep your users and their data safe and secure.

data.title: Third-party single sign-on in Office add-ins: Admin consent GA
data.sortTitle: third-party single sign-on in office add-ins: admin consent ga
data.description: Do you want to sign-in users seamlessly into your add-in using their Office identity and access their Graph? We’re moving our single sign-on (SSO) API from in-preview to GA for admin deployed add-ins on rich clients and the web across Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint and Outlook. In this session, we take you through a step-by-step process of using an Office add-in to access user’s graph, handle errors and create fallbacks. Come and learn the intricacies of using the SSO API.

data.title: Threats in the wild: Detecting on-premises threats with Azure Advanced Threat Protection
data.sortTitle: threats in the wild: detecting on-premises threats with azure advanced threat protection
data.description: Learn about the how the Azure ATP security research team leverages the cloud to roll out the most up-to-date attack detections to ensure your company is the most secure.

data.title: Three ways to build bots with Azure AI that can make you a hero in your organization
data.sortTitle: three ways to build bots with azure ai that can make you a hero in your organization
data.description:
In this session, we share what’s new in Conversational AI across the Microsoft Bot Framework, including Azure Bot Service, QnA Maker, and LUIS. We show you three ways to use these tools to build bots that will make you a hero in your organization. Walk through the Conversational AI stack and learn how you can use these components to:
1.	Quickly build a Q&A bot with QnA Maker and deploy it teams in a matter of minutes- without writing a single line of code! 
2.	Building a bot that’s even more sophisticated with Bot Framework SDK and tools
3.	Building your organization’s own branded virtual assistant using the Virtual Assistant solution accelerator.

data.title: Time series and machine learning with Azure Data Explorer
data.sortTitle: time series and machine learning with azure data explorer
data.description: Accelerate your ML solution with Azure Data Explorer. Take advantage of built-in time series and ML operators for common scenarios, use in-line Python extension to run your algorithms closure to the data, and integrate with Spark.

data.title: Tokenize all the things: Deep dive on tokenizing digital and physical assets with Azure Blockchain
data.sortTitle: tokenize all the things: deep dive on tokenizing digital and physical assets with azure blockchain
data.description: What do coffee, currency, concert tickets, crude oil, and CAD files have in common? They are examples of physical and digital assets that are being tokenized on blockchains and used in b2b and b2c scenarios. In this session, learn about what tokenization is, real-world scenarios where customers are using it today, and how you can rapidly build end-to-end applications using tokenized assets with Azure Blockchain.

data.title: Tools, templates, and teamwork: Using Microsoft Teams to drive adoption
data.sortTitle: tools, templates, and teamwork: using microsoft teams to drive adoption
data.description: Come see us demo how to create a thriving community in Microsoft Teams to support your Microsoft 365 roll-out. We use our automated tool to provision a Microsoft Team and set it up to show you best practices you can use as soon as  you get back to the office!

data.title: Top 10 Microsoft Teams adoption best practices
data.sortTitle: top 10 microsoft teams adoption best practices
data.description: Learn from key customers how they are moving to Microsoft Teams. This session includes real-world guidance for planning, delivering, managing and driving adoption of Teams at scale. This session also includes a short overview of the Microsoft Service Adoption Specialist program and available adoption tools.

data.title: Top CASB use cases to boost your cloud security strategy
data.sortTitle: top casb use cases to boost your cloud security strategy
data.description: In this session we discuss how Microsoft Cloud App Security, our Cloud Access Security Broker (CASB) uniquely integrates with other Microsoft services to provide a CASB that delivers provides highly sophisticated threat detection, and adaptive access control capabilities, with simple deployment and centralized management. We walk you through some of the most common use cases across Office 365, Azure, third-party cloud apps and your custom, line of business apps. Learn how easy it is to deploy them, as we showcase some of our latest capabilities and integrations.

data.title: Top five best practices to accelerate your deployment of Microsoft Information Protection solutions
data.sortTitle: top five best practices to accelerate your deployment of microsoft information protection solutions
data.description: You all deal with sensitive data in your day-to-day business and you may be at different stages of your information protection journey. Join us to learn some useful tips and tricks to get started with information protection today, regardless of where you are in that process. While deployment is important, making information protection a part of your company culture may be challenging. Users who are working on sensitive data need to know that now there’s a simple, intuitive process to secure sensitive data. Get some ideas on how you can maximize secure behavior in your users with minimal friction.

data.title: Top five new features of Windows Server 2019
data.sortTitle: top five new features of windows server 2019
data.description: Windows Server 2019 is Microsoft's most rapidly adopted server operating system. With Windows Server 2008 and 2008 R2 end of support upon us, learn about some of the amazing new features included in the latest version of the Windows Server operating system. In this session, learn about the top new features in Windows Server 2019 including Windows Admin Center, Storage Migration Service, hyperconverged storage improvements, System Insights, Cluster Sets, Azure integration, Linux Containers and Kubernetes integration.

data.title: Top new information protection capabilities announced at Microsoft Ignite
data.sortTitle: top new information protection capabilities announced at microsoft ignite
data.description: We've announced several new capabilities that help you discover, classify, protect, and monitor your sensitive information. We know it can be a lot to absorb, so join us during this session for a "best of" view of what's new, along with demo highlights!

data.title: Top seven tips to become a Microsoft Graph guru
data.sortTitle: top seven tips to become a microsoft graph guru
data.description: Jeremy Thake, Principal Program Manager on the Microsoft Graph team and former Microsoft MVP, shares his top seven tips to become a Microsoft Graph guru. These tips are crafted from his analysis of common issues raised during conversations with developers, partner troubleshooting engagements, support calls and public forum questions. With these tips in your tool belt, you’ll not only be prepared for anything when you start integrating with Microsoft Graph, but also save hours of time with tools to accelerate your development.

data.title: Top ten reasons why you should break up with Chrome
data.sortTitle: top ten reasons why you should break up with chrome
data.description: We are on a mission to create the best browser for enterprises. We believe the next version of Microsoft Edge is that browser. We share the top benefits of Microsoft Edge and what makes it the best browser for your enterprise compared to Google Chrome and other browsers. You won’t believe reason #4!

data.title: Top ten things to know about Azure Machine Learning - technical edition
data.sortTitle: top ten things to know about azure machine learning - technical edition
data.description: Creating machine learning models that scale to a global business is complex. There are challenges and many complications at every step. Learn best practices, tips, and tricks from a Microsoft Distinguished Engineer for Machine Learning. Learn how teams like Bing, Office, and Cognitive Services scaled their own solutions with Azure Machine Learning, and how you can use these technologies and practices to scale your own ML.

data.title: Transform collaboration and fight shadow IT with Office 365 groups
data.sortTitle: transform collaboration and fight shadow it with office 365 groups
data.description: Managing Office 365 groups at scale is essential to a successful Microsoft 365 implementation. Come to this session to learn how to use five key admin and governance tools to effectively manage Office 365 groups. You’ll leave with an understanding of how to set up your groups expiry lifecycle, naming policies, classification labels, collaboration with external guests, and manage group creation permissions.

data.title: Transform end user training using Microsoft Teams and Microsoft 365 Learning Pathways
data.sortTitle: transform end user training using microsoft teams and microsoft 365 learning pathways
data.description: Join us in this session to increase the use and knowledge of common Office products.  Microsoft 365 Learning Pathways is a free, on-demand training solution that installs within your own Office 365 environment. It is easy to customize and able to host your own company content while delivering training on Microsoft 365 workloads like Microsoft Teams, Outlook, PowerPoint and others. Learn how to increase the use of this solution by integrating it into Microsoft Teams with our app and team templates.

data.title: Transforming collaboration with Microsoft Surface Hub 2S
data.sortTitle: transforming collaboration with microsoft surface hub 2s
data.description: Surface Hub 2S is an all-in-one collaborative canvas and meetings platform that brings the power of Windows 10 to teams. It builds on the experience that customers love about Surface Hub in a lighter, thinner, modern device that’s easy to move around and make any space teamwork space. This session explores the workspace trends that have contributed to the development of Surface Hub 2S, demos practical teamwork scenarios, and brings a customer onstage to showcase how Surface Hub 2S is transforming collaboration and supporting their modern workplace initiatives.

data.title: Troubleshooting Microsoft Teams
data.sortTitle: troubleshooting microsoft teams
data.description: During this session we dive deep into how to troubleshoot Microsoft Teams. We review many common areas of misconfiguration and the corresponding errors that you might see in these deployments. This session covers end-user scenarios and deep dives into the nuts and bolts of these scenarios through the tools of troubleshooting.

data.title: Turbocharge your infrastructure with AMD EPYC®
data.sortTitle: turbocharge your infrastructure with amd epyc®
data.description: On the heels of the revolutionary launch of AMD’s Zen2 “Rome” processors, AMD EPYC® has quickly become the best choice for organizations looking to maximize performance, flexibility, and security, while reducing overall costs. This session provides examples of the EPYC benefits now available for next-gen cloud, on-premises, and hybrid cloud deployments utilizing both AMD CPU and GPU technologies. Join the EPYC movement, and learn how AMD can dramatically scale your workload performance and security while providing massive cost savings.

data.title: Ultra Disk: Race into the future with fastest disk storage in the cloud
data.sortTitle: ultra disk: race into the future with fastest disk storage in the cloud
data.description: Lift and Shift latency sensitive applications to Azure Ultra Disk Storage. Whether your customer is running high performance databases, high throughput big data applications or real time transactional workloads, Azure Ultra Disk is your answer. In this session, we cover customer use cases, workload types, and compete information. Come learn about Ultra Disks, which provide industry leading sub-millisecond latency with extremely scalable IOPS and throughput.

data.title: Understanding AI enabled search for your apps: Azure Search technical edition
data.sortTitle: understanding ai enabled search for your apps: azure search technical edition
data.description: Come learn how to improve your search index and your applications by diving into tips and tricks of Azure Search with the product team experts. Learn about complex types, scoring profiles, and newly announced Azure Search ML APIs - to create the best search experience for your customers.

data.title: Understanding enterprise readiness for machine learning solutions
data.sortTitle: understanding enterprise readiness for machine learning solutions
data.description: Data privacy and security are top of mind for almost every enterprise in the world. But creating machine learning in a manner that is secure and privacy-aware presents specific challenges. Learn how to build and deploy secure, protected, and scalable machine learning using Azure Machine Learning. Understand how to apply multi-factor authentication, role-based authorization, data encryption, VNETs, and other security and privacy best practices to the machine learning lifecycle.

data.title: Unified PowerShell experience for Microsoft Graph - preview
data.sortTitle: unified powershell experience for microsoft graph - preview
data.description: Microsoft Graph provides access to a wide range of information belonging to you and your organization. Currently PowerShell users do not have a unified experience for accessing all of Microsoft Graph. This session introduces our preview Microsoft Graph PowerShell module generated from Microsoft Graph metadata using the same technology the Azure team is using to build their management PowerShell modules. Come learn how you can quickly use this to do ad-hoc interrogation of Microsoft Graph data and also build scripts that can perform unattended processes on your organization’s data.

data.title: Unify Microsoft Teams across tenants to accelerate M&As and cloud consolidations
data.sortTitle: unify microsoft teams across tenants to accelerate m&as and cloud consolidations
data.description: In this session, Binary Tree helps you better understand the challenges, requirements, and solutions for migrating Microsoft Teams between Office 365 tenants. Learn how to ensure a successful migration – while avoiding downtime, reducing late night hours and weekend projects, and improving end user collaboration as a unified entity. With 59% of the companies around the world planning to make an acquisition in the next year, chances are fairly high that an M&A project is in your near future. Join us and get ready to be the star of your next M&A project.

data.title: Unifying AI-to-BI with the future of Azure SQL Data Warehouse
data.sortTitle: unifying ai-to-bi with the future of azure sql data warehouse
data.description: To truly unlock the value of your data, you need a data pipeline that works with the latest in machine learning and business intelligence tools over all your data. By combining the ingestion, preparation, and analytical capabilities of the modern data warehouse pattern, the scale and performance of SQL Data Warehouse, and Azure Machine Learning and Microsoft Power BI, you can truly have it all. In this session, we walk through how these integrations enable you to prepare data, train models, and generate reports as part of a single pipeline in Azure.

data.title: Unleash the hunter in you: Advanced hunting in Microsoft Defender ATP
data.sortTitle: unleash the hunter in you: advanced hunting in microsoft defender atp
data.description: Microsoft Defender Advanced Threat Protection gives incident responders insights into endpoint activity they've always wished they had when incidents occur. In this theater session, learn how to use advanced hunting to gain insights into endpoint data going far beyond just responding to alerts.

data.title: Unlock the power of data driven diagramming with Microsoft Excel and Visio
data.sortTitle: unlock the power of data driven diagramming with microsoft excel and visio
data.description: Learn how Microsoft Visio and Excel can be used better together to enhance your productivity. In this session, we show you how to create diagrams automatically using data and keep your data and diagrams connected with a two-way sync. Get hands-on with the new Data Visualizer Excel add-in that lets you create professional looking diagrams right inside Excel without having to install Visio.

data.title: Unlock your data and transform your organization with workplace intelligence (roadmap and demos)
data.sortTitle: unlock your data and transform your organization with workplace intelligence (roadmap and demos)
data.description: Did you know that almost 50% of modern workplace benefits are related to behavioral change in the workplace? Discover how new workplace intelligence features in Microsoft Workplace Analytics help you reveal quantifiable insights about how work gets done, and how you can apply those insights in countless ways—streamlining processes, cutting unnecessary meetings, or helping people collaborate more effectively—to drive speed and impact.

data.title: Unlocking AI insights from your video using Video Indexer
data.sortTitle: unlocking ai insights from your video using video indexer
data.description: As the amount of video on the internet is growing exponentially and will continue to grow for the foreseeable future, it is more important than ever to get the most value out of your video content. Come and learn about how you can use Video Indexer to extract a rich set of machine learning insights from your video files to make your content searchable and to improve user engagement. In this session, see a demo of Video Indexer, learn about our new features such as animated character recognition and multi-language support, and get started using the service.

data.title: Unlocking business insights for SAP data with Azure Data Services, AI/ML, and Microsoft Power Platform
data.sortTitle: unlocking business insights for sap data with azure data services, ai/ml, and microsoft power platform
data.description: Discover how to leverage SAP data to enhance productivity, optimize business processes and deliver actionable business insights with Azure Data Services. Learn how to utilize the data and workflow integration capabilities in Azure to deliver AI-driven insights, rich data visualizations, and business workflow management to address business scenarios such as customer acquisition and retention, improving process efficiencies, supply chain logistics and inventory optimizations with real-world examples.

data.title: Unparalleled ways that Microsoft makes data sharing flexible, safe, and astonishingly simple
data.sortTitle: unparalleled ways that microsoft makes data sharing flexible, safe, and astonishingly simple
data.description: Join an upbeat theater session which details how Azure Data Share makes it easy for you to share data with third-party organizations in a safe and secure manner from multiple data sources, including Azure SQL Database and Azure SQL Data Warehouse. In this session, see an end-to-end demonstration of how organizations can easily share data with their partners to derive insights and reason over data that was previously difficult to procure.

data.title: Use Azure’s edge infrastructure to make edge computing work for your business
data.sortTitle: use azure’s edge infrastructure to make edge computing work for your business
data.description: Join us to learn more about Azure Edge infrastructure - Azure Data Box Edge, Azure Stack and Azure Stack HCI. We will discuss customer use cases and scenarios, latest product announcements and long term strategy

data.title: Use GPU VMs to power remote graphics and visualization in the cloud
data.sortTitle: use gpu vms to power remote graphics and visualization in the cloud
data.description: See how our recently announced NVv4 VM can support your visualization needs at a price and performance level that meets your business need. If you are looking to migrate enterprise desktops/engineering workstations to the cloud then see how NVv4 helps provide fractional GPU powered desktops in the cloud for knowledge workers and power users. In this session, we highlight customer examples that our ISV partners Windows Virtual Desktop, Teradici, Citrix, and Workspot have implemented for customers.

data.title: Use serverless technologies to manage your IT resources
data.sortTitle: use serverless technologies to manage your it resources
data.description: Managing cloud resources is increasingly becoming a challenge for IT organizations with the accelerated adoption of DevOps and digital transformation. Being able to retain high availability best practices, adhere to compliance requirements, and manage costs at the same time generates additional challenges. With the help of serverless technologies, you can increase automation and apply policies to cloud resources to simplify the management of your operations. Join us to learn how to use Event Grid, Azure Logic Apps and Functions to apply IT policies such as asset tagging, maintenance window scheduling, and disaster recovery schemas to your Azure resources.

data.title: Using Azure Sentinel to supercharge your threat hunting
data.sortTitle: using azure sentinel to supercharge your threat hunting
data.description:
Azure Sentinel provides a cloud based SIEM and SOAR platform that is ideal for detecting, investigating, and responding to threats in your environment. However how can you leverage the capabilities of Azure Sentinel to find those threats that you don’t currently know about?

Hear from Microsoft security analysts about the best techniques and practices for threat hunting and how to supercharge them using the power of Kusto Query Language, Sentinel’s Graph Explorer, and Azure Notebooks in Azure Sentinel.

data.title: Using Azure Web Application Firewall to protect your web applications and web APIs
data.sortTitle: using azure web application firewall to protect your web applications and web apis
data.description: If you build web applications and APIs on Azure and want to protect them from common threats, exploits and volumetric attacks, this session is for you! Web application firewall (WAF) is the gold standard for protecting against malicious threats.  In this session, learn best practices for securing your web applications and APIs with Azure’s cloud-native services.   Build your own multi-layer application protection strategy to protect your Azure resources using Azure’s network and application security services.

data.title: Using data loss prevention policies in Microsoft 365 to prevent oversharing of sensitive information across apps, devices and services
data.sortTitle: using data loss prevention policies in microsoft 365 to prevent oversharing of sensitive information across apps, devices and services
data.description: Data loss prevention (DLP) policies in Microsoft 365 help you prevent the accidental or inadvertent oversharing of sensitive information that resides or is shared across your environment. In this session, we discuss the latest new capabilities and enhancements that will help you detect sensitive information and block or prevent inappropriate sharing or sending of important data - both inside and outside of the organization.

data.title: Using HPC Cache to reduce latency
data.sortTitle: using hpc cache to reduce latency
data.description: In this session, hear about how the new Azure HPC Cache works to reduce latency and create efficiency in large, file-based workloads. HPC Cache leverages Azure Blob, Azure NetApp Files, and on-premises network-attached storage resources to access data and use in high-performance computing and rendering workloads running in Azure.

data.title: Using PowerApps component framework to build reusable custom user experiences
data.sortTitle: using powerapps component framework to build reusable custom user experiences
data.description: PowerApps component framework enables building reusable and responsive solution aware visual components which can be used across both model-driven and canvas apps. Learn how to build your own custom pro-dev components on the same framework that powers Microsoft's Dynamics 365 Customer Engagement unified interface applications and AI builder experiences. Take your app experience to the next level!

data.title: Using the Windows Insider Program to be successful with the next version of Windows
data.sortTitle: using the windows insider program to be successful with the next version of windows
data.description: Learn how to run your OWN Windows Insider Program within your organization from Insiders around the world in a diverse set of industries.  We’ll tell you how you too can adopt a modern way of staying current with Microsoft software so your organization is ready to get the most out of the digital transformation

data.title: Virtual Machine Manager 2019 and Data Protection Manager 2019: Customer success stories and what’s next
data.sortTitle: virtual machine manager 2019 and data protection manager 2019: customer success stories and what’s next
data.description: Virtual Machine Manager 2019 introduced storage optimization, improved security with new VM admin role, integration with Azure update management, and more. Hear from large enterprise customers as they share their real world experiences of successful deployments of VMM and System Center Data Protection Manager 2019. The session also shares new advancements coming up in 2019 UR1 releases of VMM and DPM such as hybrid management, simplified networking experience, library server replication, DPM performance improvements, DPM support for Azure data box integration and support for workloads running on ReFS.

data.title: Visio roadmap: Now and beyond
data.sortTitle: visio roadmap: now and beyond
data.description: The Microsoft Visio team is constantly investing in the latest technologies to make diagramming easier and more impactful—and will continue to do so going forward. Join the Visio team to learn more about how your organization can achieve digital transformation with the fast-paced innovations and exciting future roadmap of Visio.

data.title: Visual Studio Code tips and tricks
data.sortTitle: visual studio code tips and tricks
data.description: Visual Studio Code is a free editor that runs on Windows, macOS, and Linux. We show how you can supercharge your workflow with some of our favorite editor customizations, time-saving extensions, debugging tips, and even how to do remote development in remote VMs, Docker containers, and the Windows Subsystem for Linux.

data.title: We've got your back: Team up with Microsoft's security experts to respond to critical threats
data.sortTitle: we've got your back: team up with microsoft's security experts to respond to critical threats
data.description: When you bring together Microsoft’s vast optics into the latest threats with best in the industry security experts, you get a unique ally on your side to help you discover and respond to sophisticated attacks. Join Jessica Payne and Eric Olson to learn how they teamed up and leveraged our actionable threat intelligence to support a customer facing a cybersecurity incident. During this session you will learn about Microsoft Threat Experts, an additional layer of expertise and optics that Microsoft Defender ATP customers can utilize to augment security operations. You’ll also learn about Microsoft's customer facing Incident Response (IR) team who travels the world offering reactive incident response and proactive security investigation services to help our customers manage their cyber-risk.

data.title: Web app network security made easy
data.sortTitle: web app network security made easy
data.description: The Azure App Service has a number of features that make it simple to secure your apps at a network level. This includes function apps as well as web apps. Some of these features were recently GAs or put into preview. This session discusses and demonstrate these new features. Learn how to combine features to satisfy your specific application networking requirements with either the multi-tenant service or with the App Service Environment.

data.title: What do I do next?  Managing asks and tasks with Microsoft 365
data.sortTitle: what do i do next?  managing asks and tasks with microsoft 365
data.description: From Teams, to @mentions, to Planner…the great teamwork and collaboration tools built into M365 have truly enabled people to and organizations to revolutionize the way they work.  But at the same time, they have also introduced new challenges, particularly in the way people organize and manage the day to day demands for their attention.  This session will not only discuss apps and features in M365 designed to keep individuals on track via Tasks in M365, but will also bring in customer panel with broad usage patterns to explain both the challenges and compensatory strategies used by companies today.

data.title: What does your sensitive data landscape look like? Best practices in data discovery and classification using machine learning, analytics, and reports
data.sortTitle: what does your sensitive data landscape look like? best practices in data discovery and classification using machine learning, analytics, and reports
data.description: The first step in a comprehensive information protection strategy often involves gaining an understanding of what kind of sensitive information exists across your environment, where is resides, what it contains, and what is happening to it. In this session, we help you understand the data discovery and classification tools that you can use to better understand your sensitive data estate - across devices, the cloud, and on-premises repositories.

data.title: What's amazing and new in calendaring in Outlook
data.sortTitle: what's amazing and new in calendaring in outlook
data.description: Join us to learn about an abundance of improvements and new features that were released in Microsoft Outlook calendar this past year! Scheduling meetings and managing your calendar has never been easier, with intelligent meeting suggestions, new attendee tracking options, and one-click room booking. Your users will be excited about managing their invites and upcoming meetings without ever leaving their inbox. Beyond what’s already out, we hope you’ll also leave the session excited about the in-progress work for collaborative meetings and modernized free/busy to combine across your work and personal life, and outside your organization. And we couldn’t let you leave without showing off the new UX in Windows, Mac, and web!

data.title: What's new for Azure Stack HCI: 45 things in 45 minutes
data.sortTitle: what's new for azure stack hci: 45 things in 45 minutes
data.description: Hyperconverged infrastructure is constantly getting better: between compute, storage, networking, management, and cloud services, Microsoft makes little changes and announcements week after week, month after month, all year long. Where can you find the definitive list of everything new since Windows Server 2016? In this fast-paced lightning round session, we highlight our favorite 45 new things in just 45 minutes. At the end, if you already knew everything (impossible!) then you can have our jobs! Keywords: Hyper-V, Storage Spaces Direct, SDN, Windows Admin Center

data.title: What's new in Azure Compute
data.sortTitle: what's new in azure compute
data.description: Curious to know more about the new Azure Compute services and features that Microsoft recently brought to market? It has been another amazing year for Microsoft Azure, and our Azure Compute portfolio continues to expand. In this session we review recent announcements, highlight important additions to the Azure virtual machine portfolio and platform in the areas of availability, resilience, and cost optimization. Join us to discover where we plan to invest next and share your thoughts to influence our decisions.

data.title: What's new in Azure Data Studio notebooks
data.sortTitle: what's new in azure data studio notebooks
data.description: Notebooks have taken the SQL world by storm. Whether used for education or used in automation, come learn how to use the integrated SQL kernel in Azure Data Studio notebooks. You won't want to miss all the new things you can do with notebooks, there is something for everyone.

data.title: What's new in Azure Networking
data.sortTitle: what's new in azure networking
data.description: Cloud networking is evolving and so is Azure Networking. Learn about our new announcements, an overview of our most recent enhancements and a sneak peek into the future of networking and security.

data.title: What's new in Azure Storage
data.sortTitle: what's new in azure storage
data.description: A lot has changed in Azure Storage. In this session, we provide an overview of new announcements, highlights of this years new capabilities, as well as the hottest use cases for storage that customers have set up. We also highlight where we are headed from an architecture and capability viewpoint.

data.title: What's new in Microsoft 365 admin center
data.sortTitle: what's new in microsoft 365 admin center
data.description: We’re evolving the Microsoft 365 admin center to better serve your changing needs in IT, to help you streamline your work and respond to the needs of your organization and users. In this session, learn about the latest improvements to admin center, and new features rolling out in preview. Hear valuable tips and tricks to help you get the most out of Microsoft 365.

data.title: What's new in the Office Customization Tool
data.sortTitle: what's new in the office customization tool
data.description: Learn what's new in the Office Customization Tool for Microsoft Office 365 ProPlus.

data.title: What's new on Teams for firstline workers?
data.sortTitle: what's new on teams for firstline workers?
data.description: Join us for this session packaging all firstline worker goodness shipped since last Microsoft Ignite.

data.title: What's new with Azure Data Lake Storage
data.sortTitle: what's new with azure data lake storage
data.description: For big data storage on Azure, there's no better place than Azure Data Lake Storage Gen 2, so come see the newest improvements to ADLS Gen 2 and how it can improve your data scale and flexibility.

data.title: What’s new and what's next in Power BI embedded analytics
data.sortTitle: what’s new and what's next in power bi embedded analytics
data.description: Learn about the latest innovations in Power BI embedded analytics as well as the upcoming roadmap. Highlights include updates to authentication, application lifecycle management, enterprise reporting support, embedded AI and more!

data.title: What’s new and what's next in Power BI embedded analytics
data.sortTitle: what’s new and what's next in power bi embedded analytics
data.description: Learn about the latest innovations in Power BI embedded analytics as well as the upcoming roadmap. Highlights include updates to authentication, application lifecycle management, enterprise reporting support, embedded AI and more!

data.title: What’s new in Azure Active Directory Identity Protection
data.sortTitle: what’s new in azure active directory identity protection
data.description: Azure Active Directory Identity Protection is a tool that empowers you to proactively prevent compromised identities from being abused, automatically mitigates risk when suspicious activity is detected, investigates risky users and sign-ins, and alerts you when a user risk has hit a specific threshold. Come learn about the latest capabilities in Identity Protection and start using it today.

data.title: What’s new in Office cloud policy service
data.sortTitle: what’s new in office cloud policy service
data.description: Learn what's new in the Office cloud policy service including device policy management.

data.title: What’s new in security for Azure SQL
data.sortTitle: what’s new in security for azure sql
data.description: As a leader in data security technologies, Azure SQL continues to attract more and more business-critical applications handling financial, healthcare, government, and other sensitive data. Join this demo-heavy session to see the latest Azure SQL security innovations in action and learn about new customer scenarios and opportunities the new security technologies unlock. Get a first-hand look at the new cutting-edge capabilities in network security, authentication, data encryption, security management, and other areas.

data.title: What’s new with Azure Resource Manager (ARM) templates for your deployments
data.sortTitle: what’s new with azure resource manager (arm) templates for your deployments
data.description: ARM templates is one of the most widely used infrastructure-as-code tools to provision and manage Azure infrastructure. In this session, we cover the latest improvements, best practices and tips for creating and maintaining your ARM templates. We cover new features which include template authoring tooling enhancements, predictable deployments, Azure DevOps integrations, and investments to the overall deployment platform.

data.title: What’s next for software-defined storage and networking for Windows Server
data.sortTitle: what’s next for software-defined storage and networking for windows server
data.description: Get a sneak peek at the software-defined infrastructure capabilities coming in the next Windows Server LTSC. Come listen to Steven Ekren, John Marlin, and Dan Cuomo talk Storage Spaces Direct and Software-Defined Networking (SDN). Hint: we have listened, and a lot of what's coming is what you've been asking for! Coming soon to an Insider Preview near you...

data.title: What’s the latest with Azure Cosmos DB
data.sortTitle: what’s the latest with azure cosmos db
data.description: Azure Cosmos DB is Microsoft’s premier globally distributed, multi-model database system. The service is designed to allow users to elastically and horizontally scale both throughput and storage across any number of geographical regions. It offers guaranteed <10 ms latencies at the 99th percentile, 99.999% high availability and five well defined consistency models to developers. It’s been powering Microsoft’s very own mission-critical internet-scale services for nearly a decade. In this session, we present demos of all the latest and greatest features we’re launching for Azure Cosmos DB at Microsoft Ignite. These range from top requested features to new novel capabilities. You’ll definitely want to attend this session if you're using, or are new to Azure Cosmos DB.

data.title: Why developers love Postgres
data.sortTitle: why developers love postgres
data.description: Postgres is ranked as one of the “most-loved” databases by developers—and is the frequent choice for developers building new applications whether on-premises or in the cloud. We look at what makes the open source Postgres database unique among relational databases, from foreign data wrappers to rich indexes and datatypes to JSONB to Postgres extensions including PostGIS and Citus. And, we explore the types of modern frameworks Postgres is a good fit for, including Django and Rails. If you are looking to leverage Postgres and you don’t want to have to get a Ph.D. in database technologies, come learn why Postgres is leading the resurgence of relational databases among app developers.

data.title: Why devices matter: Get the best collaboration experience on Microsoft Teams, end-to-end
data.sortTitle: why devices matter: get the best collaboration experience on microsoft teams, end-to-end
data.description: Microsoft Teams users are not all the same. Understand the unique needs of different users and how to drive the best collaboration experience on Microsoft Teams. Avoid common mistakes and hear simple steps to equip your people with what they need.

data.title: Why enterprises are moving from Oracle to Azure Postgres
data.sortTitle: why enterprises are moving from oracle to azure postgres
data.description: As companies evolve to their digital transformation, many also choose to modernize their data estate to better fit their elastic cloud-centric architecture. We are seeing a growing trend for enterprises who have historically relied on Oracle to move to a more flexible, lower cost and cloud-centric database architecture. Many of these are selecting Azure Postgres, particularly for transactional and low-latency business analytics. This session explores why customers are making this choice: the benefits of this move, as well as several business/technology strategies for making the move successful.

data.title: Windows 10 in S mode: The complete trusted device experience
data.sortTitle: windows 10 in s mode: the complete trusted device experience
data.description: Get a fast-paced rundown of the advanced security capabilities available with Windows 10 in S mode. Discover how Windows 10 in S mode leverages built-in, cloud powered, intelligent security from Windows 10 so you can experience security and performance benefits while supporting legacy applications. We also cover specific scenarios and benefits, such as running only verified apps from trusted platforms.

data.title: Windows Admin Center: Better together with System Center and Microsoft Azure
data.sortTitle: windows admin center: better together with system center and microsoft azure
data.description: When should you use Windows Admin Center? When should you use System Center or Azure management? Learn how these Microsoft management solutions complement one another and how each can bring value to your unique environment.

data.title: Windows Admin Center: Unlock Azure Hybrid value
data.sortTitle: windows admin center: unlock azure hybrid value
data.description: Leverage the power of the Azure cloud to intelligently secure, protect, monitor, and extend the capacity of your on-premises and cloud servers. In this demo-rich session, learn how Windows Admin Center can help you easily and effectively enable a variety of compelling hybrid scenarios, whether you’re managing Windows Server instances on-premises, in Azure, or in any cloud.

data.title: Windows Admin Center: What’s new and what’s next
data.sortTitle: windows admin center: what’s new and what’s next
data.description: Get an inside look at what’s new in the latest public release of Windows Admin Center for modern remote management of your Windows Servers. Through lots of demos, see how you can benefit from a variety of user-driven enhancements and new features. Learn about what’s on the horizon for Windows Admin Center Insiders, and see how your feedback directly contributes to the reimagining of server management.

data.title: Windows App Development Roadmap: Making Sense of UWP, Win32, .NET
data.sortTitle: windows app development roadmap: making sense of uwp, win32, .net
data.description: Learn how we’re evolving the UI platform to enable powerful and beautiful apps for 800M+ Windows devices. We’ll explore what’s new in the UI platform since //Build 2019, including the upcoming Windows UI Library 3.0 release, and our platform roadmap!

data.title: Windows containers and the Azure Kubernetes Service
data.sortTitle: windows containers and the azure kubernetes service
data.description: Learn how to orchestrate Windows container deployments with Azure Kubernetes Services. We pick up where “Lift and Shift your applications with Windows Containers” What is this? Can we give a session number? finished and continue on the journey to set up a continuous build and deployment process with Azure DevOps and Azure Container Registry. Then we dive into container orchestration with Azure Kubernetes Services – empowering you in your application modernization journey.

data.title: Windows Sandbox: Execution of Untrusted Software in Isolation
data.sortTitle: windows sandbox: execution of untrusted software in isolation
data.description: How many times have you been in a situation in which you needed to run some executable, but you were hesitant because it could have been a virus or some malicious code that could have infected your system? We have been in this situation many times, which was our initial inspiration to create Windows Sandbox. Windows Sandbox is a pristine and secure environment in which users can execute untrusted software without the fear that their host OS will get infected or altered in any way.

data.title: Windows security internals: Containers for the win
data.sortTitle: windows security internals: containers for the win
data.description: Windows 10 provides revolutionary capabilities for application isolation with containers in Windows. But how do they work? What is the difference between an AppContainer, an MSIX (Helium) container, and an AppGuard (Krypton) container? What are the advantages (and disadvantages) of each? Dive deep on how we can reduce the attack surface regardless of the container, constraining the behavior of apps and protecting against memory-based attacks. These containers are the cornerstone of features such as UWP, MSIX, Windows Defender Application Guard, Windows Sandbox, and the Windows Subsystem for Linux 2. We’ll demystify protections and ensure that you are confident in your knowledge of the security controls Windows 10 provides!

data.title: Windows Server on Azure overview: Lift-and-shift migrations for enterprise workloads
data.sortTitle: windows server on azure overview: lift-and-shift migrations for enterprise workloads
data.description: This session helps you prepare for migrating to Microsoft Azure! Real customer scenarios are used as examples to help you plan and successfully execute lift-and-shift migrations to Azure. Migration and upgrade of Windows Server 2008 workloads, integration with Azure Backup, SQL Server Availability Groups, and SQL Server Failover Cluster Instance (FCI) deployments are demonstrated. Planning, testing, and setting expecations are the keys to achieving customer success.

data.title: Windows Server: What's new and what's next
data.sortTitle: windows server: what's new and what's next
data.description: Come hear what's new in the latest release of Windows Server and our team's vision for what's next. This session covers the product roadmap and demos some exciting new capabilities. Whether you run Windows Server in an Azure virtual machine or on-premises, build your future with Windows Server 2019.

data.title: Winning strategies for identity security and governance
data.sortTitle: winning strategies for identity security and governance
data.description: Sometimes it feels like security practitioners can't win. Aggressive security policies can protect your organization, but you create friction for your users and reduce productivity. Come learn how Azure Active Directory and Conditional Access tools across the Microsoft Security suite can help you enable strong security practices while maximizing for user productivity.

data.title: Wow customers with industry-specific solutions built on the Microsoft 365 platform
data.sortTitle: wow customers with industry-specific solutions built on the microsoft 365 platform
data.description: Microsoft is making big investments to approach customers in industries including healthcare, manufacturing, and government. Learn how you can take advantage of these investments to build industry-relevant productivity solutions, using the latest extensibility features on the Microsoft 365 platform. We discuss support for different industries’ specific security and compliance requirements, share great solution demos, and walk through solution design using Microsoft Graph, Microsoft Teams, and our latest productivity investments.

data.title: You do meetings? So do we! Come see new meeting features in Outlook on the web!
data.sortTitle: you do meetings? so do we! come see new meeting features in outlook on the web!
data.description: Learn about new features in Outlook on the web that allow you to easily schedule a meeting. See how Outlook can recommend a meeting time, see how to quickly create a meeting from the calendar surface, see how we help you prepare for your meeting with information from Meeting Insights, and finally and effortlessly find the right room for your meeting! Do you need to schedule a meeting with someone outside or your organization? We have lots of options there too!

data.title: Your data in ADLS: What's new and coming for Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations
data.sortTitle: your data in adls: what's new and coming for microsoft dynamics 365 finance and operations
data.description: You have heard of BYOD, but have you heard of Azure Data Lake? Your Finance and Operations data will soon be available in ADLS. This session provides you with the details on how ADLS works with Finance and Operations, how you can access your data, and the timing for when it will all be available.

data.title: Your users are under attack! Strengthen your anti-phishing defense with these best practices
data.sortTitle: your users are under attack! strengthen your anti-phishing defense with these best practices
data.description: Over the past few years, we’ve seen attackers use Phishing as a preferred attack method. In 2018, the percentage of inbound emails that were Phishing messages grew 250%. That trend has continued to grow with increased level of targeting and sophistication. Combating such relentless attacks requires advanced Phish defenses like Office 365 Advanced Threat Protection (Office 365 ATP) that focus not only on prevention, but also on user education and training, in addition to advanced security tools for detection, investigation and response. Join us to learn how Office 365 ATP can help you in your fight against phishing and adopt some best practices for most effective and optimal results.

data.title: Zero Hype – Taking practical steps towards Zero Trust
data.sortTitle: zero hype – taking practical steps towards zero trust
data.description: You have probably heard a lot about Zero Trust but have no idea how to deploy the abstract and buzzy concept in your organization. Let us demystify the concept and come gain practical deployment recommendations to take a Zero Trust approach, starting with identity as the control plane and then expanding across your security infrastrucutre.
